VESTPAKZ
As seen on Oprah's million dollar idea challenge,abc's Shark Tank and a exhibitor at the Smithsonian Innovation Festival in Washington DC. Vestpakz started out as a 6th grade science project looking for a good grade, little did we know that it would take us on an amazing journey! With so many email and feed back on the Vestpakz along with where they are being sold, we just had to use crowd funding to help keep the dream going!

column12: >""Born in Florence, founded in London, Serendipity bags want to give every woman the possibility to fully customize her own handbag, offering her great design and made-in-Italy quality, without a luxury price tag.”
column32: >Customize your favourite Serendipity bags by choosing among a variety of leather, lining and metal colours. Make your bag unique!
column43: >We only use high-quality Italian leather, hardware and accessories. All of our bags are handcrafted by artisans with a devotion to details.
column58: >As an online store with no physical presence, no middlemen and no upfront stock we don't charge high margins on our bags and bargain hard with suppliers to bring you the best, for less.

column1: Write your initials, a short phrase or special date (or all of these!). We will engrave them on a high-quality metal plate made of Gold or Silver brass. Making it also a handy addition to your bag, the empty side of the plate can be used as a mirror.

column3: >The plate is detachable, but you can keep it in its leather frame located inside the bag and keep it safe from possible scratches. Once you purchase one of the Serendipity bags, email us simply telling what would you like us to write on the plate. If you decide not to go for this option, we will use our signature made-in-Italy Serendipity bags brass plate instead.

column4: >THE PLATE CAN BE INSERTED IN ALL BAGS

column6: >Simple in spirit but elegant in design, the Serendipity Tote bag is an essential addition to every outfit. You can change its shape and transform it in a shoulder bag using two hidden magnets on the top sides of the bag.

column4: >
>

column6: >Featuring details such as raw-edged construction and the signature Serendipity's Lock, the Serendipity Handbag is the ideal day-to-evening bag. The handbag has double handles for ease of carrying and removable shoulder strap to wear it on your shoulders.

column4: >
>

column5: >With its compact yet fashionable shape, the Serendipity Crossbody is the essential go-anywhere bag. It’s surprisingly spacious and the adjustable shoulder strap makes it ideal for both evenings and weekend outings.

column4: >
>

column5: >Compact, versatile and very trendy. The Serendipity Pochette can be worn on its shoulder strap or hand-carried for a trendier look. You can use it as a standalone bag or match it with a bigger one. The spacious interior and gussets mean easy access to all your essentials.

column4: >H 15cm, W 19cm, D 7.5cm [H 6in, W 7.5in, D 3in]

column5: >The Serendipity Cardholder is a slick way to keep your essentials in check. With its compact style, it Is kitted with four slots and a central compartment where you can place your customizable plate.

column4: >

column7: >INDIEGOGO PRICE €415 | SAVE €465 ON RETAIL PRICE
column10: >INDIEGOGO PRICE €400 | SAVE €450 ON RETAIL PRICE
column14: >FOR BULK ORDERS, PLEASE CONTACT US AT:
column36: >All of our bag use ""full-grain"" Italian leather. This is the highest quality leather for a bag. “Full-grain” means that the leather surface has not been treated to remove imperfections, which is what happens with lower quality leather cuts such as “top-grain leather”. ""Full-grain"" leather will give your bag a beautiful natural look and make it last for much longer. That's why bags that use “full-grain” Italian leather are usually priced from around a thousand $ and up!
column47: >Our hardware components are made of premium brass, galvanised of 0.20% pure gold or palladium. This type of hardware is known for its beautiful shades and durability, giving our bags a luxury touch immediately distinguishable from cheap generic 'gold-tone hardware"" used by many top brands selling at this price tag.

column6: >The interiors are made with 100% Italian cotton lining and include a custom-made brass plate and leather pockets to carry your whereabouts. Our cotton lining has a soft natural touch and comes in colours that can be mixed and matched with those of the leather and hardware.

>Our names are Leonardo and Filippo and we are the co-founders of Serendipity bags. We both grew up in Florence, Italy, the birthplace of Italian fashion, and moved to London, UK, some years ago. We started the company in 2017 with the ""simple"" plan of bringing fashion back to its origins, but with a modern and more sustainable twist.  We're united by our desire to bring what we believe the true 'made-in-Italy' should be: best in the world design customised to your specifications, finest materials and handcraft, all for a reasonable price.

column4: >IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO GET IN TOUCH, JUST DROP US A MESSAGE AT:

column6: >In a continuation of the centuries' old Florentine tradition of leather processing, Tommaso founded his leather business in the early seventies. Over the years, it gradually became a point of excellence for leather production in Italy, collaborating with some of the most prestigious Italian and foreign fashion brands. We're his smallest client by a huge margin, but not the least loved!

>It took us multiple trials and errors before we settled with the current production. We weren't just looking for reliability, but also great quality and attention to details. Located in the capital of Renaissance, Florence, Italy, our handbag Factory has been hand-crafting bags with time-honoured techniques for over 40 years.

>We strongly support local generational artisans and the extraordinary tradition of Florentine craftsmen. Their love for fine quality leather and ardent passion for handmade workmanship inspires us, while at the same time makes sure that your bag will be crafted with the greatest attention to details and care.

column12: >Q: How can I customise my internal brass plate?

column3: >A: This is how you do it:
>1. Select a pledge that includes the customisable metal plate (for the handbag, tote, crossbody, and pochette is included).
>2. After the campaign is over, we’ll send you a survey asking you what you’d like us to engrave on the plate. That’s it!
>Q: What is the difference between the leather you use and the leather used by most other brands?

>A: We use ""full-grain"" Italian leather, which is the best quality leather for a bag. Many other brands use “top-grain” or even inferior types of leather, which are treated to hide imperfections, and don’t last for long.
>Q: How do I order the bags?

>A: The only way to get one is through our Indiegogo page here! People who back the project get to have their very own Serendipity bags earlier and save up to €180 over the future retail prices. Here is how it works:
>1. You have to pledge for a reward you want.
>2. To pledge for a reward click the ""Back this project"" button on the right side of the project page.

>3. Select the rewards you want in return for your pledge. You can pick the bag that you want, and the colour, lining and metal details. Select the country you want it shipped to and finish the pledge. That’s it!
>4. Write us at info@serendipity-bags.com what you’d like to write on your customizable brass plate.
>Q: Can I change my pledge afterwards?
>Just write us at info@serendipity-bags.com with what you’d like to change and we’ll take care of it.
>Q: I want a combination that is not on offer. How can I get it?
>A: We already have some combos on offer but, if you have in mind a different combination, just write us at info@serendipity-bags.com and we’ll make your dreams come true!
>Q: Can I add something else to my pledge.
>If you drop us an email at info@serendipity-bags.com with what you’d like to add, we’ll try to do it for you.
>Q: Where do I specify you my address?
>A: We'll send you a survey after the end of the campaign to collect your shipping address.
>Q: I want a large quantity of bags, can you provide us with any discounts?
>A: Of course, we will! Just shoot us a message with the following details and we will get back to you on our discounted pricing and details on how to pledge:
>1. What bags do you want to order?
>2. How many orders in EACH style?
>3. Do you want us to ship all them to the same address?
>Q: I want to gift the bag, how can I do so?
>A: It’s very easy! After you order one of our bags, we’ll send you a survey (it will get to you at the end of the campaign). Just mark it as a gift and we will gift wrap it for you free!
>Q: Will the bag be available in additional colours?
>A: It might be possible to have other colours. After all, we don’t say we make custom-made bags for nothing! Drop us a message with what you have in mind and we’ll try our best to accommodate it!

column1: A: We ship to all countries that are open for e-commerce!

column3: >Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside an EU country you may be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

column1: ","""Born in Florence, founded in London, Serendipity bags want to give every woman the possibility to fully customize her own handbag, offering her great design and made-in-Italy quality, without a luxury price tag.” LEONARDO & FILIPPO FOUNDERS OF SERENDIPITY BAGS  Customize your favourite Serendipity bags by choosing among a variety of leather, lining and metal colours. Make your bag unique!    We only use high-quality Italian leather, hardware and accessories. All of our bags are handcrafted by artisans with a devotion to details.  As an online store with no physical presence, no middlemen and no upfront stock we don't charge high margins on our bags and bargain hard with suppliers to bring you the best, for less.

Write your initials, a short phrase or special date (or all of these!). We will engrave them on a high-quality metal plate made of Gold or Silver brass. Making it also a handy addition to your bag, the empty side of the plate can be used as a mirror.

The plate is detachable, but you can keep it in its leather frame located inside the bag and keep it safe from possible scratches. Once you purchase one of the Serendipity bags, email us simply telling what would you like us to write on the plate. If you decide not to go for this option, we will use our signature made-in-Italy Serendipity bags brass plate instead.
THE PLATE CAN BE INSERTED IN ALL BAGS

Simple in spirit but elegant in design, the Serendipity Tote bag is an essential addition to every outfit. You can change its shape and transform it in a shoulder bag using two hidden magnets on the top sides of the bag.

Featuring details such as raw-edged construction and the signature Serendipity's Lock, the Serendipity Handbag is the ideal day-to-evening bag. The handbag has double handles for ease of carrying and removable shoulder strap to wear it on your shoulders.

With its compact yet fashionable shape, the Serendipity Crossbody is the essential go-anywhere bag. It’s surprisingly spacious and the adjustable shoulder strap makes it ideal for both evenings and weekend outings.

Compact, versatile and very trendy. The Serendipity Pochette can be worn on its shoulder strap or hand-carried for a trendier look. You can use it as a standalone bag or match it with a bigger one. The spacious interior and gussets mean easy access to all your essentials.
ONLY AVAILABLE IN THE BUNDLES SHOWN BELOW
The Serendipity Cardholder is a slick way to keep your essentials in check. With its compact style, it Is kitted with four slots and a central compartment where you can place your customizable plate.

COMBO SERENDIPITY#1INDIEGOGO PRICE 430 | SAVE €468 ON RETAIL PRICECOMBO SERENDIPITY#2INDIEGOGO PRICE €415 | SAVE €465 ON RETAIL PRICECOMBO SERENDIPITY#3INDIEGOGO PRICE €400 | SAVE €450 ON RETAIL PRICEFOR BULK ORDERS, PLEASE CONTACT US AT:INFO@SERENDIPITY-BAGS.COM  All of our bag use ""full-grain"" Italian leather. This is the highest quality leather for a bag. “Full-grain” means that the leather surface has not been treated to remove imperfections, which is what happens with lower quality leather cuts such as “top-grain leather”. ""Full-grain"" leather will give your bag a beautiful natural look and make it last for much longer. That's why bags that use “full-grain” Italian leather are usually priced from around a thousand $ and up! Our hardware components are made of premium brass, galvanised of 0.20% pure gold or palladium. This type of hardware is known for its beautiful shades and durability, giving our bags a luxury touch immediately distinguishable from cheap generic 'gold-tone hardware"" used by many top brands selling at this price tag.

The interiors are made with 100% Italian cotton lining and include a custom-made brass plate and leather pockets to carry your whereabouts. Our cotton lining has a soft natural touch and comes in colours that can be mixed and matched with those of the leather and hardware.

Our names are Leonardo and Filippo and we are the co-founders of Serendipity bags. We both grew up in Florence, Italy, the birthplace of Italian fashion, and moved to London, UK, some years ago. We started the company in 2017 with the ""simple"" plan of bringing fashion back to its origins, but with a modern and more sustainable twist.  We're united by our desire to bring what we believe the true 'made-in-Italy' should be: best in the world design customised to your specifications, finest materials and handcraft, all for a reasonable price.
IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO GET IN TOUCH, JUST DROP US A MESSAGE AT:

In a continuation of the centuries' old Florentine tradition of leather processing, Tommaso founded his leather business in the early seventies. Over the years, it gradually became a point of excellence for leather production in Italy, collaborating with some of the most prestigious Italian and foreign fashion brands. We're his smallest client by a huge margin, but not the least loved!

It took us multiple trials and errors before we settled with the current production. We weren't just looking for reliability, but also great quality and attention to details. Located in the capital of Renaissance, Florence, Italy, our handbag Factory has been hand-crafting bags with time-honoured techniques for over 40 years.

We strongly support local generational artisans and the extraordinary tradition of Florentine craftsmen. Their love for fine quality leather and ardent passion for handmade workmanship inspires us, while at the same time makes sure that your bag will be crafted with the greatest attention to details and care.
Q: How can I customise my internal brass plate?
A: This is how you do it:
1. Select a pledge that includes the customisable metal plate (for the handbag, tote, crossbody, and pochette is included).
2. After the campaign is over, we’ll send you a survey asking you what you’d like us to engrave on the plate. That’s it!
Q: What is the difference between the leather you use and the leather used by most other brands?

A: We use ""full-grain"" Italian leather, which is the best quality leather for a bag. Many other brands use “top-grain” or even inferior types of leather, which are treated to hide imperfections, and don’t last for long.
Q: How do I order the bags?

A: The only way to get one is through our Indiegogo page here! People who back the project get to have their very own Serendipity bags earlier and save up to €180 over the future retail prices. Here is how it works:
1. You have to pledge for a reward you want.
2. To pledge for a reward click the ""Back this project"" button on the right side of the project page.

3. Select the rewards you want in return for your pledge. You can pick the bag that you want, and the colour, lining and metal details. Select the country you want it shipped to and finish the pledge. That’s it!
4. Write us at info@serendipity-bags.com what you’d like to write on your customizable brass plate.
Q: Can I change my pledge afterwards?
Just write us at info@serendipity-bags.com with what you’d like to change and we’ll take care of it.
Q: I want a combination that is not on offer. How can I get it?
A: We already have some combos on offer but, if you have in mind a different combination, just write us at info@serendipity-bags.com and we’ll make your dreams come true!
Q: Can I add something else to my pledge.
If you drop us an email at info@serendipity-bags.com with what you’d like to add, we’ll try to do it for you.
Q: Where do I specify you my address?
A: We'll send you a survey after the end of the campaign to collect your shipping address.
Q: I want a large quantity of bags, can you provide us with any discounts?
A: Of course, we will! Just shoot us a message with the following details and we will get back to you on our discounted pricing and details on how to pledge:
1. What bags do you want to order?
2. How many orders in EACH style?
3. Do you want us to ship all them to the same address?
Q: I want to gift the bag, how can I do so?
A: It’s very easy! After you order one of our bags, we’ll send you a survey (it will get to you at the end of the campaign). Just mark it as a gift and we will gift wrap it for you free!
Q: Will the bag be available in additional colours?
A: It might be possible to have other colours. After all, we don’t say we make custom-made bags for nothing! Drop us a message with what you have in mind and we’ll try our best to accommodate it!
Q: Where do you ship to?
A: We ship to all countries that are open for e-commerce!
Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside an EU country you may be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.",133.0,0,"1 Campaign
Avri-Day, with the same pronunciation as ‘Everyday’, is inspired to provide every backpack user a safety protection of their belongings all day long.
At the same time, your daily style is taken care with versatile, modern, and casual design of our backpack, making it good-to-go with your everyday outfit.

We offer Traverse in timeless tones which is inspired from the sea breeze to create a long lasting look that durable for years. The logo position will be vote by contributors in the survey after the campaign.

We offered free shipments to world wide. The fund not only goes to the production, it also helps to cover the airshipments fees to worldwide. As more fund we got, we will use the fund to prepare more goodies to all the contributors who make us happen!

Good protection should be affordable, we want you to spend the least for the security of your belongings. It’s our responsibility in sourcing the most quality material from around the world to bring you the affordable backpack that can save your belongings from unwanted tragedy.
The image below is our sample testing on the fabric.

We never stop in research and development only to bring you the best security you deserved. Each design of the backpack is prototyped and tested to ensure the ergonomic usage while accessing to each compartment.

We care a lot about your belongings, but we never ignore our role in producing ethically in this community. We ensure the production is involved with legal labour right, at the meantime manufacturing with respect and responsibility to the nature and environment.
Avriday is an individual student project launched by Raffles’s graduate
column2: Low Fang Yi. Fang Yi is a Year 3 Bachelor’s Degree student majoring in Fashion Marketing and Management. In order to accomplish her studies, she is tasked to launch a real-life business concerning a protection backpack with lifestyle. From research design to sample testing and deal with every manufacturer, Fang Yi has worked with different professionals for sake of bringing together a top quality, affordable, ethical and sustainable product

column1: We will work on our best to prevent any additional expenses for every backer. However, any GST, VAT or applicable duties from any country are the sole responsibility of the backer, we are truly sorry we are not taking this responsibility. Also, we have no rights to control over any additional charges, GST or VAT that may or may not be charged in your country.

If your perk has stuck in customs and you are not sure whether you will be charged, please get in touch with your local post office for more information. If you required to pay additional duties, you will receive a notice from your local customs authorities asking for an extra payment. When the payment is complete, your perk will be further process to be delivered to your hand.
Please note that our prices are not stated with GST, VAT or taxes from backer’s country. Unfortunately, we are not allowed to mark orders as gift because this is an illegal act.

Our perks will be dispatched from China. If you are wondering the items will be charging in your country or not. you may reference the website below. Please note that this website is a tax calculation references for most of the country, so we couldn’t give an actual charge and affirm what is mentioned on the website.

Clarification shall be made to you that this is an individual student project under the supervision of Raffles College of Higher Education at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Our team has been spending months on the preparation and manufacturing of AVRI-Day backpacks, for which our team has possessed full functioning samples of the backpacks. We are in close contact with the factory and they are well prepared for the production when this project is being fully funded. Our Quality Assurance (QA) team is in place to check each product shipment personally to ensure all backpacks are received by backers without any defaults. We are currently having a good margin in delivery times, hence hoping to deliver all the backpacks even before the deadline mentioned earlier. If you would like to inquire regarding this project, kindly contact with our customer support team, we will reply to you as soon as we can.
If you think this product is cool.
Please use your energy to help us voice out on your social network! A HUGE thank you from us being patience to understand the campaign!

About

We have been in the watch trading business for the past 2 years. Through the engagement with our customers, we understand that there is a great demand for well designed, high quality watch at affordable price. We have been conceptualizing the design since November 2014 and went ahead with a prototype product in May 2015. We love what we see and here we are, bringing you the Andrei Wois.

We aspire to deliver quality time keeping pieces through the careful selection of top quality materials during the manufacturing process. Our founder edition of watches bestow wearers with an air of overwhelming confidence. 

The Movement

Time is our constant companion. Even the most extravagant watch needs a reliable movement to keep it in regular motion. Switzerland has earned itself an enviable reputation as a manufacturer of the finest watch movements. That is why we incorporate Swiss Ronda movements into the heart of our watches. Ronda is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of precision electronic watch movements with innovative design.

Our Design

With the love of simplicity in life, our design is based on modern minimalist style. We scrutinize every detail during design process to bring out the bold and classic element within. The brushed steel watch case with deliberate reflective rim bezel is an exciting combination when appreciating the watch from different angle. We have hence put together four founding models for your collections.

A watch truly for all occasions.

Key Features
Founders Edition (Perks)
Strap: 24mm Premium thick genuine leather, black or

Battery Life: 5 Years

What You Will Get (Perks)

By supporting the project, each purchase of watch comes with premium genuine leather watch strap and a handmade dark brown genuine raw leather pouch. These watch pouches are hand cut, sew, and put together by our experience leather artisan.

Timeline


Stretch Goal

Unlock stretch goal 22 000 USD, we will upgrade the watch glass to domed shape sapphire glass. 

Unlock stretch goal 32 000 USD, every watch purchase will be given a free interchangeable premium leather zulu strap.

decisions causing the project to be delayed or halted all together.
minimized these risks by funding a prototype production run of our product to
ensure that all design elements are finalized and the manufacturer is

Contact Us
Drop us an email at AndreiWois@gmail.com should you need any further clarification. We will try to respond to your email by 48 hours.
Thank you for all the kind support.

San Francisco 49er’s Quarterback Alex Smith has been exceptional this year in his first two games under center. But that’s not the only thing he’s done to support the San Francisco sports community. In post-game interviews, he’s been wearing a SF Giants baseball cap to show his support for our local boys of summer, who are having quite a year of their own.

Apparently, this hasn’t sat well with the NFL, as he’s been threatened with a fine of $15,000 if he continues to wear that hat. As fans of Bay Area sports, we say that isn’t right. We’re raising $15,000 to be donated to the Alex Smith Foundation that supports foster teens in preparing for adulthood. This donation would offset the ridiculous fine and turn it into a major win for a worthy cause.

It’s a great time to be a sports fan in the Bay Area. Let’s back Alex, who is not only a great 49er but also an unwavering Giants fan to boot. If we all pitch in together, we can support this great cause and increase solidarity among hometown fans in the greatest sports community in the world. Your donation sends the message, “Come on Alex. Wear that hat.”

After 2 Kickstarter projects and 1 successful Indiegogo, and over 200 designs sold, we’re back to spread our newest Villoni Würfel Watch Collection on Indiegogo.

This Watch Collection is our classic and introduction design to our lifestyle brand. Not only that, a portion of every pledge will go to support the artists collaborating with us. Join us in our mission to put beautiful art on every wrist!
Villoni Würfel Watch Collection for him and her. These watches are simple in style, aesthetic in look and incredibly durable for everyday wear, yet maintaining a sense of personality.
This Indiegogo campaign is live for only a limited time, it ends 10 September 2018!
Every watch strap has quick release pins. You can swap out colors you like according to your outfit style or occasion.
These unique timepieces does not only tell time, but adds a bit of style to your look. It's so simple you can stack different bracelets to dress it up.
These trendy and stylish timepieces gives you the option to change straps according to your style and fashion taste.
This Watch Collection are made with  high-quality material lasting you a long time. This simple design and size of these unique timepieces are extremely versatile.
Inspired by the modern social lifestyle these Villoni Würfel Classic Watches has its own unique look. With its changeable straps it is easy to mix and match with your fashion style.
• BLACK or BROWN LEATHER ITALIAN STRAPS •
Trendy style for the hipster. I believe a stylish timepiece should be aesthetic, durable and will be with you wherever you go.

We created the dial to be clutter-free with clean lines. This design is inspired by the city and cosmopolitan lifestyle, having an exciting and glamorous character associated with travel and the simplicity of life.

We've used the highest-quality material for durability and long lasting use. It taken over 15 months to find the best manufacturer with testing material, prototypes and inspections to finalize the quality.
Not only are these hand-made with absolute precision, it's quality is backed up with a 12 month warranty!
Inspired by Villoni's grandmother who gave her her very first watch when she was 9 years old, from that point she was fascinated by different timepiece designs & watch movements.
Her grandmother had a zest for life & traveled all over the world with one watch with three dials, showing their independent timezones.

Villoni's love and connection to her grandmother inspired her to embark on creating her own Watch Collection with varieties of Limited Edition Watch designs. There'll be limited quantities for each design and colors she creates to her collections.

column20:
Feminine fashion.

DESIGN

A pencilskirt is the musthave for every woman who wants to look feminine and elegant!
column27:
>A pencil skirt is meant to emphasize your femininity in a classy way. Even if you don’t have the feminine curves, this pencilskirt will optically show your right curves. The pencilskirt is very suitable for women with a glasshour, pear or a rectangle figure.

Show your femininity in a classy way like Audrey Hepburn did!

COLOR COMBINATIONS
column41:
/>

GREAT FIT

For a great fit the pattern is very important. We work with a pattern maker who is an expert in making patterns with a good fit. She has worked for companies like ZARA, MANGO and other feminine fashion brands. With her expertise we have a beautiful fit for you in standard sizes.
column47:
>ORGANIC COTTON

We love ecological fabrics! Why? Because it’s healthy for you, the environment and the farmers.

For the two-in-one pencilskirts we only work with organic cotton with a GOTS certification.

This means you are sure you have real organic cotton and that the fabrics are dyed with low impact dyes.
column50: >We have two kinds of fabrics derived from woodpulp, the linen kind and the silk kind. Because of the fruit pomegranate the fabric is available in Majith Red and Anar Green (raw pomegranate).
column51: >This traditional dyeing method is in possession of the GOTS certificate.
column56:
/>


WOODPULP LINEN BLOUSE

The woodpulp linen blouse is currently in the sketch  fase. The fabric is a little bit thicker than the silk fabric and has a subtle glance. The blouse has natural shell buttons in the color pearl. Also available in both colors: Anar Green and Majith Red.
column63: />
column67:
/>

Our production facility is based in Eastern-Europe and is compliant with the EU and international labor standards.

Thank you SO much for YOUR support! With each item we realise a more eco and social friendly fashion world. We can do this together!

What is organic cotton?

With Organic cotton the cottonfarmers don't use any chemicals and pesticides. So you won't have any harmful chemicals in your clothes. Healthy for your skin and healthy for the cottonfarmers.

The certification criteria are in line with GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standards). Which is recognised all over the world by all certifying bodies and cultivation associations that work with a textile certification programme.

""The Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) was developed through collaboration by leading standard setters with the aim of defining requirements that are recognised world-wide and that ensure the organic status of textiles from harvesting of the raw materials through environmentally and socially responsible manufacturing all the way to labelling in order to provide credible assurance to the consumer.""

WOODPULP FABRIC

Woodsilk is made of Bemberg cupro fiber to finish from Japan. It has a subtle luster, drapes beautifully and is extremely breathable. Clean the blouse at a non-toxic dry cleaner or hang the blouse in the fresh air.
column71:
/>

Herbal dying is one of the core businesses of our supplier in India (Herbal Fab).

What is the difference between the woodpulp linen and silk? 

The linen fabric has a more subtile glance. The woodsilk exactly looks like conventional silk but is eco-friendly. Both of the fabrics are very suitable for spring and summer because of the light fabric.

Where does the fabrics come from? 

The organic cotton is woven, dyed and printed in India and distributed from Germany. This organic cotton has a GOTS certificate. 

The woodpulp fabrics come from India and are traditionally dyed with the pomegranate fruit in India. For this herbal dye method our supplier has the GOTS certificate.
column72:
>What about the costs for shipping abroad?

The shipping costs are for free within the Netherlands. For other destinations we have to charge transportation costs. Other EU countries EUR 5 and EUR 10 for countries outside the EU.

What is the delivery term?

Within 2 months after the ending of the campaign.

What if the skirt doesn't fit? 

We understand that choosing the right size can be difficult and we will do our best to exchange every pencilskirt or blouse that you send back to us for another size. Because our margins are really tight we will have to charge you for the extra shipping costs. We don't refund for this crowdfunding campaign.

Durable fashion tips

See our blog: http://www.store-shekila.com/blog-durable-fashion-tips/blog-durable-fashion-tips/

Please get in touch with us. We would love to hear your feedback.

My wife and I created the Plex™ - Wallet for people on the ""Go""!

We wanted to offer an honest design that would challenge the traditional ideas of what a wallet can be... that is able to carry all types of great stuff... while easily fitting in your pocket, purse, in a compartment or other place.
Plex™ is great as a primary wallet, for specific occassions or for storing all those extra cards in one place (grocery discount cards, incentive cards and such).
The Plex™ - Wallet aims for greater versatility, transportability and function.  It's very durable, easy-to-use and a cinch to clean!

column3: by Browse to Save"">sheet plexiglass by a local plastics company based here in Kansas City, Missouri and includes an O'ring band that we source from a local supplier.

column1: The plexiglass (acrylic) is light-weight, strong yet slightly flexible which lets it ride unnoticeable in the pocket. The O'ring is industrial grade (won't wear out) and ideal for engaging the sharp edges of credit cards, licenses and other items.

The O'ring stretches up to 400 percent of its original size without rupture (while still retaining strong elastic properties). This allows Plex™ - Wallet to hold a large capacity of items at onetime safe and securely.
• Plexiglass Colors: red / white / black / clear frosted / pink

","The Story of Plex™ - Wallet?

column1: My wife and I created the Plex™ - Wallet for people on the ""Go""!

We wanted to offer an honest design that would challenge the traditional ideas of what a wallet can be... that is able to carry all types of great stuff... while easily fitting in your pocket, purse, in a compartment or other place.
Plex™ is great as a primary wallet, for specific occassions or for storing all those extra cards in one place (grocery discount cards, incentive cards and such).
The Plex™ - Wallet aims for greater versatility, transportability and function.  It's very durable, easy-to-use and a cinch to clean!
What would you put in Plex™???
Plex™ - Wallet is great for the following:
Recreational Activities (camping, fishing, hiking, skiing, boating, biking, swimming & running)

Plex™ - Wallet is made in the USA. It's CNC machined from sheet plexiglass by a local plastics company based here in Kansas City, Missouri and includes an O'ring band that we source from a local supplier.

The plexiglass (acrylic) is light-weight, strong yet slightly flexible which lets it ride unnoticeable in the pocket. The O'ring is industrial grade (won't wear out) and ideal for engaging the sharp edges of credit cards, licenses and other items.

The O'ring stretches up to 400 percent of its original size without rupture (while still retaining strong elastic properties). This allows Plex™ - Wallet to hold a large capacity of items at onetime safe and securely.
Plexiglass Colors: red / white / black / clear frosted / pink

Let's face it... tool-up, programming and paying for all the things that are required to put an idea into motion require money. With your backing, we can transcend from the drawing board into reality.
Plex™ - Wallet (red, white, black, clear frosted & pink) $60.00 / SHIPPING INCLUDED!!!",5.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column7:
>


Rolling Suitcase for Academic Presenters

Coscase is a special rolling suitcase for researchers that’s also great for business use.

With this suitcase, you can easily carry a long poster case, a tripod and other big stuffs for your presentation in a conference.
column9: >The suitcase can be used as an optional table.
column11: >Here are some of the features built into coscase:

column1: • Storage for poster case, umbrella, tripods or other long stuffs

column3: >Easy to open and close without laying down the suitcase

column1: • Narrow profile with versatile zip out expandability
• 4 wheels (2 rear wheels have locking brakes)

column2: >Accessory table can be attached to the suitcase handle
>Dedicated extra extension pocket for wide cosplay weapons

column1: • Main pocket of the case has mesh pockets inside

column6:
>Function


Umbrella or long items are inserted into an external pocket at the bottom of the coscase and a detachable belt is used to secure the items to the case. This keeps your items secure even when rolling over uneven surfaces.


An extra extension pocket can be attached to the external pocket. 


You can insert bigger items such as a bunch of umbrellas or tripods.

This extra extension is optional for higher rank perks.


The coscase can be easily opened/closed while on the move. A system of inner belts prevents the coscase from fully opening while moving. The cocase has 4 mesh compartments inside.


The coscase is narrow enough to fit between the seats on a bus. You can enlarge the coscase by simply unzipping the expandable section.


The Coscase has 4 wheels. The back 2 wheels have locking wheels.


Coscase includes a plate which can be placed on the top of it. With this plate, you can use Coscase as an optional table.



The large external pocket has a small pocket for business cards etc.


The coscase is made from water resistant material. A rain cover is included with coscase too. The rain cover doesn’t interfere with the ability to secure long items to coscase. This cover is optional for higher rank perks.


It is easy to carry larger items with the coscase. It’s also easy to access while on the move to get items out of the case. Coscase has TSA locks so its great for going through security.


Color Options

You can choose the color of the front face among black, cyan and purple. 

You can also choose the color of the rubber straps that are attached to the side and back of the case. Please select 1 or 2 colors from the list below.

column1: !!Also Suitable For Cosplayers!!
column3:
>

Originally, coscase is designed for cosplayers. When a cosplayer’s tweet about the type of luggage they needed was retweeted by other cosplayers we were motivated to design a rolling suitcase that met their needs.

http://frentrep.com/coscase/
column4: >There are some features special for cosplay.
column5:
/>

An accessory board can be attached to the coscase’s handle. This provides a small table that is stable enough to put a mirror on.
column6: >This product is maybe the world's first suitcase designed for cosplayers! We have been discussing with many cosplayers seeking for the best suitcase.
column10:
>TSA lock : Yes

* This specification is based on working sample before mass-production. There is possibility that final specifications are a little different from the ones above.


Coscase Production

The versatile coscase has been developed in cooperation with T&
column11:
S, a manufacturer of high quality rolling suitcases for many years.

http://www.tands-luggage.jp/index.shtml
column12:
>(in Japanese)

Coscase prototypes were designed and improved using feedback from cosplayers. Coscase is ready for production and the expected shipping date will be around July 2014. If the number of orders for coscase is not high enough we won’t be able to discount the price.


We Need Your Help!

In order to get the price for coscase (with a set of rubber straps) down to $150 we need your support on Indiegogo. Shipping fee is $70 or $110 for almost all over the world. For $60, we'll deliver the coscase by ship, and it will take about two months. For $100, we'll deliver the coscase by SAL which uses airplanes and ships and it will take about two or three weeks. In any case, it will be done by Japan Post.

SAL is available for the following countries:

[A] Australia, Algeria, Andorra, Argentina, Armenia, Austria, Azerbaijan

[B] Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belarus, Belgium, Brazil

[C] Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Croatia, Czech Republic

[D] Denmark

[E] Egypt, Estonia

[F] Finland, France

[G] Georgia, Germany, Gibraltar, Gleenland, Greece, Guam

[H] Hong Kong, Hungary

[I] Iceland, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Italy

[K] Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Kyrgyz

[L] Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg

[M] Malaysia, Malta, Marshall, Mexico, Micronesia, Midway, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro

[N] Netherlands, New Zealand, Northern Islands, Norway

[P] Pakistan, Palau, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico

[R] Republic of South Africa, Russian Federation

[S] Saint Pierre et Miquelon, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sweden, Switzerland

[T] Tajikistan, Thailand, Turkey, Turkmenistan

[U] U.S. Virgin Islands, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States of America (USA), Uzbekistan

[V] Vatican City

[W] Wake


The normal shipping fee of $60 will be refunded for orders shipped inside Japan.

!!Also Suitable For Cosplayers!!Originally, coscase is designed for cosplayers. When a cosplayer’s tweet about the type of luggage they needed was retweeted by other cosplayers we were motivated to design a rolling suitcase that met their needs.http://frentrep.com/coscase/There are some features special for cosplay.An accessory board can be attached to the coscase’s handle. This provides a small table that is stable enough to put a mirror on.This product is maybe the world's first suitcase designed for cosplayers! We have been discussing with many cosplayers seeking for the best suitcase.SpecificationExternal size: H60cm  W41cm  D24.5cmWeight: 4.4kgExterior material: water-resistant clothCaster : 4 casters with pedal stoppersTSA lock : Yes* This specification is based on working sample before mass-production. There is possibility that final specifications are a little different from the ones above.Coscase ProductionThe versatile coscase has been developed in cooperation with T&S, a manufacturer of high quality rolling suitcases for many years.http://www.tands-luggage.jp/index.shtml (in Japanese)Coscase prototypes were designed and improved using feedback from cosplayers. Coscase is ready for production and the expected shipping date will be around July 2014. If the number of orders for coscase is not high enough we won’t be able to discount the price.We Need Your Help!In order to get the price for coscase (with a set of rubber straps) down to $150 we need your support on Indiegogo. Shipping fee is $70 or $110 for almost all over the world. For $60, we'll deliver the coscase by ship, and it will take about two months. For $100, we'll deliver the coscase by SAL which uses airplanes and ships and it will take about two or three weeks. In any case, it will be done by Japan Post.SAL is available for the following countries:[A] Australia, Algeria, Andorra, Argentina, Armenia, Austria, Azerbaijan[B] Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belarus, Belgium, Brazil[C] Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Croatia, Czech Republic[D] Denmark[E] Egypt, Estonia[F] Finland, France[G] Georgia, Germany, Gibraltar, Gleenland, Greece, Guam[H] Hong Kong, Hungary[I] Iceland, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Italy[K] Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Kyrgyz[L] Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg[M] Malaysia, Malta, Marshall, Mexico, Micronesia, Midway, Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro[N] Netherlands, New Zealand, Northern Islands, Norway[P] Pakistan, Palau, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico[R] Republic of South Africa, Russian Federation[S] Saint Pierre et Miquelon, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sweden, Switzerland[T] Tajikistan, Thailand, Turkey, Turkmenistan[U] U.S. Virgin Islands, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States of America (USA), Uzbekistan[V] Vatican City[W] WakeThe normal shipping fee of $60 will be refunded for orders shipped inside Japan.",18.0,0,"1 Campaign
After working in the retail sunglass industry, we here at Calero Sunglasses decided to make some changes.
Quality Sunglasses: Expensive, Stylish, long lasting, quality materials, made in Italy or U.S.A.
Cheap Sunglasses: Lacking build quality, fall apart, saves $$$, made in China

After analyzing the gap between these two catagories, we decided to take the best from both worlds. It is also very important to us to support the local economy and so each Gator will be made right here in Salt Lake City, Utah.

Frames manufactured by heat injection molding of TR90 Grilamid Nylon, a durable material that provides comfort and the perfect flex pattern to sit on your head without squeezing your brains out! Made in U.S.A.
Just an example of the flex possible with TR90 Grilamid frames, that's a 90 degree bend without snapping!

Polarized Lenses:  The Gator's lenses are made from impact and scratch resistant polycarbonate that offers durability and style. The polarized lenses take out glare which restores image quality and protects your eyes! They block 100% of UVA, UVB, and UVC rays.

SnapLock Hinges have been designed to snap out under pressure instead of breaking. This results in sunglasses that won't be destroyed if you happen to leave them in your car seat and sit on them! The easily removable hinge design also means you can switch the temples on any Calero Gator and create a color way that is one-of-a-kind!
We have designed sunglasses that are every bit as comfortable and durable as glasses in the hundred dollar range for a fraction of the price and we are excited to share the results!

Prototypes are essential in designing any product. As you can see in the images below, our design was greatly improved by having the first couple prototypes 3D printed locally to ensure every dimension was perfect.

We have been in contact with local manufacturers and have everything lined up to press the big red button and begin production. We need Indiegogo's help to fund our initial batch and get these shades on the faces of the masses! Please help fund our project and I guarantee you'll get something back you won't believe only cost $30!

Hi!

I’m Stacey, the founder of Noir Rose Lingerie. I started Noir Rose Lingerie as I have been passionate for lingerie since I was 17, and I have been sewing  at home  since I was 6. The older I have gotten, the more I struggled to find a bra that fits me in the shops and something that is attractive to wear. Plus, with my own personal extensive collection, I’ve gotten to the point where I am now designing new pieces that I would not find in the shops.

Having discussed this with my social media followers (who I have gained through my bridal hair, make up and henna work) and clients, I realised there is a big market for bespoke as a lot of women would love to purchase something that they can have a creative input in and fits perfectly. BUT they want to see real female bodies advertising the range. 

My aim is to create and build on a brand that is affordable luxury, ethically produced, good values that are based on traditional couture designs, that is advertised on real bodies that show cellulite, stretch marks and changes of the female form.  Most companies use airbrushed images but I want to show my range on real bodies to empower the everyday-woman-on-the-go looking at this. 

Why bespoke, made to measure?

From recent studies, 87% of women are currently wearing the wrong size bra, and majority of those women do not get measured on a regular basis, as most high street shops do not offer bra fittings. A lot of these shops offer a standard range of sizes and do not cater for curvaceous or those who have petite backs and a large bust.

Noir Rose Lingerie is aimed at women who are busy, who want something comfortable to wear and aesthetically pleasing. Whether you are a young mum or a fashionable mature women, I cater for everyone with boobs and those who have undergone a mastectomy. The aim is to ensure women are wearing a product that doesn’t restrict their movement and daily activities.

By offering bespoke bras, we can eliminate these long-term health issues that ill-fitting bras are causing.

Bra fitting is a technical process using mathematical formulas. A shop sizing guides indicates you should measure under bust and full bust and then refer to the guide. For made to measure, at least 15 measurements are taken to ensure the bra and bottoms fit well.

Besides the personal interest in bespoke, commercially, it is more cost efficient way of doing business. We are only making garments that are paid for, we offer 1 free alteration. We are not producing or holding stock based on standard sizing that may result into having the price reduced in order to get rid of it. We are not wasting materials on unwanted products either. Therefore, I do not have the same overheads as a store or a large company that needs a warehouse.

Helping the World

I want Noir Rose Lingerie to be environment friendly and to be able to help others.

The fashion industry is known to produce a lot of material waste. In order to avoid this, I have been purchasing and will continue to do, a limited amount of fabrics. For the swimwear range, I have been using Econyl, which is a material made from plastics found in the sea. Even the packaging is going to be recyclable.

In regards to helping others, proceeds from the “Stacey” set will always go to Rape Crisis charity to help those who have been abused. Whilst most lingerie companies support breast related charities, I will be supporting those helping rape victims. It takes a lot of confidence and courage to wear lingerie that is deemed sexy. If I can help someone and help them gain their confidence back, it would mean a lot.

As I am producing the lingerie in the UK, I want to maintain British manufacturing standards, and be able to train the next generation in lingerie making and design skills, which have declined dramatically in the last 60 years. I also aim to open up summer pop up shops with lingerie ranges on show and ready made swimwear for instant sale
column2:
ideally at train stations if possible or in popular work areas around London and Birmingham. If this works well then I will consider opening a shop in those areas, creating jobs for locals.

If we expand globally, I will strongly consider opening local operational bases where there is demand. Within this in mind, the future possibilities are endless.

Also as the packaging, stickers, hang labels and garment care labels are all produced in the UK, I am ensuring our carbon footprint is low as possible.

Zero Waste Fabric

When producing any garment, there is always excess material that tends to go to waste. My aim is to have zero waste by using cut offs for stuffing for other products and donating it to those who need stuffing for children toys.

How you can help?

To kick start this venture, I set up an Etsy shop however, in order to reach more people, I aim to reach more women and clients by showcasing the lingerie range and what is on offer by attending wedding exhibitions, swimwear exhibitions and shows such as Paris Interfiliere and Miami Swimwear week.

To prepare for this, the samples for next collection need to be made, this involves designing, pattern making, sourcing new fabrics and making the garments. Then the garments need to be photographed, showcased on social media, our website and look books for the exhibitions to promote to the media and public.

As you can see we have so much to do and we really need your help. Your donations will be used for the following:

£3000 Exhibition Fees (Weddings UK / Paris / Miami)

£1000 Fabrics and hardware for garments for next range

£500 Showcase materials and crowdfunding fees

£400 Printed Advertising Materials – Media supplies, Press &
column3:
Sales Kits

£1200 Photoshoot for the new range

£1000 Website update

I am so excited to share this project with the crowdfunding community! I cannot wait to move forward with our brand and show you all the results!

 

Why invest me? As well as the brand and idea itself?

If I manage to exceed my target expectations, then I will be able to

column1: • hire to some freelancers on a part time basis
• purchasing industrial sewing machines for longer and maximum use
• to be able to exhibit at more shows

Risks and challenges

The challenges I am currently facing are lack of funding and timing. I was recently made redundant and with Brexit, work has been slow and therefore my self-funding slowed down too.  The second challenge is time. As we are approaching wedding season and mid-year industry exhibitions, I need to ensure the range is ready to showcase. I am currently temping full time and working on this in my spare time.

I have invested not only my own money but countless days and nights to craft the current range and work on all the admin side of this business too.

I have planned out everything to ensure that all goals and targets are met, as I am highly motived and driven to succeed. I have been a PA and EA for 13 years, therefore I feel like my skills and experience will also help here.

I am adamant on keeping costs down and sourcing people and materials in the UK and Europe, when needed. This allows me to monitor quality, time and ensure there is less delays.

Fortunately, I am lucky to have a team of people who have a variety of skills and work experience that can help me.

If I am unable to secure funding, then I will not be able to attend these exhibitions this year, production will be delayed to when I can afford to do this all and I will not be able to hire other freelancers to assist in the various stages of making this all happen. I know this may be too much information but I want to be open and honest with my funders as I value your kind support.

Even if you are unable to help, I would be grateful if you could share this with your friends family and anyone you know, even on social media.  

If you have any questions about the campaign or my brand, I will be happy to answer them, please email or leave comments and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

Why invest me? As well as the brand and idea itself?

I feel that this is important to share part of my backstory because not only are you donating your money to my idea but you are also putting faith into me, to deliver results.

I am someone who has worked since the age of 16, whilst studying for my GCSEs, ALevels and even during my few years at university. Whilst I never had the opportunity to graduate, I have always ensured I pushed myself career wise, starting as junior PA to EA then private PA and head of operations (for one company).

Whilst working, I also learned, set up my own little side business doing bridal henna, hair and make up, my own PR, marketing, getting qualified to teach so I could share my skills with others and have my own small team.

I did this around my full time job. This allowed me to multitask, become a fast problem solver and a workaholic!

I have been made redundant 3 times in 5 years, and during that time I have ensured my skills still earned me money to pay my bills. I even learnt how to write a book, self publish my autobiography and sell copies. This also lead me to doing talks at the Mind Body Soul exhibition in 2018.

I am a proactive, highly driven, self motivated individual who always has a glimmer of hope in the impossible times and strives to succeed no matter what or the obstacles placed in my way.

We are two

column1:
entrepreneurial friends full of enthusiasm for making  our vision a reality:

To keep growing our cool brand Back to the FOX
this point our startup needs  the best fashion marketing and sales experts. Right now this is one of the most important things we need money
we are designers and not sales geniuses we need to stay focused as
much as possible on our creations and  of course the production, so we
would like to give the best marketing professionals a free hand in doing
we have contacted over 150 fashion agencies worldwide. We have had
many Skype interviews with professionals from Tokyo to New York and
the results are superb - we are negotiating now with agencies who have
10-30 years of experience in building up small brands like ours. With
the money raised with your help here on Indiegogo we could get a contract with one of these
big names in the fashion industry so our products could find the
right way to be sold worldwide.

We are full of plans of new prototypes. That's the 2nd most important thing we need money for right now!
keep growing our brand' means for
us to keep searching for the best sources and inspirations.

Our vision is to make excellent quality, eternal fashion, using all the raw materials with  full consciousness and respect. Putting together the best 'puzzle-pieces' and unite them into sophisticated products you will love to wear for many seasons.


-and of course the

FOXes :)

FOXes are our labour of love.

From every purchase we donate
$5 for WWF-Canada's 'Rescue the arctic FOXes' program to help this beautiful,
clever and mystical creature staying happy in the global warming times like ours!
did our homework on how to start mass production.
have identified and locked on the best
people around with 30-40 years of experience in the field of production. These are

local specialists, who have a great passion for their profession. We have made successful test runs with them, so we are eager to keep these great people busy.

The fabrics we use are from local warehouses, easy to access in big amounts, so a quick production time is guaranteed.
Slight variances in the color tones might be possible but we'll inform you in that case before the production.
After the Indiegogo campaign has finished we are ready to ship your jacket within 4-6 weeks!
(we are trying to make the production time even shorter, so there is a chance you get the jacket earlier then promised :))

happens after you contribute?

We will collect your order information: size, color,wrist message, shipping details.

After our Indiegogo campaign is finished, we start production right away. As soon as your jacket is ready, we'll ship it to you.
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the
jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your
jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll
have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and
offering our jackets at highly discounted prices on Indiegogo, we
won’t be able to accept returns

local specialists, who have a great passion for their profession. We have made successful test runs with them, so we are eager to keep these great people busy.The fabrics we use are from local warehouses, easy to access in big amounts, so a quick production time is guaranteed. Slight variances in the color tones might be possible but we'll inform you in that case before the production.After the Indiegogo campaign has finished we are ready to ship your jacket within 4-6 weeks!(we are trying to make the production time even shorter, so there is a chance you get the jacket earlier then promised :))

happens after you contribute? We will collect your order information: size, color,wrist message, shipping details. After our Indiegogo campaign is finished, we start production right away. As soon as your jacket is ready, we'll ship it to you.

jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your

Hello, my name is Karri. I am just a normal person with a goal to help my community and eventually many other communities in keeping creativity and charity alive. By creating heART Designs, I am hoping to support many different causes and still bring unique designs to the world. My artist will be creating a variety of designs that will pertain to each cause that they support. Our main design, the heART will go to supporting art programs and events, including skill building workshops for school aged kids to attend. With schools cutting back on art programs and access to studio hours after school, I want to bring that opportunity back into the community. Creativity can help a kid in more ways than we could ever imagine. Having access to studio hours outside of class and being able to go to workshops and classes through my art teacher, I was able to get through a lot of difficult times and able to express my emotions in a very productive manner. I just want every kid to have that opportunity to work through their emotions and express themselves. Other causes will include causes that are also dear to me, yet supported and dear to the community as well. We will have a hive themed heART that a percentage of sales will be donated to saving the bees. There will be a paw print design that will support local shelters and rescues, with the hopes of supporting in a wider capacity. Other causes will be added over time with demand and design ideas.

To begin we need funding for the machines (screen printing, embroidery) that will help us print or embroider the designs on products. We will also need said products, such as: t-shirts, sweatshirts, bags, hats, stickers, and more. Funds will also go to supporting shipping operations and marketing for the brand. For all of this we are asking for $5,000. This will assure that we can produce quality products for consumers to purchase, and raise sizable amounts for each cause.

If you support our cause, you will have priority ordering, meaning we will produce any product you order before the general public, you will also receive a free product based on the size of your contribution.
If full funds are not raised, I will use what I can to start producing as best I can, the funds will not be used for anything outside of this project.

Our challenges are going to stem from how small our operation is. Production times might take longer than expected just because we do not have a lot of man power. Another challenge will be the time it will take to build up the brand and sell the products, it is never guaranteed that it will take off right away.
Risks are that people may not purchase much or the project will fail, but in order to be successful that is a risk we have to take. I hope you see the potential in this project like I do.

If you are unable to contribute monitarily, we could still use your help spreading the word! Share us on social media, share us with friends you believe would be interested in supporting us. Just help us reach more people. :)
Thank you so much for your time and support!

Hey Indiegogo! 

We are Lindsey and Josh and our company is Ginju Wallets.

We are here to launch our personalized wallet in a variety of materials, colors, and patterns.

The Story

As recent graduates from the University of California at Santa Barbara, we always searched for a trendy, unique wallet that was small enough to carry on the go. We noticed that a lot of students would carry around a rubber band that held their student Id’s, credit cards, and cash so that a bulky wallet did not take up more room in their already stuffed backpacks. With such busy schedules and so many things to constantly carry, we wanted an easily accessible and functional design that complemented and did not complicate our lifestyle.

We want to offer a thin pocket-sized wallet with enough pockets and elastic straps to hold the essential cards and cash for the day. With the Ginju Wallet you won't have to carry around those unneeded receipts, extra gift cards, and heavy coin pouches because it has the perfect amount of space for all your essentials.

Manufacturing

After we came up with the concept for Ginju ""magic wallets,"" we were faced with the extremely difficult task of finding a manufacturer that met our high expectations of quality and efficiency. We worked very closely with our manufacturer for months tediously dissecting the design, size, and style of our wallets.
column3:
/>

Pre Prototype Sketches

We feel that we have selected the perfect materials, colors, and designs to make our Ginju Wallets unique. Our manufacturer hand assembles, stamps, and prints the wallets to our exact specifications. 

Your pledge will go directly towards the printing, sewing, molding, production, and final assembly cost of the wallets that we want to order on a larger scale to meet our minimum order quantity. We have spent months selecting and improving the quality and development of this wallet based upon a variety of colors and designs. We are really excited to see which wallets are most popular and to see what suggestions you have so that we can offer even more colors and patterns.

Rewards

Ginju Wallets are offered in a few different materials. Our Black, Dark Brown, Dark Blue, and Turquoise wallets are hand crafted out of genuine leather from one of the top leather manufacturers. Lastly, our All American wallet is crafted out of PU leather and printed with a trendy American flag design.

$5 - We appreciate your support!

$14 - One wallet (1 of 4 genuine leather color options)

$17 - One American flag wallet

$24 - Two wallets (2 of 4 genuine leather color options)

$30 - Two wallets (American flag wallets)
column15:
>Options:

 Black

Dark Brown

Dark Blue

Turquoise


Specialty Options:

The All American
column23:
elastic inside bands on both sides

Thank You!

We can’t wait to share our Ginju Wallets with you!

We Need Your Support!

We are really excited to launch our first project and in order to meet our funding goals, we need your support. We are doing everything we can to introduce our new wallet to friends, family, and the social media world. If you could do something as simple as share our link on facebook, like our instagram or tweet about us, our project could go a long way! We really want to drive traffic to our page and share our product with everyone! 

Shipping Products

We will be ready to go into production if we have met our funding goal after the 45 day period! We have been and will continue to work closely with our manufacturer to ensure that everything runs smoothly. The production and shipment time will take a total of 35 days until we receive the wallets. Once we receive the wallets, we will ship them out ASAP to all of our amazing backers! If you need to make any adjustments to your shipping address or order, please use the comment section and we will make sure to get back to you!

Risks &
column24:
challenges

We have gone through several prototype revisions over the past few months refining and perfecting every aspect of our wallets from the material, to the colors and patterns, size, stitching, and printing specifications to ensure the best quality. We risk not meeting our minimum funding needs after all of the time and financial investment we have put in over the last few months. We daon’t anticipate any setbacks because we have set realistic timelines and have built a strong relationship with our manufacturer. We pledge to be upfront and honest throughout the process. We will consistently post updates on the order placements, shipping times, and deadlines.

We can’t wait to get the ball rolling on this project!

Thank you so much for your support!

-Lindsey &
column25:
Josh

>AMOLEP-IKI: 100% Cotton, manufactured in Germany
Our Story
We are living in a world of mixed cultures and communities. People feel attached to more than one country.  Either they have mixed backgrounds, were born and raised in different countries, have visited another country and feel really attached  to it, or are just simply great fans of other countries. And AMOLEP embodies this mindset.

column2: one side of the jersey represents one country and the other side represents another country. You select and design your own jersey.

column1: These are the Jerseys that can be used for the combinations (Check out our Gallery for a closer look at all the available Jerseys)

We intend to have the Kombitrix manufactured in Germany where top Quality is guaranteed because quality and the feel of our products are very important for us. Top quality has its price though and the €20,000 will mostly be used to manufacture the KTRX and Ikis.
• Over 80% of the earnings will be used for manufacturing and packaging.
• 15% of the earnings will be used to cover unforeseen costs.

The remaining 5% of the earnings and any extra money earned will be used to help fund our planned AMOLEP Beach Soccer Tournament in the summer of 2015. We also hope to use the extra money to fix up and run our website www.amolep.com

column2:

ABOUT US:
column3:
>

 

G-Tech Apparel is a high-tech apparel company that specializes in heated clothing. John Forzani founded the company while playing football for the Calgary Stampeders in the CFL. Knowing he was onto something great, John partnered with University of San Francisco alumnus, NCAA Division I golfer and childhood best friend Jesse Galvon to create G-Tech. 

We believe in delivering a quality product that outperforms our competition through research and development in conjunction with some of the worlds most elite athletes. Our first product the G-Tech Hand Warmer was initially designed for players in the CFL trying to battle Canada's harsh winters. Since then G-Tech has not only expanded into the NFL, but has also established a commanding presence in the golf industry. LPGA World #1 Lydia Ko, Ryder Cup sensation Patrick Reed, and both Team USA &
column4:
Team Europe of the 2016 Ryder Cup have all relied on G-Tech products to keep their hands warm regardless of the cold weather conditions they are playing in.

Although the Hand Warmer it is undoubtedly a useful tool for elite athletes of all sports, G-Tech's Therma-Grip heat technology is now being embedded into our brand new Hoodies! Not only can they be used for a multitude of cold weather activities such as hunting, fishing, camping, snowboarding/skiing, or productivity gains in outdoor workforces, it can also be incredibly beneficial for those who suffer from cold hand syndromes such as Raynaud’s or Arthritis. Regardless of what purpose you choose to use the G-Tech Hoddies for, you will be one click away from instant heat.
column5:
>

 

FOLLOW US:

Website: https://www.gtechapparel.com 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi_XJ8LqwykrsXtlqziba4w

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gtech_apparel/

column1: If you follow the sizing chart carefully the hoodies will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your hoodie for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our hoodies at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns.

Every G-Tech Apparel Hoodie comes with a one (1) year warranty on all of the electronic components (Battery, Charger and ""Therma-Grip"" Heating Element). The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear caused by everyday use. Our electronics, materials and technology have been tested in the most extreme conditions and we stand behind our quality control. If you have any warranty issues at all with your hoodie we will either fix it or send you a new one. Customer Service is very important to us and we are here to make sure everything is delivered to you in working order.
