Queremos solucionar estos problemas con una herramienta única: el jardín Citysens.
- Ahorra hasta un 50% en agua y nutrientes respecto al sistema tradicional
- Con un consumo eléctrico de menos de 3 euros/año (gracias a que la bomba de bajo consumo se conecta automáticamente solo 25 min al día)
- Transforma no solo el espacio pero también las ciudades, convirtiendo cada rincón, cada casa, cada oficina, en espacios más verdes y con aire más puro.
Tecnología al servicio de las personas
¿Sabías que las plantas se nutren de sales minerales que absorben de la tierra?

En la tierra, bacterias y lombrices transforman la materia orgánica en sales minerales que es el alimento de las plantas. Citysens funciona sin tierra. Así evitas suciedad y ganas comodidad.Utilizando la tecnología llamada hidroponía somos capaces de aportar las sales minerales que cada planta necesita mediante el agua de riego.

En vez de tierra, utilizamos lana de roca y huesos de melocotón. Los huesos de melocotón son un residuo de la industria del zumo que en nuestro jardines Citysens ayudan a las raíces a encontrar el agua, los nutrientes y el oxígeno que necesitan. La hidroponía tiene varias ventajas:
- Las plantas necesitan menos espacio para crecer igual
- El agua y los nutrientes pueden ser reutilizados

Citysens nació hace más de 2 años, cuando Xavi Rius montó su primer jardín vertical hidropónico de tomates en su oficina. En este tiempo, Xavi estaba terminando su tesis doctoral en nanosensores en la Universitat Rovira i Virgili de Tarragona (España).

Después de terminar la tesis doctoral, Xavi se asoció con Francisco Andrade y Par (miembros del Innovation Hub de la Universitat Rovira i Virgili) para explorar las oportunidades detrás de la relación de personas y naturaleza en las ciudades. Descubrimos que las principales barreras para disfrutar de la naturaleza en las ciudades son el tiempo, el espacio y la experiencia ... así que empezamos Citysens para solucionar eso!

Después de hablar con más de 250 personas y de iterar con 5 primeros prototipos, desarrollamos el primer jardín Citysens: un primer diseño viable de Citysens que ha tenido una excelente acogida por parte de los primeros 70 clientes. Hoy en día, estos primeros clientes son nuestros amigos ya que juntos hemos mejorado el diseño del nuevo jardín Citysens.

El equipo de Citysens ha crecido para llevar al mercado la mejor experiencia Citysens: hoy el equipo está formado por Maria Rius (Nua Arquitecturas), Blanca Serres, David Gironès, Par Blanking (Borders Crossing), Francisco Andrade (Innovation Hub) y Xavi Rius. Hemos formado equipo también con la agencia de diseño de producto Lúcid y el estudio de fotografía Pixel Moreno.

Nuestro nombre CITYSENS surgió de la esencia de nuestros valores: queremos mejorar la calidad de vida de los ciudadanos de todo el mundo a través del desarrollo de soluciones innovadoras. Trabajamos para minimizar nuestro impacto medioambiental, colaboramos con centros especiales de trabajo y con escuelas, y producimos nuestros productos en España.
Citysens es una nueva experiencia que nos permite estar en contacto con la naturaleza en la ciudad.
Necesitamos su apoyo a esta campaña de micromecenazgo para hacer Citysens viable y transformar nuestras ciudades en espacios más verdes.
Colabora con el proyecto: clica aquí para ir a las recompensas

Tu dinero es vital para hacer realidad el nuevo jardín vertical y modular Citysens. Sin tu contribución no podremos hacer frente a la gran inversión inicial necesaria para fabricar el nuevo jardín Citysens. Tus aportaciones a la campaña serán utilizadas para:
Refinar el diseño (10% del total recaudado)
Los moldes de inyección para fabricar el jardín (60%)
Costes de las herramientas de fabricación (20%)

Para productos de este tipo, como más hagamos, más barato será el costo unitario. Por otra parte, nuestros proveedores aplican cantidades mínimas de fabricación Para que esta campaña sea un éxito, necesitamos conseguir como mínimo 400 pedidos para hacer frente a la producción de Citysens con los precios propuestos.
Colabora con el proyecto: clica aquí para ir a las recompensas
Noviembre - Diciembre: hacer muchos nuevos amigos en Indiegogo
Enero: refinar el diseño y finalizar las iteraciones de prototipo
Febrero: cerrar los acuerdos de fabricación, de las partes del jardín y de otras herramientas de fabricación
Marzo: cumplir los certificados de calidad, las homologaciones de producto y validar el producto final
Mayo: empezar la producción de las piezas hechas en biopolímero
Junio: finalizar el montaje y embalaje, envío de las recompensas
Estamos muy orgullosos de nuestro equipo y de los colaboradores. Tenemos una gran experiencia en el diseño y desarrollo de nuevos productos y nuevos modelos de negocio.

Nuestro objetivo de la campaña es llegar a tus manos en las mejores condiciones y asegurar la máxima calidad del producto. Aunque tenemos experiencia en el diseño y fabricación de productos, estos son algunos riesgos a los que estamos expuestos:

FABRICACIÓN: la creación de las herramientas para la fabricación de un producto de este tamaño es caro y requiere de una expertez para evitar errores. La creación de los mejores moldes para un producto de este tamaño es de vital importancia y es aquí donde podrían producirse retrasos. Para minimizar esta posibilidad, estamos trabajando con fabricantes de utillajes con trayectoria de calidad.

AJUSTES DE PRODUCTO: en el proceso de producción del jardín Citysens, es probable que haya algunos ajustes menores con tal de mejorar el producto final. Se realizarán prototipos de preproducción para probar y refinar el producto. Todos los cambios siempre serán para beneficio de los mecenas y os informaremos puntualmente de los avances del proyecto.

CUMPLIMIENTO: a veces las cosas se ponen feas sin que se puedan planificar: un proveedor pierde una fecha límite, una máquina se rompe, o un envío se pierde. Estas cosas suceden. Para reducir al mínimo esta posibilidad, vamos a localizar y contactar con al menos un proveedor de respaldo para cada parte del proceso.

Las plantas que elegimos para el jardín Citysens son plantas de tamaño medio que no crecen muy grandes. Si alguna vez deseas cambiar una planta, puedes hacerlo fácilmente: puedes translantar cuidadosamente la planta a una maceta con tierra. Sin embargo, ten en cuenta que tendrás que regarla todos los días!
- ¿El jardín Citysens necesita ser enchufado a la corriente?

Sí, el jardín incluye una pequeña bomba conectada a un temporizador que necesita ser enchufada a la corriente. Con ello, te ahorras el riego que se te mueran las plantas constantemente. Ten en cuenta que el consumo de energía de la bomba es muy bajo, de menos de 2 €/año! Si este pequeño consumo de energía le permite disfrutar de plantas más bonitas, ¡creemos que el gasto en electricidad está bien justificado! Además, ahora hay empresas que ofrecen la electricidad de fuentes renovables, contacta con una de ellas, nosotros ya lo hemos hecho.
- ¿Puedo elegir las plantas para mi jardín Citysens?

Sí, una vez que la campaña haya terminado enviaremos un formulario a todos nuestros mecenas para que puedan elegir su familia de la plantas. Se podrá elegir entre cuatro familias de plantas: Rojo Vital, Verde Puro, Azul Plácido y Aromas Verdes. La elección se hará de acuerdo a tus gustos personales y teniendo en cuenta las necesidades de luz de cada familia de plantas. Estamos trabajando para ofrecer nuevas familias de plantas pronto.
- ¿Qué colores están disponibles para el jardín Citysens?

Igual que con las plantas, una vez que la campaña haya terminado le enviaremos un formulario a todos nuestros mecenas para que puedan elegir el color de estructura deseado. El jardín Citysens estárá disponible en blanco mate y en un marrón oscuro, siempre colores muy elegantes!
- ¿De qué están hechos los nutrientes Citysens?

Los nutrientes que utilizamos son simplemente sales minerales, que se mezclan para proporcionar el alimento óptimo que cada familia de plantas necesita. Utilizamos sales comunes, tales como nitrato de calcio o fosfato de potasio. La mezcla de sales no contiene compuestos sintéticos tales como hormonas. ¿Sabías que las plantas con flor requieren un alimento muy diferente a las hierbas aromáticas, por ejemplo? Nosotros le proporcionaremos a las plantas la mezcla exacta de alimento para cada momento.
- ¿De qué está hecho el jardín Citysens?

El jardín estará hecho con biopolímero, un material respetuoso con el medio ambiente. En el jardín Citysens, las plantas crecen en lana de roca y huesos de melocotón. El hueso de melocotón es un residuo de la industria del zumo, que nosotros reutilizamos para convertirlo en un medio ideal para que las raíces encuentren el agua y el alimento que necesitan.
- Tengo una tienda en la que quiero vender jardines Citysens ¿a quién debo contactar?
¡Genial! La campaña de micromecenazgo es un gran momento para adquirir tus jardines a un precio excelente, escríbenos a a hola@citysens.com o llámanos al +34 606197713
Colabora con el proyecto: clica aquí para ir a las recompensas",57.0,0,"1 Campaign
My name is Jana, I worked as designer in many butiques and now I would like to introduce my own collection Crazy Puppen.
For first collection I prepared 10 models. All dolls are hand-maded and they are luxury compiled. Main material is artificial leather.
Collection was introduced  in market research to several tenth of people in USA and they were accepted positively and it was loved by several people.

Currently everything is prepared, prototypes were made and photos of them you can see in galery. Now I need some funds for material and production.of them. It is scheduled for delivering of dolls like a Christmas present in December.
Every dollar counts, but also sharing of my project is highly appreciated.
You can also support us with bitcoins, please send them to email eery@email.cz

column3: >We just moved our campaign to Kickstarter:

column1: It looks really unlikely that we can reach our goal by the end of the campaign on Indiegogo and we also believe Kickstarter has a more supportive community for project like ours.
So we wanna try our luck on Kickstarter.

column2: >How about the money you already contributed?

column1: The campaign is fixed funding one, which means the money you contributed will refund back to your bank account or Paypal when the campaign is failed.
If you still want to support us, we welcome you come to our Kickstarter page :)

column9:
>We often see lots of young artist share some really awesome art works or illustrations online, the first thing comes to our mind is why not help them turn those cool arts into t-shirts and let more people can see their efforts and talents. Those designs are way better than the most common logo tees or cartoon tees on the market. 

This is the reason why we launched our online t-shirt crowdfunding community – Dlab.so in 2015. But before that, we have spent one whole year to learn how to make a high quality t-shirt and to build partnerships with reliable suppliers and manufacturers. Besides a brilliant design, we also want to bring a quality product to our customers. 

As a young startup company full of young and brave minds, we always like to try something new and different. That’s why we decide to build the first mobile t-shirt shop in China, though we are taking some unknown policy risks doing so. But we are not afraid, we are young.
column13: >And we believe the mobile shop will help us increase those artists’ publicity as we can carry their works around the city and more people will be aware of it. We want those young artists to succeed and live a decent life by doing what they love to do. If their dreams come true, our dream comes true.

column9: >We have worked long and hard collaborating with dozens of young artists and selecting awesome designs during the past few months. We also spent lots of effort helping them modify the design and make it looks more suitable on a t-shirt.

column1: We only listed 10 out of 50 designs above.
Click crowdfunding.dlab.so to check the whole design collection in larger picture for this campaign.
On that page, you can click through each design and remember to note down the design number you like when fill out the survey afterwards.

column5:
/>

The  Shirts:

We choose 100% ring-spun premium cotton as blanks to print on. It’s pre-shrunk, softy and comfy also with a slight better fit. It worth every penny you spend. 


Printing:

And due to the big design pool, we using DTG (Direct to Garment) printing technique rather than traditional silk screen printing to meet the flexible production requirement. 

Sizing:

We offer unisex crew-neck with sizes from XS to 2XL.

Suggested Size:
column13: >We will officially start to run our website
column14: >www.dlab.so
column18: >once the crowdfunding campaign is ended. We will keep improving website’s user experience for international users.

column1: Most importantly, we will continue to work with talented young artists and scout more awesome designs for you.
Want to be one of the designers? Drop us an email at ""service@dlab.so"" or submit your design at our website directly. We will help you open the biggest the t-shirt market in the world - China.

column2: >Every backer selecting t-shirt perk will receive a complimentary sticker pack and all the sticker figures will come from the design pool.

column1: The print is made of 320gsm waterproof cotton rag,  12"" X 18"" with 1.5 inch margin left for framing.
Just add additional $15 to order an art print of any design on your existing pledge.
Apart from traditional rewards such as sticker, art prints, t-shirts etc., here we want to point out two special reward tier.
Instead of the illuminant pipe design we showed in the video, actually we will construct a huge wall art (3.7m* 2.2m) on the one side of the mobile shop.
We will incorporate your name, logo, or any other crazy thing you can think of into the art. And you will also receive a digital copy of the wall art as well as the perks from the $200 tier.
Thinking of visiting Shanghai and see the mobile shop in person?

Yes, we will provide an opportunity for 2 backers a 5-day mega tour around Shanghai. We will cover your all the accommodation, meals, transportation in shanghai. You will also receive all the perks from the $400 tier.

You will live in my house (don't worry, I have several rooms available) and be my guests, I will be your personal guide and show you the major attractions in Shanghai and take you to eat traditional Chinese food!

The first place we have decided to go is Moganshan Rd graffiti area in Shanghai - the China and Shanghai's best street art. But sadly, we don't know how long these wall arts can be preserved as a new construction project is being carried out there nowadays...
Check the video below (from Chris Wells) of the Moganshan Rd art community.
We agreed to share 20% “sales revenue” of any copyrighted products sold with the artist, so this time we won't leave us much net profits.

It’s estimated to cost around $5000 to decorate the whole shop. We hope stretch goal like $30K or more can be reached so that we will have enough net profits left to do the shop decoration. So let's do it!!

After backer's survey is filled out and sent back to us, we promise to ship all the rewards within one month. We will keep you updated on where we are in the ""Updates"" segment of our Indiegogo page.
Now you know all about the Dlab, it's time to get to know the people behind it.

Jun - the founder and campaigner owner earned a bachelor of commerce degree from University of Melbourne. His successful experience of running an e-commerce T-shirt brand in the past is a big plus for this project.
Zhiyuan - the co-founder and CTO of Dlab，was senior software engineer at the largest fashion-related community and e-commerce site YOHO in China. He was also a consecutive startupper before Dlab.
We also want to introduce our lovely participating designers and the shop construction team for this project.
But most importantly, it's the backer like you who makes this project happen and we really appreciate any of your helps. Thank you!!!
We just moved our campaign to Kickstarter:
It looks really unlikely that we can reach our goal by the end of the campaign on Indiegogo and we also believe Kickstarter has a more supportive community for project like ours.
So we wanna try our luck on Kickstarter.
How about the money you already contributed?
The campaign is fixed funding one, which means the money you contributed will refund back to your bank account or Paypal when the campaign is failed.
If you still want to support us, we welcome you come to our Kickstarter page :)

We often see lots of young artist share some really awesome art works or illustrations online, the first thing comes to our mind is why not help them turn those cool arts into t-shirts and let more people can see their efforts and talents. Those designs are way better than the most common logo tees or cartoon tees on the market. This is the reason why we launched our online t-shirt crowdfunding community – Dlab.so in 2015. But before that, we have spent one whole year to learn how to make a high quality t-shirt and to build partnerships with reliable suppliers and manufacturers. Besides a brilliant design, we also want to bring a quality product to our customers. As a young startup company full of young and brave minds, we always like to try something new and different. That’s why we decide to build the first mobile t-shirt shop in China, though we are taking some unknown policy risks doing so. But we are not afraid, we are young. And we believe the mobile shop will help us increase those artists’ publicity as we can carry their works around the city and more people will be aware of it. We want those young artists to succeed and live a decent life by doing what they love to do. If their dreams come true, our dream comes true.

We have worked long and hard collaborating with dozens of young artists and selecting awesome designs during the past few months. We also spent lots of effort helping them modify the design and make it looks more suitable on a t-shirt.
We only listed 10 out of 50 designs above.
Click crowdfunding.dlab.so to check the whole design collection in larger picture for this campaign.
On that page, you can click through each design and remember to note down the design number you like when fill out the survey afterwards.

The  Shirts:We choose 100% ring-spun premium cotton as blanks to print on. It’s pre-shrunk, softy and comfy also with a slight better fit. It worth every penny you spend. Printing:And due to the big design pool, we using DTG (Direct to Garment) printing technique rather than traditional silk screen printing to meet the flexible production requirement. Sizing:We offer unisex crew-neck with sizes from XS to 2XL.Suggested Size:We will officially start to run our website www.dlab.so once the crowdfunding campaign is ended. We will keep improving website’s user experience for international users.
Most importantly, we will continue to work with talented young artists and scout more awesome designs for you.
Want to be one of the designers? Drop us an email at ""service@dlab.so"" or submit your design at our website directly. We will help you open the biggest the t-shirt market in the world - China.
Every backer selecting t-shirt perk will receive a complimentary sticker pack and all the sticker figures will come from the design pool.
The print is made of 320gsm waterproof cotton rag,  12"" X 18"" with 1.5 inch margin left for framing.
Just add additional $15 to order an art print of any design on your existing pledge.
Apart from traditional rewards such as sticker, art prints, t-shirts etc., here we want to point out two special reward tier.
Instead of the illuminant pipe design we showed in the video, actually we will construct a huge wall art (3.7m* 2.2m) on the one side of the mobile shop.
We will incorporate your name, logo, or any other crazy thing you can think of into the art. And you will also receive a digital copy of the wall art as well as the perks from the $200 tier.

You will live in my house (don't worry, I have several rooms available) and be my guests, I will be your personal guide and show you the major attractions in Shanghai and take you to eat traditional Chinese food!

Check the video below (from Chris Wells) of the Moganshan Rd art community.

After backer's survey is filled out and sent back to us, we promise to ship all the rewards within one month. We will keep you updated on where we are in the ""Updates"" segment of our Indiegogo page.

column1:
Imagine meeting your baby before he or she is born.

The pregnancy with your child is a once in a lifetime experience. Recall those feelings over again with your own 3D Baby.

At 3D Babies, we create an adorable baby figurine resembling your baby's facial features and body position.  We use your 3D/4D ultrasound or newborn baby pictures to create a unique artistic representation of your baby using the latest computer graphics and 3D printing technology.  This is a great way to share the excitement of your new baby with family and friends.  Your 3D Baby will be a treasured family remembrance of your pregnancy and new baby.

We are the parents of two wonderful little girls, ages 3 and 1.  We love being parents and have been cherishing our time with our girls.  Every time another family member or friend has a baby, we are reminded of our first few months with our girls.  More importantly, we are reminded of how much we have forgotten about that time.  In an attempt to hold on to those memories, we created a way to make a 3D figurine of what our baby looked like at that time.

We want to help other families hold on to those same memories. With your help, we will be able to purchase a 3D printer to lower costs for our customers.  Our ultimate goal is to bring a smile to the faces of parents, grandparents, and other family members as they recall the day that they met their little one.  This product will become a treasured family heirloom.

We create 3D Baby figurines using our proprietary process. First, you choose a Lifesize 3D Baby (8 inches crown to rump), a Halfsize 3D Baby (4 inches crown to rump), and/or a Mini 3D Baby (2 inches crown to rump) and provide images of your baby.   The Lifesize 3D Baby is so called, because a 23-24 week old fetus is about 8 inches from crown to rump.  Next, we reproduce the face as shown in your images and select the body position according to your request (gender visible or not). Finally, we use the color you select (light, medium, or dark) to put the finishing touches on your 3D Baby.

We are seeking to raise a minimum of $15,000 in funds to purchase a Stratasys U-Print SE Plus (3D Printer).  This purchase is key to being able to reduce the price for our customers.  With Gerard's MBA experience and Katie's PhD in Bioengineering, we have the perfect combination of knowledge to make this business a success.  If we don't reach our goal, then we don't get any funds.  Please help us realize our dream!
In return for your contributions, we have several perks just for you.
• Donate $1: We will keep you informed of our progress and community contributions.

• Donate $25: Receive your choice of (1) your money is being pooled with the donations of others in order to contribute a 3D Baby to a military family (for every one that you help donate, we will donate a 3D Baby to another family) or (2) a 3D figurine of our 3D Babies mascot.
• Donate $50 or $100: Receive a gift certificate for either $75 or $150 towards the purchase of your own 3D Baby.
• Donate more: Receive 25% off of the purchase of a 3D Baby per the perk description.
Don't worry if you can't contribute, please just spread the word. We need your help to reach families that could benefit from having a 3D Baby in their life.  Feel free to:
- forward a link to this crowd funding page
- forward a link to our website (www.3D-Babies.com)
- follow us on twitter (www.twitter.com/3DBabies)
-follow us on 3D Babies Blog (http://3dbabies.blogspot.com/)
- leave us a message on Facebook (www.facebook.com/3DBabies)

Thank you from the 3D Babies team!

the last twenty years we got used to pick up after our dogs. Then, in recent
years, we became accustomed to pay for these solutions (plastic bags), but
these solutions are not ecological or aesthetic.
Now comes the next step- the SCOOPEASY- an
innovative ecological pooper-scooper that is not only ecological and aesthetic
(made from recycled cardboard), but more efficient than any other equivalent
product, and is the only one that has proved to collect mayonnaise!
Gabrieli, an economist by profession and a developer by passion, invented the

Who loves the SCOOPEASY?
dog owners love the SCOOPEASY, but those with puppies and dogs with stomach
problems especially appreciate its ability to deal with their pets’ messy
business. The SCOOPEASY is great fun for children, who love its design, and
community bodies love the connection between cleanliness and ecology. The
Tel-Aviv municipality Veterinary Department distributed it in the city and
during their dog adoption events, to heighten awareness of ecological cleaning
and advocacy campaigns conducted in the city’s schools. In addition, private

veterinarians across the city use it as gifts for their clients.

column9: >Biographe is a premium apparel brand designed by the creative minds behind The Blind Project.
column17: >Each and every piece in our line is printed by a woman who was once at risk, or exploited, in the commercial sex trade.
column25: > We stand to strengthen the one-to-one connection between the consumer and the survivor. Printed inside each piece is the story of a survivor who had a hand in printing that actual item, through which we strive to empower you to share the journey of the women who made your garment.

column10: >We are planning to officially launch the Biographe brand this holiday season, when we will sell our garments in select boutique stores throughout New York City. In order to make that happen, we still need additional funding to continue to pay the women’s salaries, cover rent and utility costs, and purchase additional inventory for our official launch.
>We have already set up our facility in Bangkok, trained our staff, and run a successful pilot program after bringing local New York artists into the mix.
column19: > Now we turn to you to help push us over the edge and launch our brand by helping us reach our $30,000 goal!

Women and girls as young as ten years old were locked in brothels with no hope and no future. They were - and still are - sold and resold as meaningless commodities, carelessly passed from one owner to the next. Often times, even after women are rescued, many fall
column28: > into the sex trade because of their limited resources, scarce economic opportunities and/or negative social stigmas.
column37: >So moved by what they saw, Anthony, Chad, and Liem returned to New York City determined to find a way to pool the unique talents of their friends and empower victims of the commercial sex trade. Since then, this collective of individuals has evolved into The Blind Project. Providing gainful employment to sex trade survivors is where our talents met her needs, and the idea for Biographe was born.

column10: >In striving to apply for-profit market strategies to a non-profit social purpose, Biographe is our answer. By training survivors in marketable job skills (screenprinting and design) while maintaining a supportive, open environment where their stories are shared and embraced, we aim to break the vicious cycle that continues to fuel the sex trade around the world. We employ our staff at our Bangkok facility, which we have dubbed the 'Biographe Lab.' All of the proceeds from our apparel line will be reinvested into our partner organizations in Asia that provide rescue and aftercare efforts for survivors of the sex trade.

column29:
>, a 501(c)(3) non-profit. We are made up entirely of volunteers, taking no salary, which allows us to re-invest 100% of our proceeds back into the women we serve.

","Biographe is a premium apparel brand designed by the creative minds behind The Blind Project. Each and every piece in our line is printed by a woman who was once at risk, or exploited, in the commercial sex trade. We stand to strengthen the one-to-one connection between the consumer and the survivor. Printed inside each piece is the story of a survivor who had a hand in printing that actual item, through which we strive to empower you to share the journey of the women who made your garment.

column1: We are planning to officially launch the Biographe brand this holiday season, when we will sell our garments in select boutique stores throughout New York City. In order to make that happen, we still need additional funding to continue to pay the women’s salaries, cover rent and utility costs, and purchase additional inventory for our official launch.

We have already set up our facility in Bangkok, trained our staff, and run a successful pilot program after bringing local New York artists into the mix. Now we turn to you to help push us over the edge and launch our brand by helping us reach our $30,000 goal!

The story of The Blind Project began with three New York City roommates and one book. After reading Gary Haugen's account on the rescue of young girls from Cambodian brothels in Haugen's book ""Terrify No More,"" Anthony, Chad, and Liem decided to get off their proverbial couch and 'do something.'

They quit their jobs to travel through Southeast Asia and document the issue first-hand, in search of ways to combat the problem. What they found ultimately changed their lives. Women and girls as young as ten years old were locked in brothels with no hope and no future. They were - and still are - sold and resold as meaningless commodities, carelessly passed from one owner to the next. Often times, even after women are rescued, many fall back into the sex trade because of their limited resources, scarce economic opportunities and/or negative social stigmas.So moved by what they saw, Anthony, Chad, and Liem returned to New York City determined to find a way to pool the unique talents of their friends and empower victims of the commercial sex trade. Since then, this collective of individuals has evolved into The Blind Project. Providing gainful employment to sex trade survivors is where our talents met her needs, and the idea for Biographe was born.

In striving to apply for-profit market strategies to a non-profit social purpose, Biographe is our answer. By training survivors in marketable job skills (screenprinting and design) while maintaining a supportive, open environment where their stories are shared and embraced, we aim to break the vicious cycle that continues to fuel the sex trade around the world. We employ our staff at our Bangkok facility, which we have dubbed the 'Biographe Lab.' All of the proceeds from our apparel line will be reinvested into our partner organizations in Asia that provide rescue and aftercare efforts for survivors of the sex trade. Here in New York, our fashion designers have been developing custom-designed garments for the Biographe label, which will feature artwork created by select DACS (Designers Against Child Slavery) artists. This artwork will be silk-screened into our garments by survivors.
A $50 pledge will give you a choice to receive either the women's draped tank or the men's henley before we even sell them in stores.
We are also excited to offer a selection of original artwork that have and continue to impact the designs that will be printed into our Biographe garments.

Artists submitted original designs during our 'Be A Biographer' design competition based upon one of three women's stories that we had posted online. Voting for this competition was crowdsourced online, where twenty designs below were voted in as the finalists. These prints were displayed in our Episodes Exhibition in downtown Manhattan last Fall.

With a $75 pledge you will receive a 10"" x 10"" print of your choice.With a $250 pledge you will receive a 24"" x 36"" canvas print of one of the following designs displayed at the Episodes Exhibition by DACS artists. These artists are some of the very people who will be designing graphics for Biographe. This prize is VERY limited as we only have one print of each piece. (Please take a look at the Updates section to see which unique piece of artwork is left).
At the close of the 'Be a Biographer' competition, we used the three winning designs to build a pilot program in Bangkok, where we trained the Biographe Lab ladies how to silkscreen.
With a $100 pledge you will receive a 8"" x 10"" screen-pulled print of the winning design of your choice, framed and also signed by the women at the Biographe Lab.

When the ladies graduated to silkscreening designs onto stock shirts in Bangkok, we named our first-ever edition production run of tees 'Biographe Beta.' These tees from our original run are available for those who pledge $25 or more.A pledge of $15 you will get you a special 'Thank You' handkerchief, hand silkscreened by the women at our Biographe Lab.

Our Biographe ID bracelets are made of a plaited, stainless steel metal chain with a clear, moulded plastic name plate. The clean slate of the name plate symbolizes the opportunity to start afresh for not only the women working in our Biographe lab, but all over the world. What would typically be a full circle of chain is interrupted by this clear space that breaks the vicious cycle which women in the sex trade have come to know as the norm. Likewise, we believe that each woman should be given the opportunity to be in control of her destiny.
With a pledge of $35 you will have the choice to receive one of the below.
We hope that you can join us in making the next chapter of our story a reality. Thank you so much for reading!

Biographe is a part of our parent organization The Blind Project, a 501(c)(3) non-profit. We are made up entirely of volunteers, taking no salary, which allows us to re-invest 100% of our proceeds back into the women we serve.",8.0,0,"4 Campaigns
The Story of One Crafty Gamer Chick

We all know how it goes. You bought a few sets of polyhedral dice, maybe a few blocks of d6's, and maybe even have a few things like fake gold coins or your homemade Deck of Many Things or Critical Hit Deck. You could keep them all in your pockets, but then there's so much fumbling when you need your phone or your keys. You could just use a bag from some booze or jelly beans, but those aren't always the highest quality. They were only meant to hold sweet, sweet liquor or candy. But what to do then?
Well, we have the answer! Why not get a bag from One Crafty Gamer Chick? In a variety of styles and formats, her bags will hold things. Your things specifically!
But if you want her bags to hold your things, well, you will need some help.
So here's the skinny. The basic things we would need, and what we'd be buying with all this money:
• A new sewing machine that can handle the high volume of bags we'd be putting out.
• The web domain and the wonderful web designer we have lined up to help us make this into the best bag site you'll ever see.
• All the raw materials we can craft into your bags!
Now, as for what the resulting lines would be:
• Simple, for when you want to be bold, yet understated
<li>Little Bits, a classic video game inspired line full of plumbers, invaders and monsters. It's dangerous to go alone
<li>Quest, a fantasy inspired line, for all you Pathfinder, Arrowflight, D&amp
• Crafty, for when you really want to think about hunting for diamonds and avoiding Creepers!
• Royal, a line for the more feminine gamer, inspired by your favorite princesses.
• Heroic, a comic inspired line for everyone, from Amazon princesses to alien refugees, orphaned billionaires to radioactive teenagers!

• SPAAAAACE!, our science fiction inspired line of bags, for anyone who has ever wanted to hang with a Wookiee, a Klingon, a Cylon or a Time Lord to fight some Daleks, Sith or Xenomorphs. Or you could just go to a moon of Jupiter, but stay off Europa.
And all lines will have bags in four different sizes: Mini, Standard, Deluxe and Premium!
Now, we would like to mention, this is one person making these, so if this totally explodes with people wanting our bags, we may end up a little behind on orders.
Yep, that was a Portal joke up there
Sorry, using the Portal joke when the Portal-inspired bags are probably going to be in the Little Bits line.

Honestly, this whole idea was started with a bag that was made by the Crafty Gamer Chick for a birthday, and soon everyone wanted one. And so we thought, why not make these available for everyone? They make good gifts, and last for years. And table top gamers everywhere sure could use some more bags for all those dozens and dozens of dice they have.
Other Ways You Can Buff the Campaign

Look, not everybody can be the fighter or wizard. Somebody has to play the cleric and just do buffs and heals. If you can't contribute, you can be our cleric! Spread the word! Tell people on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Reddit, GiantITP, EnWorld, Pinterest, Google Plus I guess, where ever you tell people things!

column2: the left panel, the central panel and the right panel. Each is independent to each other and each is reversible and can be used  with different pocket or no pockets. You can combine with the straps which also double as expanders to make compartments bigger. add larger expanders to make it as big as you need (even packing for a full month trip) There are many 3rd party fashion and technical accessory developers also (hey, let us know if you are interested). Many specialty pockets are designed for different types of technology and convenience. See below.

We really value your help in letting other people know about
the Carmazzi 1bag, so we would like to reward you with FREE GIFTS if we reach our Stretch Goals and exceed

our target

By contributing you will be a part of making a personal dream com true, the idea that I can contribute beyond knowledge and self and organizational development (not that that is not SUPER important) and carry the Carmazzi philosophy to retail products. This is a new stepping stone for what is possible, and sets the president for the future.

Timeline

We have new technology coming up every week it seems, but are still stuck in the traditional ways of carrying it LIFE STYLE and LIFE FIT, change from environment to environment. Be a part of the Revolution that Takes Control of what you want to say with fashion and function When You Want it and How You Want it

This is a new stepping stone for what is possible, and sets the president for the future.TimelineWe have new technology coming up every week it seems, but are still stuck in the traditional ways of carrying it LIFE STYLE and LIFE FIT, change from environment to environment. Be a part of the Revolution that Takes Control of what you want to say with fashion and function When You Want it and How You Want it
If you like the idea but cannot contribute, please let us know you want to help. if you can successfully promote the campaign, you could earn yourself a free bag.
Ideas on how to improve the concept are also welcome... please do make your comments below",21.0,1,"1 Campaign

column4: >Thanks for checking out Giving Tree Eyewear! We’ve been working nonstop in order to share our vision with you. Not only have we funded our dream up to this point, but we've put our LIFE in to it. Our passion led us to create cause-driven sunglasses with a goal to provide superior protection and style. We make intelligent eyewear, always made in sunny California.

>We started with two unisex styles, the ""Brosewood"" and the ""Trolleander"". We can't wait to interact with you and involve you throughout the process, because this wouldn’t be possible without you. Thanks for your love and support.

column3: >(The founders chatting with Giving Tree Eyewear supporter, Brent Spiner)

column4: >Giving Tree Eyewear is an American made brand of sunglasses in which a percentage of all profits are donated to multiple charities. When it comes to your protection, we spare nothing by using superior polarized lenses with astonishing clarity to ensure your vision is safe. We use eco-friendly materials and revolutionary technology that make our frames BPA free, ultra lightweight, comfortable and extremely durable.

column3: >Plantable warranty card that grows different flowers, trees, herbs, etc. based on collection.
>  5.   Lazer cut Giving Tree logo on the lens
column5: >  6.   Surgical stainless steel 5 barrel hinge
column7: >  7.   Seven layer polarized uv400 Giving Tree CR-39 lens

column3:
>

Not only are you going to look amazing, you're going to feel amazing. We've perfected the size, tilt, wrap and most importantly the material. Say goodbye to the headache of heavy frames and that annoying tilt that rubs against your cheeks. Now you can smile like you mean it.

>

That’s not the only thing that will make you smile. We've teamed up with Laugh for Sight to fund research for macular degeneration, a disease that causes blindness. We need YOUR help to decide on which environmental organization to give back to. Share our IGG link and tag or mention us, hashtagging your recommendation between these: Surfrider Foundation, 1% For The Planet, Oceana or any other organization related to the environment that you feel strongly about and we will choose the one trended most. If social media isn’t your thing just post it as a comment on our IGG page.

column4: >Q: How do I choose my style/color?

>A: After you purchase your perk, we'll send you a message that you can reply to and specify the color and the style depending on the perk. You will get this message some time before we start the shipping process.
>Q: How can we contact/email you with questions?
>A: For the quickest response please contact us through Indiegogo via ""Contact This User"" or ""Comments"". If you absolutely need to email us please use Info@GivingTreeEyewear.com.
>Q: Is it possible to break the frames?

>A: As mom says, ""anything is possible"". Just to be safe, we recommend to not bend the frames as we do in examples. Our goal with the examples is to show you what these frames can withstand on a daily basis.

column1: ","Thanks for checking out Giving Tree Eyewear! We’ve been working nonstop in order to share our vision with you. Not only have we funded our dream up to this point, but we've put our LIFE in to it. Our passion led us to create cause-driven sunglasses with a goal to provide superior protection and style. We make intelligent eyewear, always made in sunny California.

We started with two unisex styles, the ""Brosewood"" and the ""Trolleander"". We can't wait to interact with you and involve you throughout the process, because this wouldn’t be possible without you. Thanks for your love and support.
(The founders chatting with Giving Tree Eyewear supporter, Brent Spiner)

Giving Tree Eyewear is an American made brand of sunglasses in which a percentage of all profits are donated to multiple charities. When it comes to your protection, we spare nothing by using superior polarized lenses with astonishing clarity to ensure your vision is safe. We use eco-friendly materials and revolutionary technology that make our frames BPA free, ultra lightweight, comfortable and extremely durable.
Plantable warranty card that grows different flowers, trees, herbs, etc. based on collection.
5.   Lazer cut Giving Tree logo on the lens  6.   Surgical stainless steel 5 barrel hinge   7.   Seven layer polarized uv400 Giving Tree CR-39 lens

Not only are you going to look amazing, you're going to feel amazing. We've perfected the size, tilt, wrap and most importantly the material. Say goodbye to the headache of heavy frames and that annoying tilt that rubs against your cheeks. Now you can smile like you mean it.

That’s not the only thing that will make you smile. We've teamed up with Laugh for Sight to fund research for macular degeneration, a disease that causes blindness. We need YOUR help to decide on which environmental organization to give back to. Share our IGG link and tag or mention us, hashtagging your recommendation between these: Surfrider Foundation, 1% For The Planet, Oceana or any other organization related to the environment that you feel strongly about and we will choose the one trended most. If social media isn’t your thing just post it as a comment on our IGG page.
Q: How do I choose my style/color?

A: After you purchase your perk, we'll send you a message that you can reply to and specify the color and the style depending on the perk. You will get this message some time before we start the shipping process.
Q: How can we contact/email you with questions?
A: For the quickest response please contact us through Indiegogo via ""Contact This User"" or ""Comments"". If you absolutely need to email us please use Info@GivingTreeEyewear.com.
Q: Is it possible to break the frames?

A: As mom says, ""anything is possible"". Just to be safe, we recommend to not bend the frames as we do in examples. Our goal with the examples is to show you what these frames can withstand on a daily basis.",24.0,0,"1 Campaign

The inspiration for my current project came to me three years ago while I was still living in my home city of Turin, Italy. 

My name is Francesca and I am a graphic designer. I have always believed in the potential for graphic design to communicate important ideas to the world in an engaging and innovative way, and I began to gather designs for a line of t-shirts which I hoped would do just this.

Once I had designed the range for my brand I began to select the designs which I felt best reflected what I wanted the brand to represent. I then began to produce the t-shirts and arrange shipments, and now my online shop is almost ready to open.

Recently, I have been investing all of my spare time in this project in order to make my vision become a reality. Once the production of Flequillo t-shirts has started I will make steps to enhance the professionalism of the brand, for example by designing customised labels.

What makes Flequillo special?

I believe that t-shirts are a powerful tool to communicate positive and meaningful messages, and the aim of Flequillo is to portray these messages by representing well-known cultural icons in an ironic and unconventional style. I strongly believe in protecting the environment, and that this conservation begins with the small choices we make as individuals. Therefore, all of my t-shirts will be made from organic cotton and use only eco-friendly packaging.


the T-shirts



the Rewards

column2:
>Thanks for the interest and support! :)

column1: Thanks for the interest and support! :)",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

column5: >(Photos are from previous Alexander People lookbooks.)

column1:
How it all started.

I started a brand called Nico Alexander back in 2009 out of a passion for just needing to create.  I worked hard and eventually around 2011 that idea turned into Alexander People a jewelry brand.  A brand that I envisioned to be the starting point of something much bigger.  I worked and worked from that time until 2012.  I had all the ideas, designs, concepts and passion to start it but I quickly realized that wasn't enough.  I felt like a kite that got a great gust of wind and was soaring then fell on flat air.  The reality is it takes money and money is the thing I was lacking, so I put my dreams on lay by.  Now I am at the place where I am dying to start this new Beloved Collection that I have envisioned, but Mr. Money keeps pounding on the door saying it will never happen but something within me cannot give up, this collection is too important to not try!  Then I had the idea to try to see if some of my friends, family, and indiegogo lovers that want to see this Beloved Collection happen as much as I do would rally in and support this vision and see this collection made... So I've come to this.  I have my 25th birthday coming in July and everyone asks me what I want to do or what I want for my birthday. I have thought long and hard and with everything in me this is what I want.  To see this dream become something tangible.  Not just a spark of a start up but a trailblazer that starts off with one thing then branches out.  Everyone has been asking me whats going on with Alexander People and when I am going to come out with more so lets see if I can get this show on the road!


What is the Beloved Collection?

The Beloved collection is something that came to me one day during some business planning and I think it was an idea that had been sitting inside waiting for the right time to come out.  The Beloved Collection will be a ring collection made entirely by hand.  It will be a collection that celebrates women's unique individuality and beauty.  Each ring made will have its own unique stone, so no two rings will be the same.  The stones will vary and the vision behind this is for each stone to represent each individual woman, some stones may be somewhat similar or completely different to all of the rest.  That is how I see women.  Although we may feel like we are just like everyone else and we sometimes feel like we don't stand out or if we feel so different from everyone else that we feel as though we don't fit, we are unique individuals and should celebrate our similarities and our differences.  We often times look at a gemstone and view it as precious, so as a women I thought how incredible it would be to flip the script and have a ring that is a reflection of being the precious and amazing women that we are.  In addition to the unique stone, each ring will be engraved inside with ""Beloved"" followed by their name.  For example: ""Beloved Nicole.""  This engraving is a statement.  Beloved, by definition is to be dearly loved, or a person who is loved dearly.  I believe that not enough women see themselves that way.  It is addressing each individual woman as someone who is dearly loved.  Whatever walk of life or place in life a woman may be I think there needs to be such importance placed on the fact that they are dearly loved.
column9:
>Why is the Beloved Collection so important?

My passion is to help others so not only will I focus on the creative side in making beautiful jewelry, but I want to form a brand that honors women, that celebrates women for the unique individuals that they are.  I want to encourage and inspire women to be confident in their own skin and not compromise themselves for anything.  This is the passion behind the dream, to set a higher standard for women to see themselves with more value and to inspire them!  

I think there is need right now in fashion for women to have something that is specifically for the individual.  Something affordable that doesn't required you to be a celebrity or have some sort of status to have something uniquely yours.    This line will make each individual customer unique.  

This line makes a bold statement:  ""You are you and that is something to be celebrated, you are a beautiful and precious individual who is dearly loved.""
column13:
>What I need funding for.

I need funding for everything from tools to website updating.  The majority of the funding will go to jewelry supplies, as I want to source quality supplies.  As the jewelry I made before didn't require many tools, for this line I will basically have to start from scratch with the majority of the tools I will need.  I also want to have clear and cohesive branding so that means investing into business cards, tags, and general branding, I want to create beautiful branding and packaging that I would be proud to send out to customers.  Since business will mainly be e-commerce my old website has to go, also new domain, and new location...not WIX based...sorry wix.   I will be using shopify, this means I will have to create a new website from scratch and pay monthly for it.  

Cost Breakdown

Tools: $1515

Branding: $660

Packaging: $450 (boxes and jewelry bags)

Jewelry Supplies: $3550

New Website: $1162 (design + 1yr Shopify subscription + domain)

Product and Lookbook photoshoots: $250

Indiegogo 7% Fee: Roughly $600

Total : $8,200
column17:
>What happens if it doesn't get funded?

Well if unfortunately it doesn't get funded than this ""Beloved Collection"" dream will sadly have to get filed away to where dream go in waiting.  I don't want to do flexible funding which would allow me to keep whatever funds I raise because it's a project that requires all or nothing.  I don't think its fair for anyone if I keep the money but don't meet the goal because I honestly won't be able to produce and launch the collection if the goal isn't met I will still keep planning but I will just be in planning phase indefinitely.  However I am really believing that with your help this dream can move out of the planning phase!
column18: >Why don't you have a super cool pitch video?
column20: >Well it's funny you should ask....not really... It's kind of awkward.  I had this great idea to have an incredible pitch video made in the last week of June before I launched the campaign and then...I got the flu.  I currently still have the flu as I am writing this.  Not fun.  As it is just about to be July and I am determined to run this campaign through July I had to make the decision to not make you endure a two minute pitch video of my sickly self as I currently sound like a cross between a monotone frog and Bill Stein, so I decided to give you as much information as possible here and have the photos and video from my previous lookbooks showing unique women from all walks of life.  I will however upload one later in the campaign!
column22:
>  

What happens if you go over the goal?

If I reach the goal and over I will be able to do so much more than start!  I will be starting with the ""Beloved Collection"" so if I raise more than the goal it will allow me to work on more of the crazy projects and ideas I have in this crazy brain.  It will also mean I can launch sooner!  If I get way over my goal I might even be able to rent a studio to work out of instead of my house!  Trust me I need the extra room!
column30:
>So where do we go from here?

You can contribute to seeing this happen!! Even if you are a guy and you feel like this doesn't relate to you, if you know a woman who doesn't think they fit in or standout please consider being a part of a campaign that celebrates these amazing women whether they are your mother, sister, wife, friend, etc!  

Contributions big and small are what is going to get this dream moving forward but honestly if you are not able to financially contribute even getting the word out and making a bit of noise about the campaign could help.



Let's see if I can celebrate 25 with a dream come true hey!!

","(Photos are from previous Alexander People lookbooks.)

Hello, allow us to present you a new clothing line made for people with big passion for music, dancing and partying. For those who 'live' music. We ourselves are big music festival lovers and so far we couldn't find a good clothing brand to match our passion for music, that's why we started our own apparel.  If you are a music lover then today is your lucky day because we believe we share the same thinking that there is no such brand for us on the market.

What do we offer for Start:

For a start we offer you one design with two collors. We hope you like it. More designs variants depend on our funding.

Black t-shirt+Gold letters

White t-shirt+Black letters

+

Our future plans:

These t-shirts are just the beginning of our journey. We wouldn't like to reveal our plans much, but you can expect to see long t-shirts,hats, jackets,flags and so on. We promise you'll be pretty impressed when you see what's next that we got prepared for you, and very soon if we manage to realise this project. Expect something unusual and exciting, , because thats what we are like, we love to connect fashion with music and we want to take you through our journey.

We need your help:

If you have kept reading up to here, it means you are interested and you belive in us. Thats exactly what we need from you, trust. Costs to start the manufacturing are high and you are the ones that can help us, in return we will offer you excellent products. We plan to stick on the market for a long time and we want to include all of you in our jurney. Belive us, we appreciate even the smallest help and we hope that together we will succeed. If any of you will need help starting a project, you have our word that we will try to help you, because good things always come back.

 

Our ambassadors:

We are representing you our FIRST ambassador and friend @tmack8769  #mupteam

He is great dancer and we are glad to have him in our team.
When it comes to dancing, he shine the most at Music Festivals, particularly with EDM.

 

@tmack8769 :
""It's an unexplainable feeling walking into a world where no matter what you do, you are not judged for being who you are.
The aroma radiates with peace and love from a community of people that certainly share one commonality, the love of the music. In all of my dancing videos, I make sure that my LIVE performances, come from the heart when I'm truly lost in the Music I love!""

 

 You believe us but you want to know what you get and when?

By now we have established a great relationship with our manufacturer. As we said, for the beginning we offer you one design , you choose what you want and preorder it. When this campaign ends it will take roughly two weeks to make t-shirts and shipping takes about a week, depends on where you live. Everyone who preorders will enter our VIP loyalty club which gets you lifetime discounts. That’s not all, you’ll receive a little gift which will remind you that you made a good thing and that you made friends on the other side of the world.

 

 And for the end

All we can say is thank you for your trust and support.  Now when we got up to here we can only go further. Together, with you. Brothers and sisters, enjoy and see you on the music festivals. :) 

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Shipping informations !

1- We are from Croatia and yes we ship worldwide.

2- Shipping time- It takes about 3- 5 days for Europe and about 5-12 days for the rest of the world. 

3. Shipping costs without tracking number for one t-shirt: Europe($8), North and South America($9), Croatia(3$), rest of the world($9). 

4. Shipping costs without tracking number for two t-shirts: Europe($12), North and South America($13) Croatia($3), rest of the world($13)

5. Shipping costs with tracking number for one t-shirt: just click ""Back it"" at the top of our campaign and add $3 more. But remember you have to pay standard cost + $3 more. If you are from Croatia, there is no additional charge.

6. Shipping costs with tracking number for two t-shirts: just click ""Back it"" at the top of our campaign and add $4 more. But remember you have to pay standard cost + $4 more. If you are from Croatia, there is no additional charge.

7. Our suggestion is, just pay standard shipping without tracking number. We ship all orders as a ""Priority mail"" so it's safe and fast. But that's just our suggestion you are free to choose. If there is anything you need or you don't understand something, please don't hesitate to ask.

 

A short story about our founder:

@yesfilip

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Friends thank you!

Shipping costs without tracking number for two t-shirts: Europe($12), North and South America($13) Croatia($3), rest of the world($13)5. Shipping costs with tracking number for one t-shirt: just click ""Back it"" at the top of our campaign and add $3 more. But remember you have to pay standard cost + $3 more. If you are from Croatia, there is no additional charge.6. Shipping costs with tracking number for two t-shirts: just click ""Back it"" at the top of our campaign and add $4 more. But remember you have to pay standard cost + $4 more. If you are from Croatia, there is no additional charge.7. Our suggestion is, just pay standard shipping without tracking number. We ship all orders as a ""Priority mail"" so it's safe and fast. But that's just our suggestion you are free to choose. If there is anything you need or you don't understand something, please don't hesitate to ask. A short story about our founder:@yesfilip_____________________________________________________________________________________Friends thank you!",11.0,0,"1 Campaign
ALPHAGRID is a technical gear brand founded in 2017 by Sam Lee who worked as a bag designer about 10 years.

The brand’s philosophy is focused on providing the highest quality high-end bag products. 
ALPHAGRID, This Korea-based brand, reinterprets its basic design concept and functional details from military luggage 
into modern technologies and usages.

For the ultimate endurance and functions, 
all the products of ALPHAGRID are made of the finest nylon fabric mixed with DuPont™ Kevlar®, Fidlock® Magnetic Buckle, YKK® Waterproof Fastner, ITW NEXUS Plastic Parts etc.

With uncompromising production control for its high quality, 
ALPHAGRID will never stop challenging to make the best technical bags.
TERAMID® is a super tenacious fabric reinforced with DuPont™ KEVLAR® brand fiber.

Kevlar is the registered trademark for a para-aramid synthetic fiber, related to other aramids such as Nomex and Technora. Developed by Stephanie Kwolek at DuPont in 1965, this high-strength material was first commercially used in the early 1970s as a replacement for steel in racing tires. Typically it is spun into ropes or fabric sheets that can be used as such or as an ingredient in composite material components.
Currently, Kevlar has many applications, ranging from bicycle tires and racing sails to bulletproof vests, because of its high tensile strength-to-weight ratio
column2: by this measure it is 5 times stronger than steel. It is also used to make modern drumheads that withstand high impact. When used as a woven material, it is suitable for mooring lines and other underwater applications.

column1:
Fidlock fastners are based on unique technology which has won numerous awards and which is revolutionizing conventional fastening systems.
The Fidlock principle brings together the advantages of magnetic fastners and mechanical locks. The result is a new dimension in terms of functionality, safety, and fun.

Plastic buckles and closure components have been designed and manufactured for over 25 years by ITW Nexus. In fact, in 1977, we invented the original Side Release buckle that revolutionized the closure market. The following web catalog contains ITW Nexus’ standard plastic buckle and closure offerings of products that we have developed through the years. If you do not find a solution to your plastic hardware needs, please contact  ITW Nexus to review your exact closure demands.
All of our Military/Defense/MILSPEC hardware is 100% U.S. Berry Amendment Compliant. Proudly Made in the USA.

The YKK Group (YKK, Waikeikei Gurūpu) is a Japanese group of manufacturing companies. As the world's largest zipper manufacturer, YKK produces fasteners and architectural products at 109 YKK companies in 71 countries around the world.
And such as PERMEX® Snap button, RFID Blocking Fabric, Waterproof Fabric etc., were used for every products.
*Portion of applied technologies is domestic and international PATENT PENDING.

column2: >Compartment for various items at backpanel.
>Waterproof pocket that can hold small umbrellas or watery items.
>Secondary pocket that can hold a cell phone, wallet, secondary batteries etc.

column1: The main compartment can be opened and closed with a zipper fastener in the form of a question mark on the top of the bag, and digital devices such as laptop and tablet PC can be efficiently stored in the back panel. It is possible to attach and detach pouches by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM  to the left side of bag.
*Including removable chest strap and waist belt.

The magnetic buckle can be used to easily open and close the flap of the bag, and the back side can efficiently store digital devices such as laptop and tablet PC. It is possible to attach and detach pouches by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM on front and left side of bag.
*You can increase the clamping force by connecting the secondary sling strap.

The main compartment can be opened and closed with the zipper fastener on the upper part of the bag and the dual structure of the front part, and the digital devices such as laptop and tablet PC can be stored efficiently in the back panel. It is possible to attach and detach pouch by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM on front and left side of bag.

The main compartment can be opened and closed with the zipper fastener at the top of the bag, and various sizes of objects can be efficiently stored inside the bag. It is possible to attach and detach pouch by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM to left and right sides of bag.

Cell phone, external hard disk, and potable charger can be stored conveniently and efficiently.
It can be attached and detached by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM to the shoulder strap of backpack or messenger bag.

Wallet, Cell phone, or other small items can be conveniently and efficiently stored.
It can be attached or detached by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM to the belt, backpack or messenger bag shoulder strap.
Various small items can be conveniently and efficiently stored. It can be attached or detached by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM to the webbing of the side or front of the bag.
Various small items can be conveniently and efficiently stored. It can be attached or detached by applying MAGNETIC M.O.L.L.E SYSTEM to the webbing of the side or front of the bag.

When I set out to create a line of custom, high-quality roller derby patches, a fair number of people were probably more than a little confused. But they don't know what I know. Roller Derby has a long and colourful history, and because of technologies like social media and the Internet, the sport has experienced a renaissance in the last ten to twenty years.

Manufacturing good quality embroidery can be a challenge. When it's done right, nothing else can compare. I designed my patches to be show-pieces. They are suitable for anyone who wants to celebrate the great sport of roller derby with fellow fans, and they look spectacular on their own or affixed to team jackets, jerseys, hats, bags or any accessory. The quality of these patches is inspiring, and that is one of the chief reasons I'm starting a crowdfunding project and reaching out to my fellow fans and sports fashion enthusiasts.

I plan to start with an exciting and attractive line of custom patches and reward my most enthusiastic contributors with some unique and fun rewards for being a part of my campaign. I would be honoured if you would consider joining my project. With your generous support, I plan to build something unique and fun we can all share.

As with any manufactured items, embroidered patches get more affordable when they are purchased in quantities of 100 or more (and the best price breaks are at quantities of 200 and 500). This campaign allows me to offer you a great deal on some original, artist-designed patches in exchange for your help in ordering these at a quantity that makes them affordable.
I'm looking forward to keeping you updated on all the new ideas I have planned for the future. I appreciate your support and I hope you value what I have to offer. Thank you for your time.

Stretch Goals!

Stretch goal items are free bonus items added to qualifying reward pledges as the campaign exceeds the core funding goal. 

This first stretch goal 800 GBP

Any reward that includes patch qualifies for the bonus stretch goal item. I am going to order more "" I LOVE Roller Derby Patches"" and add one additional item free to each package.

The second stretch goal 1500 GBP

Any reward that includes patch qualifies for the bonus stretch goal item. Backers will receive one additional ""I LOVE Roller Derby Patch"" + a surprise item (I have the new Roller Derby designs in my head) .

Warm thank you to Patchion for free embroidery digitising and making beautiful free samples.

Make sure to follow me on Facebook, my head is full of Roller Derby ideas. I am going to share them via Indiegogo soon.

Are night sweats keeping you up at night? You're not alone and here you are in the right place for a better night sleep. With unique moisture-regulating and temperature management properties, SkinDream bedding is specially developed to keep your body cool and dry.

Sleep is key for our health and the right temperature is key for our sleep.​ Throughout the night, your body works to keep your temperature regulated. Excessive sweating can disrupt your sleep. SkinDream bedding helps your body to stay cool and dry.​

Most of the heat leaves our body through the head. The SkinDream pillowcases absorb excess heat and sweat released from your head and neck. This helps you to stay cool and dry during the night, leading to more comfortable nights.

The fitted sheets help the entire body maintain a constant temperature. When you get too hot and are starting to sweat, the SkinDream fitted sheets will absorb the excess heat and sweat. This helps you to stay cool and dry through the night.
SkinDream bedding easily absorbs sweat and heat from your skin. The airflow trough the fabric speeds up the evaporation of sweat from the bedding. This gives a cooling and drying effect on your skin.

SkinDream products are composed with a unique dual layer textile. The two layers are carefully designed and optimised to perfectly enhance each other properties. This results in a composite fabric that it optimally tuned to keep your skin cool and dry during the night.
The outer layer is derived from fabrics also used in high-tech sportswear. It has an ultra-soft touch and rapidly absorbs sweat - keeping your skin dry throughout the night.
The inner layer is made of a fabric with an open structure, which makes air flow through the bedding possible. This ventilating effect speeds up the evaporation of sweat and keeps your skin cool.

This textile technology was originally created to prevent bed sores. The cooling and moisture regulatory abilities of the textile turned out to be also very suitable and comforting for people who suffer from night sweats.

column2: Read Dylan’s and Nancy's story and their experience with the SkinDream pillowcase.

column1: SkinDream ships out of the Netherlands to Europe and US. Prices below are excluding shipment and applicable import taxes.
The first shipment of all products will be available in white color only. After this campaign we intend to produce additional colors of the SkinDream bedding.
At the end of the campaign we will get in touch to verify your perk and the right size. We will give the opportunity to add additional items.

An inside look of Just Vicky Thingz:

I am excited to share my story with you!  In short: my battle with cancer has shaped me into the entrepreneur I am today. The therapeutic crafting activities that once served as a distraction from my illness have now given birth to a full-fledged business called Just Vicky Thingz.

Hi! I’m Vicky, the founder and designer of Just Vicky Thingz. I started this business in the bathroom of my college apartment at Virginia Tech my senior year of college. I am raising money to purchase an automatic Hotronix heat press machine and would love your support! Keep reading to learn more about the inspiration behind my brand.

When I was only 6 years old I was diagnosed with A.L.L Leukemia and underwent treatment for two and a half years. One of my strongest memories from my treatment was making wire and bead fairies with Margy the craft lady. During my treatment sessions, you could find me at the arts and crafts table in my doctors’ office. There I created tons of crafts, some of which I still have today. I believe that my experience with cancer helped develop my creative mind and passion for crafting.

As a college student, I continued to craft. I made a variety of pieces including wall hangings, signs, canvases and much more for my apartment. Aside from decorations, I also enjoyed making clothing. During my senior year at Virginia Tech and the fall 2017 football season I wanted to find something unique to wear to a game. So I decided to combine my love for Virginia Tech with my love for crafting. I tried something new and trendy and made an acid dye a gray T-shirt from a shirt that I bought at a thrift store.  When I shared a picture of the shirt I made on Snapchat, I was shocked by the number of people who asked me to make them one

After football season ended, I had about  30 pre-made shirts left over. In an effort to get rid of the extra shirts, I posted on my personal craft instagram, “@Justvickythingz,” that I was going to conduct a flash sale. To my surprise, the shirts sold out within an hour. Not only did the shirts sell out, but I also received an excessive amount of orders. As I began to get overwhelmed, I turned to my family for assistance. I sold over  200 shirts in just two weeks.As the word got out about the shirts, I kept receiving more orders and messages.

In February, Valentine’s Day to be exact, I became a registered LLC and since then Just Vicky Thingz has been expanding rapidly. Now just 10 months after opening my business, I have expanded to selling licensed greekwear, licensed “Virginia Tech” college gear, fulfilling large group orders and fundraising events like VT’s Relay for life. I am currently working on launching more college collections. My goal for the company is to obtain more licenses for colleges across the country.

Cancer has played a major role in the development of this business, as the disease is what developed my passion for crafting. My fond memories of working with the craft lady have always stuck with me. I am not sure that I would have ever become the creative business owner I am today if I was not given the chance to craft daily for two and a half years. One of my favorite quotes and personal motto states,

“grow through what you go through.” I grew through my experience with cancer by using crafting as a steady hand to hold.  What once served as a distraction from my illness has now created a rapidly growing business.
Following my crowdfunding campaign, I will be working on replacing my broken machine, expanding to new customers, and purchasing more licenses for colleges. I am hopeful for what is to come.

Every shirt is hand dyed and no two ever look the same. Just Vicky Thingz (JVT) shirts are unique and one-of-a-kind. When we ship a shirt to a new customer we are sending a message to them that they have a shirt no one else has.. We inspire our customers to be different and try new things. Every shirt is worn in a different way. From knotted to cut shirts we love seeing all the different fashion styles our customers come up with!

JustVICKYThingz shirts incorporate the old tie-dye culture from the  70s that encouraged people to express their free-spirited nature. We market our hand-dyed shirts with one goal:to be unique.  At JVT, it is our hope that our hand-crafted gear will motivate our customers to make differences in their communities.
Here’s How You Can Help!

With your support,  JVT will purchase a new Hotronix professional heat press machine, purchase more licenses for colleges, and do more fundraisers and partnerships for charities. Each college license is bought individually and grants you full access to use the official logo, mascot, and slogan for that specific university or college. Past partnerships include fundraising events for VT’s Relay for life, Maryland’s Relay for Life, Sigma Kappa’s walk to end Alzheimer’s, and Casey Shulman’s Shine On Swim-a-thon.

As a cancer survivor, I feel inspired to give back to the community. I saw firsthand from age 6 to 8 how funding and research helps  pediatric cancer patients not only with treatment, but also in how it helps alleviate what the children are going through.  I was able to turn my sickness into a positive outlet for me to discover my passion for crafting. Because of this, JVT will donate 10% of the proceeds fundraised from this campaign to the art therapy program at my pediatric oncologist in Northern Virginia.

Thank you SO MUCH for reading my story and learning more about how cancer inspired me to create my business. I hope my story will help others realize that no matter what they are going through, that they can overcome it and do things they want. I appreciate your consideration to share my campaign. All pledges are greatly appreciated.

column2: >To help me get the word out, you can share my link to your Facebook Timeline!

column1: nimbooks is the fruit of the effort of an extended team of nearly a dozen extraordinary people for almost two years now.
World-class experts in the latest AngularJS, Symfony or MongoDB technology take care of development, supported by UX specialists able to squeeze CSS to the max.

Our OnLine Marketing gurus have been able to create a relevant and involved community out of nowhere which now reaches over 6.000 followers on Twitter and has been able to bring us hundreds of interested people from all corners of the World, many of them actively testing now.
And let's not forget the Legal experts which take care everything happens according to what Privacy and Intellectual Property Laws mandate.
You'll find a partial list at the bottom of the campaign page so you can put some faces to the talents. Awesome people.

column1: ","nimbooks is an independent effort to subvert the status quo in digital reading, where companies such as Amazon, Apple or Google, among many others, have shaped all their platforms and devices to better service their interests at the expense of readers' convenience. Fed up of it, we decided to something about it and create the best eBook storage and management platform we could imagine.
We feel strongly about our mission, so we ask you to please spare a minute to go though...

nimbooks is a Cloud technology-based platform designed with the purpose of allowing you to manage your eBook library the way you wish, including features such as Consolidate, Curate, Enrich, Transform, Share and Read your collection. The way you want, where and when you want.
What we have seen so far is just an appetizer
column2: we do have an arm-long list of additional features that we plan to add. With your help, we'll be able to implement ALL the following and MUCH more...

column1: nimbooks is designed as a scalable, modular platform, so it will be possible to continue expanding its functionality and integration with third party services, and publish APIs for external partners to piggyback on our engine. The expandability of nimbooks is unlimited and we're already full of ideas for the next feature set.
As of today, nimbooks is already a reality in progress
column2: a prototype version has been in beta-test by almost two hundred users from more than 30 countries, for almost a year now, and we have received all kinds of great feedback on what to add or what to change to get the perfect platform going forward.
