Bermies is a fresh line of men’s swimwear built on a love for water and the outdoors.

Being the beach lover and adventurer that I am, I was always on the lookout for the perfect pair of swim trunks. However, I could never find affordable brands that offered stylish, comfortable and high-quality trunks. These swimwear lines also never stood for anything greater than themselves. As a result, I set out to create my own trunks. After much hard work I am excited to announce the launch of Bermies: a lifestyle brand which combines style and adventure with a concern for the well-being of our oceans. 

Bermies pays tribute to the paradise island of Bermuda. Its vibrant colors, crystal clear waters and pink sand beaches set up the perfect backdrop to create this amazing line of men’s swimwear. 

More importantly the island is responsible for making shorts popular around the world! Today, in many parts of the world, shorts and even swim trunks are referred to as Bermuda’s. So what better than to reinvent the Bermuda Short and make some sweet swim trunks in their inspiration?

Each pair of Bermies is made out of 90% polyester and 10% lycra which means they are stretchy, breathable, fast-drying but most importantly extremely comfortable. 

Our trunks also come with with a 4 way stretch, 100% polyester, high quality mesh liner, which means you can say goodbye to rashes and wedgies. Bermies are all about comfort, quality and style at an affordable price!

Bermies offers two styles of lengths so that everybody can feel comfortable and look fantastic!

The Classics are designed for men who want to break away from the typical board shorts and try a shorter, more elegant and stylish look. These designs are the perfect way to become acquainted with Bermies. 

The inseams on these trunks have been adjusted to fit you perfectly. S and M have a 5″ inseam while L and XL have a 6″ inseam. You will never want another pair of swim trunks the minute you try on a pair of Classics.

The Originals are designed for men who are comfortable with their bodies and feel like they could go for a swim trunk that is slightly shorter than the Classics. These swim trunks are not only bold and stylish but are the perfect length to celebrate mens confidence in style and comfort.

The inseams on these trunks have been adjusted to fit you perfectly. S and M have a 3.5″ inseam while L and XL have a 4.5″ inseam. Once you see how good you look in these Bermies you will never want to go back!

Every pair of Bermies comes in size S, M, L &
column8:
XL and are made to fit! This means that they'll feel very comfortable on your waist and you wont feel like they are squeezing you! You can also review our size guide by clicking here.

Bermies targets individuals who share a love for the water and the outdoors. 

Perfect for every occasion, you can wear Bermies at the beach, skiing at the lake, surfing in Bali or scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef. We build our Bermies community through our Instagram account (@bermies) where users share their pictures from their adventures around the world.

Tired of the unimaginative, we created a wide variety of patters to suit customers every need. The trunks have sharks, turtles, sailboats, scooters and even retro triangles. In turn the designs present a sense of class and coolness to them.

Visit www.bermies.com/swimtrunks to check them out in more detail!

At Bermies we care about our oceans and want to create awareness that we’re treating our oceans like trash bins. Plastic that pollutes our oceans is being eaten by seabirds, whales, sea turtles and other marine life causing them to die from choking, intestinal blockage and starvation.  In order to make this world a better place Bermies donates 10% of its profits to help clean up our oceans and protect marine life.

Bermies retail at $49.99 USD. You wont find this print point for this quality of swimwear anywhere in the world! As part of our kickstarter project we are offering an Early Bird Special Price of $25 USD to the first 100 backers. The remaining supporters will receive a presale discount price of only $30 USD. 

If we reach our Indigogo goal, those who have made a pledge for a pair of Bermies will be sent a coupon at the end of the campaign to choose their size and pattern on our site!

column1: Bermies is about building a community of like-minded people who share a passion for life, sustainability, innovation and the outdoors. Help us grow our community by donating and sharing our campaign so that you, and many others can receive their very first pair of Bermies and change swimwear for the better!

We are happy to inform you that we are starting a funding project we have worked on for six months!

Lives and norms in every place in the world have shifted dramatically in many ways from the beginning of the year 2020. We are confined to our home by the quarantine rules, work from home, and asked to wear a face mask every time we leave home. Fortunately, confirmed cases are going down, and some companies lifted their-work-from-home system.

In the midst of danger, there are heroes among us: they are volunteers from different sectors of society. They are showing courage and spreading love in helping the elderly and those who are in need. Especially, our healthcare workers, such as doctors, nurses, and emergency medical technicians.
It has drawn our attention that it is one of the most fundamental roles to appreciate their utmost effort in our community.
With our continued effort, we have created our own antibacterial fabric in hopes of contributing to our community.

DEAR MILER produced unique t-shirts made of antimicrobial fabrics along with symbolic messages about our sincere appreciation toward the heroes in our community. Our t-shirts are designed with different variations of symbolic shapes of hearts and New York landmarks such as the Empire State building.

We set up a goal to reach up to $5,000 for this project. After the funding ends, 50% of the profits, which we accomplished throughout this campaign, will be donated to those at the pandemic's front line, such as doctors, nurses, and medical technicians.

Regardless of the result of this campaign, whether we achieved our goal or not this time, we will help find ways to help our communities by developing new types of antimicrobial products in the nearest future.

• It's essential to take good care of daily products, arranging bags, clothing, and any items we have been touched to keep ourselves safe. Especially, garments are the most basic and indispensable products in our lives. Thus, choosing products made of antimicrobial materials will keep us out of harm's way. Be wise, be safe.

We have been working really hard on producing our Thank you T-shirts with manufacturers we could trust in S. Korea. We feel confident that we will meet our delivery schedule, but due to COVID-19, our deliveries could delay. We'd like to apologize in advance just in case this happens!

And that's all there is to it.

 

","Short Summary
We are happy to inform you that we are starting a funding project we have worked on for six months!

Lives and norms in every place in the world have shifted dramatically in many ways from the beginning of the year 2020. We are confined to our home by the quarantine rules, work from home, and asked to wear a face mask every time we leave home. Fortunately, confirmed cases are going down, and some companies lifted their-work-from-home system.

In the midst of danger, there are heroes among us: they are volunteers from different sectors of society. They are showing courage and spreading love in helping the elderly and those who are in need. Especially, our healthcare workers, such as doctors, nurses, and emergency medical technicians.
It has drawn our attention that it is one of the most fundamental roles to appreciate their utmost effort in our community.
With our continued effort, we have created our own antibacterial fabric in hopes of contributing to our community.

DEAR MILER produced unique t-shirts made of antimicrobial fabrics along with symbolic messages about our sincere appreciation toward the heroes in our community. Our t-shirts are designed with different variations of symbolic shapes of hearts and New York landmarks such as the Empire State building.
What We Need & What You Get

We set up a goal to reach up to $5,000 for this project. After the funding ends, 50% of the profits, which we accomplished throughout this campaign, will be donated to those at the pandemic's front line, such as doctors, nurses, and medical technicians.

Regardless of the result of this campaign, whether we achieved our goal or not this time, we will help find ways to help our communities by developing new types of antimicrobial products in the nearest future.

It's essential to take good care of daily products, arranging bags, clothing, and any items we have been touched to keep ourselves safe. Especially, garments are the most basic and indispensable products in our lives. Thus, choosing products made of antimicrobial materials will keep us out of harm's way. Be wise, be safe.

We have been working really hard on producing our Thank you T-shirts with manufacturers we could trust in S. Korea. We feel confident that we will meet our delivery schedule, but due to COVID-19, our deliveries could delay. We'd like to apologize in advance just in case this happens!
And that's all there is to it.",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Hi! It's nice to meet everyone! I'm Fish, the artist of LittleFishStickStudio. This is my first Indiegogo project I've ever created, so I'm excited to share it with everyone. This project, the Umbrella Ita Bag, has been in the works since June.

It began with the desire to do more for our community. The goal is to not only be able to produce this trans pride ita bag, but to raise funds for the Trans Women Of Color Collective (TWOCC). This campaign however is a fixed one, so it's all or nothing. If the goal is not met everyone who has contributed will be refunded. However If the goal is met, about 21% of each bag's total cost will go towards Trans Women of Color Collective (TWOCC).

For those not familiar with an ita bag, it is a bag that has a clear window to display a person's favorite things. Whether it's pins, charms, or other forms of art, you can display them creatively! 

This design is a representation that while we are all individually unique, we all are under the same umbrella within the lgbtqa+ community. 

Made of faux(vegan) leather, the outside features four d-rings that convert it from a backpack into a cross body, giving it versatility to match your mood. Two outer zipper compartments
column2: the windowed area, and the main compartment for holding daily necessities. While the inside features a small zippered pouch and two open pouches you can put easy to lose items in that need safe keeping.

column1:
Bag dimensions: 6 (L) x 12(W) x 4.5 (H)
Window Space:  9½ (L) x 4  ¼ (H)
Backpack Straps: 19"" -35 ½""
Crossbody Strap: 27"" - 52 ½

column2: >    If the initial goal is met, there are 7 more pride bag variations to unlock!

column1:
• For every 2 bags, there is a $5 discount.
    (Ex: 2 Umbrella ita bags are $95 and 4 are $190)
**Once the campaign is over, the Indiegogo rates will discontinue.**

The campaign will last for 31 days (until December 31st). Once the campaign ends it will take 2 weeks for funds to become available. Surveys will be sent out during via BackerKit. In BackerKit you can choose your bag color and add on any extra items needed, along with filling out your information.

Surveys will be due at the end of the 2 weeks when funds release (January 15th). Once those are complete, the final order will be sent in for production. From there production time may vary depending on how many backers support this project. If just the initial goal is met, the estimate for production time is about 4-8 weeks (February-March) . If the goal is exceeded this time can be prolonged. Once production is finished, shipment will take around 4-6 weeks (April-May) to arrive and then I can fulfill orders!

These prices are just estimates to give an idea of what to expect! Exact shipping will be calculated in BackerKit by weight and location. Due package size restrictions I can only ship out 2 bags per package, so if more than 2 are ordered, expect extra packages!
**Shipping will not be charged until after the campaign ends!!**

The most common risks and challenges with this project is delays. On the manufacturing side there may be delays due to covid19. Depending on how many backers this project receives as well, the production time could increase. Lastly there's the possibility that some bags won't make the production cut and need to be remade.

On my side there could be a delay in shipping if there are a large amount of backers as I'm a singular creator. I will be sure to keep everyone updated on any of these potential delays if they occur.
Once the campaign ends and payment is collected, there will be no refunds for any reason. Please keep this in mind when choosing to support this project.
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
• Visit TWOCC's page and share their mission to others!

And that's all there is to it.

The P-51 Mustang watch comes with a beautiful black 'leather' box.

 

 

The P-51 Mustang Pilot's Watch - a timepiece inspired by an iconic WWII story.

Historic plane enthusiasts and experienced watchmakers Ronald &
column6:
Guido Steffen from Antwerp, Belgium decided to pay homage to the P-51 Mustang by creating a watch that shares the same dynamism, agility and craftsmanship as this legendary airplane. Power and speed were to be the key words.

 

Discover this beautiful watch and reserve yours today!

Watches made in Switzerland are the best in the world. They have a long tradition of being incredibly precise, resistant and compact. Up until now, their quality is unequalled.

Strict Swiss regulations: movement manufactured in Switzerland , assembled and inspected in Switzerland, 60% or more components must be sourced from Switzerland.

Enjoy the beauty of the details of this watch. Top and bottom parts are polished and the middle part is horizontally brushed.

There are so many details to discover when you look at the watch.

 

 Nothing gives you a better feeling than wearing a great watch!

 

“Watches are more than just timepieces, they reflect a passion,
a way of living.”  

Ronald Steffen, RSC watch designer.

The Belgian watch designer Ronald Steffen was born in Zug, near the heart of the Swiss watch industry. He studied photography and graphic design at the Royal Academy of Antwerp, Belgium. He is also the founder of the exclusive Swiss made brand STEFFEN (WWW.STEFFEN.BE). Passionate about aviation and specifically military aircraft, he designed the unique RSC (Ronald Steffen Creations) collection, with the aura of these nostalgic times. The result is this unique watch collection, designed with an eye for detail. The back of the watch is engraved with a beautiful etching of the airplane and presented in an original RSC box.

Ronald Steffen Co-founder and designer of the Mustang watch.

 

PRODUCTION

The term 'the whole is greater than the sum of its parts' certainly applies to the RSC P-51 Mustang Pilot Watch. The 20 separate parts that make up this unique timepiece are manually assembled to create a perfect wrist watch. The P-51 Mustang Pilot Watch also features a solid screwed case back with notches. The front and back of the watch are covered by scratch-resistant sapphire glass, an absolute necessity in a pilot's watch of this calibre. The watch's movement is installed from the top, creating unparalleled stability. The crown is screwed into the watch at a slight angle, making the piece water resistant up to 10 ATM. The face of the watch also indicates the date, with juxtaposing white digits on a black background. The 316L stainless steel case is partly polished partly matt brushed. Minor details such as the delicate screws which hold together the case are testament to the craftsmanship that goes into each watch.

 

Because we're convinced that a lot of Backers want to give this watch as a Christmas present to a friend or beloved one, we created a PDF RSC Mustang Christmas Voucher. The moment you receive our survey with your choice of watch (beginning of December), we will send you a PDF file that you can print,  you can put in a nice envelop and hand it over as a present.

 

• SWISS MADE

• Automatic ETA movement 2824-2

• ± 38 hours power reserve

• Stainless steel 316L case

• Multi-layered dial

• Strong luminescence

• See through case back with sapphire crystal

• Every watch has a unique number

• Date indication: at 6 o’clock

• Strong leather strap assortment

• Water resistant 10 ATM (100m / 33 ft) with double gasket screw down crown

Case sizes:
diameter: 44 mm - diameter + crown: 54 mm - thickness: 14 mm

Strap:
strap + watch length: 280mm - strap width: 22mm - buckle width: 30mm

Total weight watch + leather strap: 128 g
 

Swiss movement manufacturer ETA SA has been developing and producing calibres for the watch industry since 1793.

Screwed down crown in order to obtain water resistance of 10 ATM.

 

• SWISS MADE

• ETA 2824-2 movement

• 28.800 bph / 25 jewels / 42h power reserve   

Swiss movement manufacturer ETA SA has been developing and producing calibres for the watch industry since 1793.

Precision, reliability and level of performance are the key features of their products.       

 

Sapphire glass is created by crystallizing corundum, or aluminium oxide, at temperatures of 4000° F and then by moulding the mixture into clear disks. These disks are then machined to the proper crystal size, polished, and perfectly fit to the watch case.

 In fact, it has a hardness of 9 on the Mohs scale that ranges from 1 to 10, and is surpassed in hardness only by diamond. The major advantages of sapphire and the drawbacks of mineral crystals are summed up in the table above.

 

The dials are dual layered with cut-outs, that give much more 3D feeling than a normal dial. The paintings are perfectly matte and the printing is very precisely done

The 03, 09, the big hour stripes, part of the logo at 12 o'clock and the date border at 6 'o clock are luminous, giving light all night.

 

We find it extremely important that every watch has its own identity. By giving every watch a unique LIMITED number, the watchmaker gives his creation personally to you. 

The maximum amount of watches will be 200 pieces.

 

 Shipping cost worldwide €15 (or $20 or£15)                     

The estimated delivery time of the product depends on your country.         

Please be aware that international customers are still responsible for duties charged by their respective countries. You can have more information on: www.dutycalculator.com. 

For US backers: no import taxes for watches under $800 value.

 

You get a 2 years INTERNATIONAL Warranty: it does mean even if you have a small problem with your watch, we can find a solution for you in the best delays. We have experience in after-sales service so we can deal with any situations. Moreover, even after these 2 years, it will be very easy to maintain your RSC watch as the Swiss movement is a well-known calibre in the Watch industry.

RSC (Ronald Steffen Creations) is a watch company that produces beautifully designed pilot timepieces at its Headquarters in Antwerp, Belgium.

RSC is a Belgian brand started by brothers Ronald and Guido Steffen, both born in Zug, Switzerland. Ronald Steffen is no stranger to the watchmaking industry, having started the brand 'Steffen' in 2006. The Steffen collection consists of premium Swiss Made timepieces, for both men and women. The brothers decided in 2014 to branch out, introducing a line of pilot's watches to the market. Unique, quality-driven watches that offer exceptional value for money. 

 

P-51 Mustang

The North American Aviation P-51 Mustang is an American long-range, single (or two)-seat fighter and fighter-bomber used during World War II, the Korean War and other conflicts. From late 1943, P-51Bs were used by the USAAF’s Eighth Air Force to escort bombers in raids over Germany, while the RAF’s 2 TAF and the USAAF’s Ninth Air Force used the Merlin-powered Mustangs as fighter-bombers, roles in which the Mustang helped ensure Allied air superiority in 1944. The P-51 was also in service with Allied air forces in the North African, Mediterranean and Italian theatres. During World War II, Mustang pilots claimed 4,950 enemy aircraft shot down.       

 

When do I need to change the battery? 
NEVER! The watch has a mechanical movement that is powered by you.

Why did you decide for ETA movement for the Mustang watch? 
It’s the most reliable automatic movement in the world. Tag Heur, Omega and Longines all use this movement.

How can I add something to my pledge? 
If you find yourself wishing you would have gotten 2 or more watches it's very easy to add a watch to your order. All you will need to do is “edit your pledge.” This option will allow you to select the pledge you prefer. Remember that you will choose your watches at the end of the campaign when a survey will be sent.

How long will my watch be under warranty?
2 Years. We cannot warrant customers who break their watches due to wear and tear.

Who do you use for shipping international orders? 
We will use different shipping companies, depending on your country.

What parts of the watch are luminescent? 
The big hour indication stripes, the 03 &

column3: >eree™ system, a total home solution that enables your pet to learn what is off limits and help you monitor his behavior.

column1: With rufferee you can count, timestamp and monitor any interactions between your pet and various objects throughout your home.
The system includes a collar and three flags that work together to communicate with your pet and you.  Simply put the collar on your pet and place the flags on items you want to monitor.
Using the free app, you can sync the collar to your smart device and each flag can be assigned as avoidance or monitor per pet. Flags are useful all over the home!
rufferee will work with both cats and dogs and can be used with multiple pets in the same home. When
programming each flag you can even designate different settings for each pet.
rufferee enables you to set your mind at ease and allow you to feel more comfortable, enabling you to give your pet(s) more freedom even when you are not home.

The rufferee system is highly customizable, since you can program a single flag to have different settings for each pet. Monitor one dog's food dish visits and keep the other dog out of it. Keep your cat from scratching the couch while letting the dog lay on it. The system can be customized to work with all your pets and a variety of needs.

column2: >Collect stats on your pet's actions throughout the day by setting your flags to monitor mode. See how many times your pet visited each flag, what time he was there and how long he stayed.  Adjust the range to match the approximate size area you want to monitor.  For example, you can set the range of the flag to near for a small water bowl.

column1: Teach your pet when he is out of bounds by setting your flags to avoidance mode. Place a flag on the object you want your pet to avoid, and set the range for the flag to tell the system how close the pet should be before he receives a warning. You can choose between two correction settings: vibration or non-harming static correction.  No matter which setting you choose, there will be a warning tone preceding the vibration or correction.

rufferee can be used in a variety of ways to fit your lifestyle. From furniture to rooms and tables, you can customize where to put the flags and how your pet(s) interact with them.  Want to monitor how often the cat is using the litterbox while also keeping the dog out of it? ONE rufferee flag can accomplish both.

column2: >You can also use it indoors or outdoors to:

>Protect your plants
Keep pets off the stairs
Keep them out of the pantry
Know if they're in the garage
Know if they use the dog door
Keep pets off your desk
Keep pets out of a flower bed
Have them stay away from the grill
And many more
>Use the rufferee app to program any number of collars and an unlimited number of flags for each pet. Each flag can even have different settings for each pet in your home.
>Buying gates, an activity monitor and deterrents could cost you hundreds of dollars!
column5: >eree is discrete, versatile and fully programmable enabling you and your pet(s) to be on the same team, for a fraction of the cost.

column1: Our mission is to build the most trusted pet brand.  In order to continue to innovate, we look beyond the things we have done in the past and try to explore new opportunities.  We strive to create unique, cutting edge products based on what our customers’ want and need.  Using this platform enables us to validate that there are tech-savvy pet parents who want and need a product like this before we go to production. Your feedback and input are essential, driving us to new groundbreaking product development.

We are a small team focused on innovative product development.  Yes, we are a part of a larger corporation but we too have to convince our investors that the solutions we have created are something that our customers want and need.  The team is continually exploring new technology that we can use to help make our relationships with our pets better.  We live by the philosophy of fail hard and fail fast.  By continuing to reiterate and design new solutions we can pursue new ways to use technology.  From reinventing something from the past to solving a common problem in a new way.  By embodying the start-up mentality, we are always striving to achieve more.  We cannot bring this product to a reality without your support.

Because we design our products at the leading edge of technology, there is always the possibility of unexpected challenges. What we can promise you, is that we will continually communicate our successes and challenges as the project progresses. In addition, our greatest strength is in production.  We have great relationships with top manufacturers, suppliers and engineers who are experienced in bringing products of this sort to market.  We have a strong understanding of the challenges building products of this nature and are confident that if this project is a success, we will be able to produce.

Does this system work for any size dog or cat? Do you have different collar sizes?
The system can work for most dogs and cats.  The dog collar fits neck sizes 6 - 28 inches and the cat collar fits neck sizes up to 11.5 inches. We will collect your size preference after the campaign.

What is the battery life of the collar? Of the flags?
The collar should last about a week and the flags should last about 9 months.  The collar battery life will vary slightly depending on the activity level of your pet.

Is the smartphone app available on all devices?
Yes, the app will be available on both iOS and android.
We suggest you choose one of the 2 pet perks and one of the 1 pet perks.

How many flags can be in use at one time?
You can use as many flags as you need.  There is no limit to the number of flags that can be programmed to a collar.  Each pet can have their own settings per flag so you can maximize how best to use each flag within your home.

column2:
>How many collars can I use at one time?
You can use as many collars as you need.

column3: >Are static correction products harmful to my pet?

> correction has been proven safe and will not harm your pet. It is a very mild electric stimulation that does not cause harm. The correction is designed to gently get your pet’s attention or interrupt undesirable behavior but never to harm them. Most PetSafe® static training products start with a warning beep, which is enough to remind most pets of what they’ve learned. When trained correctly, they rarely experience the electric stimulation again.
>eree uses a progressive stimulation, where the closer the pet gets to the flag, the stronger the correction.  The collar has a safety feature where it will automatically time out after 15 seconds.

column2: >Can the static correction be turned off?
>Yes, we know all pets are different.  That is why we give you two different ways to help you teach your pet, vibration or static correction.
>How will I know if the flag and collar are connected?
>When programming the collar and flags for the first time, they flash to signify that the app has recognized them.  You can then view everything in the app including activity and battery level.
>What if the ranges are not enough?
>Because the flags use Bluetooth LE, the placement
column3: > and orientation of the flags can impact the range.  We suggest you start with the flag in a range that most closely resembles the area you would like to either monitor or avoid.  Then if the detection range of the flag is too large or too small, try altering the orientation of the flag. This will modify the direction that the antenna is facing which will impact your range.

column1: Developing a new product in the USA has a significant amount of regulation and testing and to include international quality and regulation standards, this would potentially expand our timeline even further..  In order to make sure we can hit our timeline, we are unable to offer rufferee internationally.
","Introducing the PetSafe® rufferee™ system, a total home solution that enables your pet to learn what is off limits and help you monitor his behavior.
With rufferee you can count, timestamp and monitor any interactions between your pet and various objects throughout your home.
The system includes a collar and three flags that work together to communicate with your pet and you.  Simply put the collar on your pet and place the flags on items you want to monitor.
Using the free app, you can sync the collar to your smart device and each flag can be assigned as avoidance or monitor per pet. Flags are useful all over the home!
rufferee will work with both cats and dogs and can be used with multiple pets in the same home. When
programming each flag you can even designate different settings for each pet.
rufferee enables you to set your mind at ease and allow you to feel more comfortable, enabling you to give your pet(s) more freedom even when you are not home.

The rufferee system is highly customizable, since you can program a single flag to have different settings for each pet. Monitor one dog's food dish visits and keep the other dog out of it. Keep your cat from scratching the couch while letting the dog lay on it. The system can be customized to work with all your pets and a variety of needs.

Collect stats on your pet's actions throughout the day by setting your flags to monitor mode. See how many times your pet visited each flag, what time he was there and how long he stayed.  Adjust the range to match the approximate size area you want to monitor.  For example, you can set the range of the flag to near for a small water bowl.

Teach your pet when he is out of bounds by setting your flags to avoidance mode. Place a flag on the object you want your pet to avoid, and set the range for the flag to tell the system how close the pet should be before he receives a warning. You can choose between two correction settings: vibration or non-harming static correction.  No matter which setting you choose, there will be a warning tone preceding the vibration or correction.

rufferee can be used in a variety of ways to fit your lifestyle. From furniture to rooms and tables, you can customize where to put the flags and how your pet(s) interact with them.  Want to monitor how often the cat is using the litterbox while also keeping the dog out of it? ONE rufferee flag can accomplish both.
You can also use it indoors or outdoors to:

Protect your plantsKeep pets off the stairsKeep them out of the pantryKnow if they're in the garageKnow if they use the dog doorKeep pets off your deskKeep pets out of a flower bedHave them stay away from the grillAnd many more
Use the rufferee app to program any number of collars and an unlimited number of flags for each pet. Each flag can even have different settings for each pet in your home.

Buying gates, an activity monitor and deterrents could cost you hundreds of dollars! rufferee is discrete, versatile and fully programmable enabling you and your pet(s) to be on the same team, for a fraction of the cost.

Our mission is to build the most trusted pet brand.  In order to continue to innovate, we look beyond the things we have done in the past and try to explore new opportunities.  We strive to create unique, cutting edge products based on what our customers’ want and need.  Using this platform enables us to validate that there are tech-savvy pet parents who want and need a product like this before we go to production. Your feedback and input are essential, driving us to new groundbreaking product development.

We are a small team focused on innovative product development.  Yes, we are a part of a larger corporation but we too have to convince our investors that the solutions we have created are something that our customers want and need.  The team is continually exploring new technology that we can use to help make our relationships with our pets better.  We live by the philosophy of fail hard and fail fast.  By continuing to reiterate and design new solutions we can pursue new ways to use technology.  From reinventing something from the past to solving a common problem in a new way.  By embodying the start-up mentality, we are always striving to achieve more.  We cannot bring this product to a reality without your support.

Because we design our products at the leading edge of technology, there is always the possibility of unexpected challenges. What we can promise you, is that we will continually communicate our successes and challenges as the project progresses. In addition, our greatest strength is in production.  We have great relationships with top manufacturers, suppliers and engineers who are experienced in bringing products of this sort to market.  We have a strong understanding of the challenges building products of this nature and are confident that if this project is a success, we will be able to produce.

Does this system work for any size dog or cat? Do you have different collar sizes?The system can work for most dogs and cats.  The dog collar fits neck sizes 6 - 28 inches and the cat collar fits neck sizes up to 11.5 inches. We will collect your size preference after the campaign.

What is the battery life of the collar? Of the flags?The collar should last about a week and the flags should last about 9 months.  The collar battery life will vary slightly depending on the activity level of your pet.
Is the smartphone app available on all devices?Yes, the app will be available on both iOS and android.
What if I have three pets?
We suggest you choose one of the 2 pet perks and one of the 1 pet perks.

How many flags can be in use at one time?You can use as many flags as you need.  There is no limit to the number of flags that can be programmed to a collar.  Each pet can have their own settings per flag so you can maximize how best to use each flag within your home.
How many collars can I use at one time?You can use as many collars as you need.
Are static correction products harmful to my pet?

Static correction has been proven safe and will not harm your pet. It is a very mild electric stimulation that does not cause harm. The correction is designed to gently get your pet’s attention or interrupt undesirable behavior but never to harm them. Most PetSafe® static training products start with a warning beep, which is enough to remind most pets of what they’ve learned. When trained correctly, they rarely experience the electric stimulation again.

rufferee uses a progressive stimulation, where the closer the pet gets to the flag, the stronger the correction.  The collar has a safety feature where it will automatically time out after 15 seconds.
Can the static correction be turned off?
Yes, we know all pets are different.  That is why we give you two different ways to help you teach your pet, vibration or static correction.
How will I know if the flag and collar are connected?
When programming the collar and flags for the first time, they flash to signify that the app has recognized them.  You can then view everything in the app including activity and battery level.
What if the ranges are not enough?

Because the flags use Bluetooth LE, the placement and orientation of the flags can impact the range.  We suggest you start with the flag in a range that most closely resembles the area you would like to either monitor or avoid.  Then if the detection range of the flag is too large or too small, try altering the orientation of the flag. This will modify the direction that the antenna is facing which will impact your range.
Why is there no International Shipping?

Developing a new product in the USA has a significant amount of regulation and testing and to include international quality and regulation standards, this would potentially expand our timeline even further..  In order to make sure we can hit our timeline, we are unable to offer rufferee internationally.",45.0,2,"1 Campaign

column1: quality leather bags for men, iPad sleeves and iPhone cases. Handmade in France
to preserve the legacy of an industry known for the quality of its arts and
experienced this situation when pockets are unpleasantly over stuffed?
pockets, not enough for a backpack, you sometimes insist not to bother our
girlfriend and finally realize that huge holes appeared in our pockets (made of
textile increasingly fragile and cheap), you can see the shape of our phone on
jeans (which pockets are increasingly tight), the inside pockets of this super
expensive but nice jacket deformed by our wallet. Or worse, you forget THE thing
that should not be forgotten at this very moment, and have this argument with
your girlfriend, because you asked her to carry your stuff for the fifteenth
spending time at my family house in Ain, France and decided to go through the
attic before its renovation. As I was going up there, I was sure to find
amazing things, treasures from my grand-parents’ past. I wasn't disappointed
when I ran into the small leather satchel, a “Baise-en-ville” model that my
great grand-father used to transport his small medical equipment during the
1940s. He had given it to my grand-father, and it seemed that he left it there
for me to find one day.
survived all this time and its robust leather carries the marks of the past and
before I realized how useful the satchel was. Its small size made it really
practical to handle and carry everywhere. It came in handy when I started
wearing suits, jackets and more elegant clothes. The problem is that your
pockets and the fabric wear out and you quickly feel uncomfortable when you
have to fill up your pockets with your wallet, smartphone…
me with an elegant and practical solution to this problem!
fell in love with my great grand-father’s “BEV”, its history, its simplicity
and its usefulness, and I wanted to keep on writing the story of the
the “BEV” had totally disappeared from man fashion but does bring a solution to
a lot of a man’s issues when he wants to dress sharply and elegantly and still
needs to carry some things around. That’s why I decided to gather a small
team of young and willing entrepreneurs to help me share my discovery and this
little piece of history I found and create this brand : De Rigueur.
left to right : Jérôme, Manon, and me (Adrien), the founding team of De
Rigueur, now the team has grown up, with Alexandra and another Adrien!
the design of the BEV, so that it would fit the everyday needs of the modern
man : carrying an iPad, with an adjustable leather strap and an inside pocket
to put your flat documents (ID, credit cards...).
precise idea of what we wanted, we went to meet many and many stakeholders of
the leather industry : cutting tools manufacturers, metallic parts sellers,
tanneries, leather skins providers, craftsmen (and of course bankers, insurers,
accountants...). That's when the story of De Rigueur really began.
directly to the French sentence: “Tenue de rigueur”, the necessary outfit according
to the situation you're experiencing. The idea is to make our bag your
everyday's best friend, carrying what you need the most and becoming essential
to our craftsmen’s meticulous work which is at the very heart of the brand.
Indeed this work requires riguor and time to get to a beautiful handcrafted
product. In fact, all craftmen we work with have a real experience in the
handmade leather industry, with years of work with prestige luxury houses, like
daughter, Maud, our amazing craftswomen. They worked for Hermès for a while,
and are now following projects for various young companies like De
appropriate considering the economic environment: we are a startup of the
crisis, born in a world where governments are implementing austerity policies,
or “politique de rigueur” in French, instead of encouraging people to create
companies and jobs. And we know what we are talking about … as we are French!!
So De Rigueur is our way to tell them “Whatever!”.
thing with ""De Rigueur"", is that this word is fully understandable in
English too, and means the same thing, like ""Déjà vu"",
this project 1 000% for 10 months now, travelling across France to find the
best craftsmen, and Italy for the best materials, and are really, really happy,
to show you our very first collection !
crowdfunding 20 000€ in order to reach a sufficient amount of handcrafted
production to bargain costs with our suppliers and craftsmen, so that we would
be able to finance our e-commerce website, that we will launch during the
Official Launch of the brand in September in Paris.
through this campaign will be the first ones to ever receive these beautiful
items into which we put so much love and energy to bring them to life. We
worked on a variety of products in order to satisfy everyone wanting to help us
in the development of this project, but in case you can't afford to pledge
here, we will be reeeeeaally grateful if you could share this project in your
Baise-En-Ville"", is a very old model of small French satchels made
of leather used in the 30's to carry one's personal belongings, while spending
a night in the city before going back to the countryside.
full grain calfskin leather coming from Toscana, Italy, this high quality
leather is vegetable re-tanned in an eco-friendly way, which allows it to get a
very nice patina, without losing its quality and color.
leather? A cow's skin is about 2cm thick. The tannery can split a hide as many
as four times, but all splits are not equal. The ""grain"" is the
top/skin side of the hide and is the best and strongest part of the hide.
Full-grain leather is the very top split that has not been sanded or resurfaced
to hide or remove color variation, scars or blemishes. These marks are signs of
the cow’s life and, as  far as I’m concerned, not real imperfections,
because they add character to a bag. But in my opinion the character of your
bag must mostly come from the way it is living by your side, getting this nice
patina that only time and life can create.
metallic parts, which come from France, Italy, or Germany. They are conceived
to resist the daily use for years :
is a high quality fabric (called suedin), which matches the color of the bag.
Moreover, an inside pocket will allow you to quickly find your flat documents
worked with craftswomen near Lyon, France (at Colombier-Saugnieu and
Challes-les-Eaux if you are curious). See the picture of Jacqueline and Maud
them big enough to carry your things around but not too big so you won't feel
hoarded. The BEV is  260mm x 200mm x 60mm. This is big enough to put
your wallet, smartphone, keys, a book and even your iPad! Indeed it was
designed so your tablet could fit inside (iPad 2, Air, Retina, Mini).

column6: >If you have read everything to this point, you need to know we really

column1: quality leather bags for men, iPad sleeves and iPhone cases. Handmade in France
to preserve the legacy of an industry known for the quality of its arts and
experienced this situation when pockets are unpleasantly over stuffed?
pockets, not enough for a backpack, you sometimes insist not to bother our
girlfriend and finally realize that huge holes appeared in our pockets (made of
textile increasingly fragile and cheap), you can see the shape of our phone on
jeans (which pockets are increasingly tight), the inside pockets of this super
expensive but nice jacket deformed by our wallet. Or worse, you forget THE thing
that should not be forgotten at this very moment, and have this argument with
your girlfriend, because you asked her to carry your stuff for the fifteenth
spending time at my family house in Ain, France and decided to go through the
attic before its renovation. As I was going up there, I was sure to find
amazing things, treasures from my grand-parents’ past. I wasn't disappointed
when I ran into the small leather satchel, a “Baise-en-ville” model that my
great grand-father used to transport his small medical equipment during the
1940s. He had given it to my grand-father, and it seemed that he left it there
for me to find one day.
survived all this time and its robust leather carries the marks of the past and
before I realized how useful the satchel was. Its small size made it really
practical to handle and carry everywhere. It came in handy when I started
wearing suits, jackets and more elegant clothes. The problem is that your
pockets and the fabric wear out and you quickly feel uncomfortable when you
have to fill up your pockets with your wallet, smartphone…
me with an elegant and practical solution to this problem!
fell in love with my great grand-father’s “BEV”, its history, its simplicity
and its usefulness, and I wanted to keep on writing the story of the
the “BEV” had totally disappeared from man fashion but does bring a solution to
a lot of a man’s issues when he wants to dress sharply and elegantly and still
needs to carry some things around. That’s why I decided to gather a small
team of young and willing entrepreneurs to help me share my discovery and this
little piece of history I found and create this brand : De Rigueur.
left to right : Jérôme, Manon, and me (Adrien), the founding team of De
Rigueur, now the team has grown up, with Alexandra and another Adrien!
the design of the BEV, so that it would fit the everyday needs of the modern
man : carrying an iPad, with an adjustable leather strap and an inside pocket
to put your flat documents (ID, credit cards...).
precise idea of what we wanted, we went to meet many and many stakeholders of
the leather industry : cutting tools manufacturers, metallic parts sellers,
tanneries, leather skins providers, craftsmen (and of course bankers, insurers,
accountants...). That's when the story of De Rigueur really began.
directly to the French sentence: “Tenue de rigueur”, the necessary outfit according
to the situation you're experiencing. The idea is to make our bag your
everyday's best friend, carrying what you need the most and becoming essential
to our craftsmen’s meticulous work which is at the very heart of the brand.
Indeed this work requires riguor and time to get to a beautiful handcrafted
product. In fact, all craftmen we work with have a real experience in the
handmade leather industry, with years of work with prestige luxury houses, like
daughter, Maud, our amazing craftswomen. They worked for Hermès for a while,
and are now following projects for various young companies like De
appropriate considering the economic environment: we are a startup of the
crisis, born in a world where governments are implementing austerity policies,
or “politique de rigueur” in French, instead of encouraging people to create
companies and jobs. And we know what we are talking about … as we are French!!
So De Rigueur is our way to tell them “Whatever!”.
thing with ""De Rigueur"", is that this word is fully understandable in
English too, and means the same thing, like ""Déjà vu"",
this project 1 000% for 10 months now, travelling across France to find the
best craftsmen, and Italy for the best materials, and are really, really happy,
to show you our very first collection !
crowdfunding 20 000€ in order to reach a sufficient amount of handcrafted
production to bargain costs with our suppliers and craftsmen, so that we would
be able to finance our e-commerce website, that we will launch during the
Official Launch of the brand in September in Paris.
through this campaign will be the first ones to ever receive these beautiful
items into which we put so much love and energy to bring them to life. We
worked on a variety of products in order to satisfy everyone wanting to help us
in the development of this project, but in case you can't afford to pledge
here, we will be reeeeeaally grateful if you could share this project in your
Baise-En-Ville"", is a very old model of small French satchels made
of leather used in the 30's to carry one's personal belongings, while spending
a night in the city before going back to the countryside.
full grain calfskin leather coming from Toscana, Italy, this high quality
leather is vegetable re-tanned in an eco-friendly way, which allows it to get a
very nice patina, without losing its quality and color.
leather? A cow's skin is about 2cm thick. The tannery can split a hide as many
as four times, but all splits are not equal. The ""grain"" is the
top/skin side of the hide and is the best and strongest part of the hide.
Full-grain leather is the very top split that has not been sanded or resurfaced
to hide or remove color variation, scars or blemishes. These marks are signs of
the cow’s life and, as  far as I’m concerned, not real imperfections,
because they add character to a bag. But in my opinion the character of your
bag must mostly come from the way it is living by your side, getting this nice
patina that only time and life can create.
metallic parts, which come from France, Italy, or Germany. They are conceived
to resist the daily use for years :
is a high quality fabric (called suedin), which matches the color of the bag.
Moreover, an inside pocket will allow you to quickly find your flat documents
worked with craftswomen near Lyon, France (at Colombier-Saugnieu and
Challes-les-Eaux if you are curious). See the picture of Jacqueline and Maud
them big enough to carry your things around but not too big so you won't feel
hoarded. The BEV is  260mm x 200mm x 60mm. This is big enough to put
your wallet, smartphone, keys, a book and even your iPad! Indeed it was
designed so your tablet could fit inside (iPad 2, Air, Retina, Mini).

column2:
What is ""Stains Away""?

We are Stains Away, but that means nothing right? Well we are a company who wants the everyday consumer, like yourself, to be able to own the revolution in garment care!

column1: There is nothing worse than buying a brand new crystal white shirt and spilling something down it! Whether that's red wine, tomato sauce or just about anything. The chances are, it is stained and it is ruined. Right? Or is it?

Well, if you have watched the video at the top of this page, you will see a t shirt that has been sprayed with Stains Away. See how the water and red wine do not penetrate the fabric and just run off it? Well, this could be your crystal white shirt you spill something down. Not stained. Not ruined.
• Neutral colour (Does not affect the appearance of the surface in any way)
• Tolerant of high temperatures (Up to 450 celsius peak temperature)
We feel everyone should own a bottle of Stains Away because let's be honest
column2: we all spill things down our clothes!

column7: >What industries can Stains Away be used in?

column1: Stains Away can be used in any way you can think of, however crazy it may seem! If you need a fabric protecting, Stains Away can do the job!
Well, you should get yourself over to the right hand side of the page and get yourself an exclusive perk! These perks are for backers only (because you guys are the most important!).
However much you'd like to put in to the campaign, we appreciate every little bit!

Now get sharing guys! People need to hear about this! Whether it's Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest or any other social media, give this campaign a share using the tools at the top of this page! We promise it will be worth it when you receive your perk(s) you have selected!
Q. What area will 100ml of Stains Away cover?
Q. How long will the effect last for?
A. It will last for around 5 years. However, we recommend spraying your garment every 6-12 months to have the best effect.
Q. If I wash my garment will the Stains Away effect be lost?
A. Absolutely not! It will not diminish the effect.
Q. Does the garment have to be clean first?
A. YES! What ever dirt or residue is left on the garment before spraying will then be trapped under the layer of Stains Away.
Q. Why have I never seen anything like this before?

A. Nanotechnology itself isn't all that new, however, the ability to bring it to the mass market like we are trying to do and give the everyday consumer the chance to own and utilise nanotechnology in the protection of garments  is quite new.

Contact us! (We promise to reply within 48 hours!)


For any general enquiries/questions - Support@stainsaway.co.uk
For companies/individuals looking for partnership or more information regarding distribution of Stains Away - Admin@stainsaway.co.uk

Estimated Delivery of ALL Perks - October 2014

Coen Anders is founded upon a love for fashion and an appreciation for life's unexpected adventures. Led by a keen eye on runway trends and contemporary lifestyle, each piece is created to complement any outfit or occasion seamlessly so that your look can truly be complete.

column2: >We know that watches have become more than just a way to tell time.
>To some, they may be iconic accessories that define your personality
column3: to most, they're companions that take you through your day with style.

• 4 Dial &
column2:
Case Options: 
White (Rose Gold), White (Silver), Black (Rose Gold), Black (Silver)
• 9 Interchangeable Straps: Calf Leather, Suede Leather, and Nylon NATO

column1: Inspired by contemporary fashion, clean lines, and the natural colour palettes that surround us, we designed beautiful combinations to accentuate these moments in time. With an array of straps to choose from, Coen Anders is perfect for everyday use, with options for you to switch up your looks.

column5: >Choose Your Moment – A Coen Anders for any outfit, any occasion.

column3:
>Coffee date with an old friend, 
Summer days by the beach,
column10: >Weekend picnics in the park,

column3:
>
Our watches have been thoughtfully conceptualised based on elements and principles that are integral in design. By carefully considering what makes things visually appealing, Coen Anders watches are effortlessly chic and timeless.

column1:
​Proportion
Just like how the right silhouette can turn you from drab to fab, your watch should flatter your wrist as well. Designed for both men and women, Coen Anders watches are assembled with cohesive components for a streamlined appearance that hugs your wrist naturally.

Texture
Suit up with leather, or party on with NATO – different straps were created to pair with different outfits harmoniously. Coen Anders is offered in varied options of 2 leather straps, 2 suede straps, and 5 NATO straps. Soft and durable, all of these look great and feel great on your wrist.

Through meticulous research and prototyping, we’ve fine-tuned the curvature of the watch case so that it appears thinner and sleeker, while retaining optimal fit and comfort for everyday wear.

• Curvature of the lugs

With angled lugs to provide a better fit to most wrists, Coen Anders watches fit comfortably with better alignment.

• Chronograph movement with refined hands and indices

Through key layering on the dial, we’ve managed to strike a minimalist feel while having distinctive features, giving Coen Anders a unique identity that is distinguishable from other pieces on the market.

• Dome glass

Using bespoke tapered edges and a blend of right angles, the smooth dome glass is scratch-resistant, while lending greater visibility with a sleek finish.

Coen Anders has gone through meticulous research, design, and prototyping, and we are now ready to share our watches with you. If this project gets funded (with your support, we certainly hope so!), we will do our absolute best to make sure everything goes according to plan so as to meet the promised deadlines. The <span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product does not meet our requirements after production
column3: however, with our extensive experience and close relationship with our manufacturer, we will work with them to ensure that production goes smoothly. We aim to streamline the process and deliver our beautiful watches to you before the expected delivery dates.

column1: In addition, we'll update you frequently on the progress and if anything else arises (good or bad, but hopefully mostly good), you'll be the first to know.
We thank you once again for taking the time to check out this project. We look forward to your support and contribution, and will work tirelessly to deliver Coen Anders to your doorsteps very soon!

>Q. How do I select the models I want?
>A. At the end of the campaign, we will send a survey to all our backers to select their choice of watch. In the survey, all our backers will be able to select any models that are featured.
>Q.  What are the exact sizes and dimensions of the watch and straps, and how does the warranty work?
>A. For additional details on these information, please visit this link http://www.coenanders.com/customer-care
>If your have questions that are unanswered, please feel free to send us an email to info@coenanders.com and we will attend to you as soon as possible!

Through meticulous research and prototyping, we’ve fine-tuned the curvature of the watch case so that it appears thinner and sleeker, while retaining optimal fit and comfort for everyday wear.• Curvature of the lugsWith angled lugs to provide a better fit to most wrists, Coen Anders watches fit comfortably with better alignment.

• Chronograph movement with refined hands and indicesThrough key layering on the dial, we’ve managed to strike a minimalist feel while having distinctive features, giving Coen Anders a unique identity that is distinguishable from other pieces on the market.• Dome glassUsing bespoke tapered edges and a blend of right angles, the smooth dome glass is scratch-resistant, while lending greater visibility with a sleek finish.

Coen Anders has gone through meticulous research, design, and prototyping, and we are now ready to share our watches with you. If this project gets funded (with your support, we certainly hope so!), we will do our absolute best to make sure everything goes according to plan so as to meet the promised deadlines. The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product does not meet our requirements after production
column2: however, with our extensive experience and close relationship with our manufacturer, we will work with them to ensure that production goes smoothly. We aim to streamline the process and deliver our beautiful watches to you before the expected delivery dates.

column1: In addition, we'll update you frequently on the progress and if anything else arises (good or bad, but hopefully mostly good), you'll be the first to know.
We thank you once again for taking the time to check out this project. We look forward to your support and contribution, and will work tirelessly to deliver Coen Anders to your doorsteps very soon!
Q. Where am I able to view high resolution images for the watches?
A. Please visit this link at www.coenanders.com to view the images.
Q. How do I select the models I want?
A. At the end of the campaign, we will send a survey to all our backers to select their choice of watch. In the survey, all our backers will be able to select any models that are featured.
Q.  What are the exact sizes and dimensions of the watch and straps, and how does the warranty work?
A. For additional details on these information, please visit this link http://www.coenanders.com/customer-care
If your have questions that are unanswered, please feel free to send us an email to info@coenanders.com and we will attend to you as soon as possible!",23.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

Combining quality, design and affordability, we have created a timepiece that stands out from the rest. Unsatisfied with the current watch market, DASHCHEN was created to bridge the gap between low-end affordable watches and luxury watches by creating a timepiece that draws on only desirable features from both ends of the watch spectrum.  

In August 2017, we exhibited at the Sydney International Jewellery Fair and with our unique timepieces, we were able to capture the attention of Jeweller (Australia and New Zealand's number 1 jewellery magazine) who featured us multiple times in their August issue. We also entered our timepieces into the Australian Jewellery Design Awards (JDA).

We became finalists in our category which was men's accessories. Our time at the Sydney International Jewellery Fair gave us an insight into the current watch market and the opportunity to speak to many watch designers who were shocked to hear about the prices of our timepieces.

(Please note that the colours may be different in person as the pictures use have been taken in a photo studio or are digitally rendered. For more photos please visit our website or any of our social media accounts.)

(Please note that the colours may be different in person as the pictures use have been taken in a photo studio or are digitally rendered. For more photos please visit our website or any of our social media accounts.)

You may be wondering why we did not launch in 2017 and waited until July in 2018 to launch. Well here is our explanation. At the end of 2017, we actually flew from Sydney, Australia all the way to Shenzhen, China to visit our watch manufacturer. During the visit, we discussed the complications of our design and some solutions to fix some of our flaws in the final product.

For example, when manufacturing the OCTOGRAPH, the dial of the watch had to perfectly fit into the case while also allowing all 6 hands to move freely. Because of the shape of the dial, the hands had to be redesigned and repositioned to allow for free movement on the dial while also maintaining a reasonable length to be able to tell the time. 

Our trip allowed us to meet our manufacturer face-to-face to establish a closer business relationship for the future and also allowed for effective communication. The end result is that we have a product that is up to our high standards despite the unique design, no quality or practicality of the watch is comprised. So we have taken all this time for you to enjoy yours.

Our 2018 Production Schedule

July-August: Indiegogo project is live and running

August - October: Order is placed with our manufacturer and all timepieces are expected to be completed by the end of October.

November: We ship out your orders and you can expect it to arrive by the end of November.

(Please note that there may be delays with shipping and manufacturing. If such issues arise (hopefully not!) you will be notified immediately).

How does Indiegogo work?
column2: >Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform, so it's different from a normal webshop. On Indiegogo, creators like us share our projects with the community to raise funds to bring the project to life.
column3: >In this case, we are sharing our new watch collection with you. We have refined the prototypes for all of our watches and our suppliers are ready to go to production. However, our suppliers all have minimum order requirements, so we need to gather enough volume to place our order. That's why we're here.
column4:
>By contributing to our project, you can get our new watches at a significant discount off of the future expected retail price. That discount is to thank you for helping us take the watches to production and for your patience as we complete our first production run. 

How do I get a watch?
column5:
>Select the ""perk"" that you would like in the Perks section and you'll be asked to select the colour you want and your payment details.

Where do you ship?
column6:
>We ship our timepieces everywhere! However, please check with your own customs/border security for any restrictions.

What's the cost of shipping? How about taxes and duties?
column7: >Shipping is free however as mentioned above, please check with your customs/border security for any restrictions.
column8:
>We are not responsible for any taxes/duty fees that may be applied so please check with the appropriate source for more information. From our research, most countries do not require taxes/duties for our product.

Can I interchange straps between the watches in this collection?
column9:
>Unfortunately, watch straps on all our watch models cannot be interchanged by the customer, however, we are more than happy to do it for you. For more information please visit dashchen.com or email us at info@dashchen.com.

What's the warranty on the watches?
column10:
>All watches are covered by a one-year international manufacturers warranty.  The warranty does not cover general wear, damage caused by accident, misuse, neglect or failed repair attempts. For more information please visit dashchen.com or email us at info@dashchen.com.

Limitations

There are some minor limitations that may be involved. The most important is shipping. Our estimated shipping time is when you can expect your timepiece to arrive by. Please keep in mind that the postal service may experience delays and shipping times may vary depending on your location so please allow for a few days extra. 

Manufacturing may be delayed again with postal services as some of our watch components comes from other countries such as Switzerland which means that any delays will affect the whole process. Also, our manufacturer may suffer difficulties whether with machinery or technical difficualties so please be patient with us if such issues are to arise.

We aim to be as transparent as possible so we will keep you updated if anything is to happen, however, we hope that this journey is as smooth as possible. So fingers crossed!

column1: Monique Siders (Nubia Sunshine) 41, Brooklyn NY, Reiki Practitioner, Life Coach, Fashion Designer, Stylist and Owner of KUSH Design. In designing I love creating garments that are uniquely designed to fit the customers personality and inner essence. Like taking the inner being and wearing their true self on the outside to share with the world. In my Reiki Healing practices, I learn and understand how to use universal love energy to heal the bodies mind. loving who the YOU, we BE

I began my career working as a Designer and a stylist in 1995. I was working for a small company Audrey Smaltz and the Ground Crew as a stylist for the Mercedes Benz Fashion week as well as for many well-known designers. For 7 years I styled for the industries top designers, making me a well-known fixture in mainstream top fashion brands. In 1998 I decided it was time for me to take my creative abilities and begin my own clothing line.

In 2001 I returned back to school to obtain a degree in fashion design, which I achieved in 2003. Since then I continued to freelance design, for many small companies in the fashion industry. I worked in all categories ranging from Childrenswear, Juniors, Missy, Lingerie, Young Mens , Mens and Big &
column2: tall.  In 2006 I began working full time with Sean John as a technical designer. This is where I learned core principles in Production, sourcing, patternmaking and quality control. I began to quickly learn the core components of working for a large name design company with all the details needed to grow a strong quality brand.

column1: I continue to work full time freelancing for companies as I build a budget and brand recognition for KUSH designs. KUSH designs is currently incorporated as a LLC (legal liability corporation), but is in the stages of re-developing. I have partnered with Pharaonic Designs another company I co-own, more established as a brand, to set up a re-launch of KUSH designs. There are no set day-to-day operations as I am still working to re-create the brand. Currently I am the primary investor with gifts and donations given from  friends, private organizations, and family.
I will need 8,000.00 to start running my business and day to operations, this will be broken into , expensis for fabric, machines/sourcing factories , advertising and building the brand.

I plan to offer t-shirts as a quick sell items, in order to build capital for the growing brand. I am offering free items as well as discounts on custom-ed pieces. The greater the donation the greater the discount.
If my goal is not met I will donate the funds to several charities i am affiliated with.

Your contribution will make a difference in that it will enable me to share a lifestyle brand that will give my customers a voice in how they want to be seen and represented thru the inner beauty within. healing inside to show on the outside. Giving a sense of love to self personified to others in the community of love.
I have already built a strong fan base around the brand and have become very inspirational in my love and support of others. Many see me as an inspiration for their own self growth.
Getting the word out about KUSH and lyfestyle brand is so important and is an extention of the loving support you can share. As i hope to continue to be a surce of strength and healing to others

follow me on indigogo as I build a strong lyfestyle brand!! KUSH design LLC

","Short Summary

Monique Siders (Nubia Sunshine) 41, Brooklyn NY, Reiki Practitioner, Life Coach, Fashion Designer, Stylist and Owner of KUSH Design. In designing I love creating garments that are uniquely designed to fit the customers personality and inner essence. Like taking the inner being and wearing their true self on the outside to share with the world. In my Reiki Healing practices, I learn and understand how to use universal love energy to heal the bodies mind. loving who the YOU, we BE

I began my career working as a Designer and a stylist in 1995. I was working for a small company Audrey Smaltz and the Ground Crew as a stylist for the Mercedes Benz Fashion week as well as for many well-known designers. For 7 years I styled for the industries top designers, making me a well-known fixture in mainstream top fashion brands. In 1998 I decided it was time for me to take my creative abilities and begin my own clothing line.

In 2001 I returned back to school to obtain a degree in fashion design, which I achieved in 2003. Since then I continued to freelance design, for many small companies in the fashion industry. I worked in all categories ranging from Childrenswear, Juniors, Missy, Lingerie, Young Mens , Mens and Big & tall.  In 2006 I began working full time with Sean John as a technical designer. This is where I learned core principles in Production, sourcing, patternmaking and quality control. I began to quickly learn the core components of working for a large name design company with all the details needed to grow a strong quality brand.

I continue to work full time freelancing for companies as I build a budget and brand recognition for KUSH designs. KUSH designs is currently incorporated as a LLC (legal liability corporation), but is in the stages of re-developing. I have partnered with Pharaonic Designs another company I co-own, more established as a brand, to set up a re-launch of KUSH designs. There are no set day-to-day operations as I am still working to re-create the brand. Currently I am the primary investor with gifts and donations given from  friends, private organizations, and family.
What We Need & What You Get

Giving a sense of love to self personified to others in the community of love.
I have already built a strong fan base around the brand and have become very inspirational in my love and support of others. Many see me as an inspiration for their own self growth.
Getting the word out about KUSH and lyfestyle brand is so important and is an extention of the loving support you can share. As i hope to continue to be a surce of strength and healing to others

column1:
Emi functions as a table lamp or a wall light, but what we think is that extra bit special is as a role-playing headwear, where you and your child get a free pass to a world of imagination and a safari adventure. 

(New! http://inhabitat.com/emi-from-lil-nika-is-a-fun...)

(Don't forget to scroll down below to see where we have been featured in!)

column7: >Exuding a soft glowing light in the nursery, we want Emi to be your child's BFF (best friend forever) right from the start. An integrated low heat lighting has been designed to give you the flexibility of use and custom made LED casing offers 4 alternate options and is even portable (USB connector)!
column10:
/>

Emi is grey on the outside and green in the middle! made from 100% recycled plastic from Japan.  We discovered along the way, few choose to re-use, because it's harder! but isn't it always to do the right thing!
column11:

Simple origami inspired design allows you to easily create much more than a 3d jigsaw! 2 parts head, 3 parts body and 1 part binoculars for learning!
column18: >. LED, USB cable, power adapter and even the screws for wall mounting are included!
column28: Imo have been designed to be put together with your child, we are looking to create a pre-assembled option for those mommies and daddies that just want to focus their efforts on role play!
column36:

A detailed booklet is included, as is an online step by step easy to follow video instruction of folding, creasing and locking. We all know a child takes so much more pride and pleasure in what they create themselves even if they sometimes get a little helping hand! (yes that means you daddy!).
