The six of us pictured below (plus one more) have devoted our scarce cash resources since 2005 to successfully proving that our patented technology can enable any diesel engine to run on clean, safe, powerful and inexpensive 100% straight vegetable oil fuel.  That’s right – like the stuff you buy at the grocery store or that comes off a restaurant fryer!
The last step to this beneficial fuel’s going nationwide is a specialized, improved Filling Station, one that your support will allow us to build.  Then, we can replicate it around the country!

100% straight vegetable oil fuel is a true alternative to petroleum diesel that can play a significant role in alleviating global warming.  Our operation is lean because we are doing everything possible to help this fuel gain wide acceptance.  (Only three of the six of us are drawing even minimal wages.).

We are humbled and honored that you consider supporting our construction of an improved Filling Station for 100% vegetable oil fuel at our home in Albuquerque!  Any funding beyond this goal will enable us to build additional Stations.  If you will kindly fill out our online questionnaire to let us know where your funding is coming from, we can prioritize new Filling Stations to suit your geographic location!  Our updates will keep you posted!
Clean, Safe, Powerful and Inexpensive 100% Plant Oil Fuel

column4: theater"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""Jatropha Burning"">

column1: How long do you think this jatropha seed will burn for?  When you watch this video, you may gain an appreciation for the viability of 100% plant oil fuel!
The Need for Funding to Build an Improved Filling Station

Our existing, prototype Filling Station pictured in the video above consists of a hodge-podge of components made for petroleum diesel.  In 2012, it gained the State of New Mexico's approval as being accurate for general, commercial use.

However, since vegetable oil has a higher viscosity, or thickness, than petroleum diesel, and it must remain warm to be fluid, we need to make adaptations if we are to be able to replicate this across the country:
- modify the nozzle and the fuel filtering mechanism, which will require custom fabrication.
- add electronic card-reading capability so that customers can serve themselves 24/7.
- steel, rather than sheet metal, housing for enhanced durability and security.
- more sensors on the storage tank to permit automated control.
- fully computerized controls to enable deployment of unit in unstaffed, remote locations.

We aim to complete the development of this model and win state certification of it within four months of attaining our $50,000 fundraising goal.  Then, thanks to your support, you may see 100% vegetable oil fuel coming to your home neighborhood!

Since 2005, POP Diesel™ has successfully installed our equipment after-market on more than thirty different kinds of diesel engines, everything from a small Volkswagen TDI, to pick-up and semi trucks, to a stationary generator as big as your bedroom or kitchen.  Here is our latest configuration on a big rig:

The key to smooth operation of the POP Diesel Fuel System™ is our Onboard Computer.  This took four years to develop, so that it runs flawlessly and eliminates the need for any driver input whatsoever.

POP Diesel™ has operated since 2006 the first state-permitted Processing Plant and Filling Station for 100% vegetable oil in the country, in Albuquerque.  We are the first to gain the approval of the U.S. E.P.A. for emissions-compliant 100% plant oil fuel, in July 2013!

Claude Convisser, President and General Counsel.  He served briefly in the Air Section of the General Counsel’s Office of the U.S. E.P.A. before running his own law practice for more than a decade with focus on litigation, lobbying, and regulatory compliance.  He is an honors graduate of the University of Virginia Law School and Harvard College and also completed the Society of Automotive Engineers’ Diesel Engine Technology Engineering Academy and ASTM’s course on Diesel Fuel: Specifications &
column2: Test Methods.  As an attorney in Virginia, he organized and led professional ethics seminars for other lawyers for four years.

column1: Stacey Adams, Director of Sales and Engine Conversions.  A third generation diesel mechanic who has personally run his diesel truck on alternative fuel for the past twenty years and the Shop Foreman at a Ford dealership in New Mexico supervising a staff of 24 mechanics, Stacey was identified by Ford as one of its best technical supervisors nationwide and invited to serve on Ford’s Technician Advisory Panel.

Paul Henderson, Director of Engine Development.  Formerly a senior diesel engine engineer with General Electric, General Motors, and Stanadyne, he has forty years’ experience, with focus on diesel fuel systems, product design and development, and quality control.  He holds a Ph.D. in Quality Management Systems from LaSalle University, an M.B.A. from Harford University, and a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from Chicago Technical College.

Abel Teller, Director of Manufacturing and Infrastructure Development.  He applies expertise in electrical design, automotive diagnostic, and factory automation gained while at Motorola, Emcore, Freightliner, and the New Mexico Rail Runner to the development and streamlining of POP Diesel™’s fuel system, fuel processing, and manufacturing methods.  He holds two Associate’s degrees and has self-acquired technical expertise across multiple disciplines.

Antonia Alvarez, Technical Director and Manager of POP Diesel™’s jatropha oil projects.  She is a world-wide expert on jatropha cultivation and most recently evaluated, supervised and implemented jatropha projects for the Mexican federal government in three states.

Gracie Meshell, Financial Controller and Administrative Manager.  Qualified as a C.P.A. in the Philippines, she handles bookkeeping, internal audit, and all administrative matters.  She has a B.S.B.A. from the University of the East in the Philippines.
1.  Does the Petroleum Industry approve of 100% vegetable oil in diesel engines?
2.  How do engine power, fuel mileage, and performance on vegetable oil compare with petroleum diesel?
3. Does the advertised price of POP Diesel Fuel™ include all taxes?
4.  Is POP Diesel™’s engine equipment necessary to run a diesel engine on 100% vegetable oil fuel and how does it work?
5.  Will vegetable oil fuel work in
6.  Does POP Diesel™’s engine equipment require the driver to push any buttons or otherwise monitor what’s happening with the fuel?
7.  Is vegetable oil fuel suitable for use only in warmer weather?
8.  Will vegetable oil gum up a diesel engine?
9.  What is the difference between biodiesel and vegetable oil fuel?
10.  What are the relations between POP Diesel™ and the biodiesel industry?
11.  Is vegetable oil fuel “carbon neutral” and what exactly does that term mean?
12.  Is the cultivation of jatropha trees for their plant oil in any way harmful to the environment?
13.  How much vegetable oil is out there and can it really make a dent in our use of fossil fuels like petroleum and natural gas to power engines?
14.  Does POP Diesel™’s engine equipment have warranty coverage and does use of 100% vegetable oil fuel negate an engine’s OEM warranty?
15.  Does POP Diesel Fuel™ running through an engine equipped with the POP Diesel Fuel System™ require a more frequent service interval?
16.  If a vehicle equipped with the POP Diesel Fuel System™ does not have access to 100% vegetable oil fuel, can it still run on petroleum diesel?
17.  Do POP Diesel™’s Filling Stations serve customers other than POP Diesel™’s?
18.  Does the source of vegetable oil fuel in my engine matter?
Additional FAQ’s are available at www.popdiesel.com/faq.php.
Please check out Claude’s Blog (“Clog”) at http://www.popdiesel.com/clog/

Building technology to accommodate a new kind of fuel on a shoe-string budget could pose insurmountable obstacles.  Fortunately, our fuel is vegetable oil, a substance that, occurring in Nature, is not so complicated as to require super high tech solutions.  Because we have been able to overcome numerous obstacles in the past, we do not anticipate any profound stumbling blocks now.

Nonetheless, we must disclaim that the development and testing of the improved Filling Station could take longer than the four months we anticipate, in which case, its replication around the country could stretch out.  We will look forward to keeping our supporters updated about our progress!

UniversalToolBox ist das Projekt eines dreiköpfigen Teams von Handwerkern, die gemeinsam ein unschlagbares Werkzeugkoffersystem entwickelt haben.

Um den Handwerkern im Kundendiensteinsatz Zeit und den Kunden damit auch Geld zu sparen wurde das patentierte Multitool aus einem individuell einrichtbarem Werkzeugkoffer und einer Trittleiter erschaffen.

Die Toolstep ist, durch das Werkzeughalter-Stecksystem, nicht nur für jedes Gewerk einsetzbar, sondern jede Neuerung kann wie ein PC-Add-On dazugekauft und eingefügt werden. Dadurch bleibt die Toolstep immer auf dem neuesten Stand und kann bei kaputten Werkzeughaltern günstig repariert werden ohne sie einzuschicken!
Schnellere Abwicklung, zufriedenere Kunden, mehr Aufträge und eine wesentliche Arbeitserleichterung für den Handwerker. Das muss ein Werkzeugkoffer heute Leisten!

Dies sind Bilder unseres ersten, von Hand gebauten Prototypen welche euch die Funktion der einzelnen Teile näher bringen sollen. Das Serienprodukt wird selbverständlich wesentlich ansprechender und hochwertiger aussehen! Ein Prototyp aus Orginalmaterial ist derzeit in Arbeit.
Wenn man den Deckel der Toolstep abnimmt klappt er beim aufstellen auf den Boden zu einem vollwertigen Leitertritt mit Zwischenstufen auf.

Bei der Entwicklung wurde strengstens auf die von der Berufsgenossenschaft vorgeschriebenen Normen und Vorschriften für Leitern und Tritte geachtet und somit wird der Tritt auch eine berufsgenossenschaftliche Zulassung erhalten. Die hierfür benötigte Prüfung wird von Seiten der Berufsgenossenschaft allerdings erst am Serienprodukt vorgenommen.

Der Tritt kann, dank der besonderen Klapp- und Verriegelmechanik, einhändig transportiert werden und sogar über den Boden geschoben werden ohne zusammenzuklappen. Dies ist wichtig, da auf der Baustelle oftmals die Hände gerade dann nicht frei sind, wenn man den Tritt bewegen möchte.
Wird der Tritt im aufgeklappten zustand auf das Innenteil gesetzt, klappt er automatisch an den Führungsschienen zusammen und umschließt es komplett.
Die Trittstufen liegen in geschlossenem Zustand aber nicht am Innenteil an, sondern verriegeln sich gegenseitig durch die Klappmechanik. Das verhindert

sondern auch eine Arbeitsfläche zum Sägen und Bohren (letzteres dank dem mittigen Loch für den Griff) und eine Möglichkeit sich in der Pause hinzusetzen, und damit nicht genug! Das Innenteil kann auf den Tritt gestellt werden um eine ergonomische Arbeitshöhe herzustellen. Besonders bei der Schaltschrankverdrahtung und ähnlichen Aufgaben ist dies unerlässlich um die Gesundheit des Rückens zu wahren.
Unsere Erfahrung Zeigt: kein Werkzeugsatz gleicht dem anderen. Daher bietet das Innenleben, auf Grund des Stecksystems, völlige Freiheit beim Einrichten auf das persönliche Werkzeug.

Die Werkzeugträger und Schubladenboxen werden Außen platziert, während  der klappbare Griff den Zugriff in den geräumigen Innenraum freigibt. hier Finden Maulschlüsselsätze, große Quetsch- und Rohrzangen, Messgeräte und kleine Maschinen, wie beispielsweise ein Mini-Akkuschrauber, Platz.
Alles hat seinen Platz. Somit lässt sich das Werkzeug auch problemlos im Dunkeln finden fehlendes Werkzeug fällt sofort auf.
Eine Box mit 3 Schubladen für Kleinteile. Bis zu 4 dieser Boxen passen in eine Toolstep und jede Schublade hat die Möglichkeit noch einmal in einzelne Fächer unterteilt zu werden.
Die Werkzeughalter wurden so entworfen, dass auch isoliertes Werkzeug problemlos Platz findet!
Der Zangenhalter ist so designt, dass Zangen jeglicher Art hineinpassen.

Im Zusammenspiel mit Werkzeughalter 3 können hier viele Dinge ihren Platz finden, die man sonst nirgends unterbringen kann. Pinsel, Stahlbürsten, Klappmeter, Körner, hier ist Platz für das was euren Werkzeugsatz individuell macht.
Auch ohne Werkzeughalter 2 ist dieser Universalhalter vielseitig einsetzbar: Isolierband, Dichtungsband, kleine Bitsätze, usw.

column2: dieser Werkzeughalter bietet genug Platz für die berufsspezifischen Standardwerkzeuge.

column1: Hier ist Platz für große Werkzeuge wie Rohrzange, Hammer und Wasserwaage.
führt seit 2000 in Mannheim seinen Meisterbetrieb und beschäftigt derzeit drei Mitarbeiter
führt seit 1998 in Mannheim seinen Meisterbetrieb als Elektriker und beschäftigt derzeit neben zwei Auszubildenden auch
Die Firmen Schumacher und Moser arbeiten schon lange Hand in Hand und die Frage nach dem richtigen Werkzeugkoffer war schon seit jeher Gesprächsthema.

Da kein bestehendes System eine Lösung des Problems bot, fassten wir Ende 2011 den Entschluss unser Know-How von der Baustelle zu nutzen und entwickelten gemeinsam mit einem vertrauten Entwicklungsbüro die Toolstep.

Durch unsere eigenen Handwerksfirmen wissen wir ganz genau worauf es bei der Auftragsabwicklung ankommt! Und zwar aus der Sicht eines Handwerkers, aus der Sicht eines Unternehmers und aus der Sicht des Kunden. Diese Aspekte spielten bei der Entwicklung die Hauptrolle.
Bei der Entwicklung und der anstehenden Serienproduktion begleitet uns das
brauchen wir um in Serie gehen zu können!

Die Entwicklung ist abgeschlossen, das Patent ist angemeldet und wird derzeit international erweitert, die Produzenten sitzen in den Startlöchern und warten nur auf ein OK für die Finanzierung. Helft uns beim finalen Schritt und sichert euch eine Toolstep aus der ersten Produktionslinie!
Sei derjenige der geholfen hat die Toolstep ins Leben zu rufen!
Etwa 250 000 Euro werden in die Konstruktion und Produktion der Spritzgussformen gehen.
Der Rest wird benötigt um in Vorleistung zu treten für :
• Material zum Spritzgießen (von der BASF neu entwickelter Glasfaserkunststoff )
• Herstellung  der Aluminiumstufen und Aluminiumlaserteile für das Innenleben
• sonstige laufende Kosten die die Serienproduktion mit sich trägt

Wenn das Crowdfunding-Ziel überschritten wird können wir schneller an neuen Werkzeughaltern und andern Add-Ons arbeiten und eventuell bereits in die Perks mit einfließen lassen. Eine zukaufbare Trollifunktion ist bereits in Planung.
Privat werden zunächst keine gelder entnommen da wir alle ein geregeltes einkommen haben.

Mit unseren privaten Mitteln haben wir bereits die gesamte Entwicklung, die Patentierung und den Bau des ersten Prototypen ermöglicht und haben dabei vom Land Baden-Württemberg den Innovationsgutschein im Wert von 7500 € erhalten und unser Patent wurde von SIGNO mit 7000 € gefördert. Privat haben wir bis jetzt etwa 35 000 € investiert.

ab 299€ gibt es die Toolstep selbst. Die ersten 50 Stück gehen sogar für 249 € raus als Dankeschön an die ersten Supporter. Die Toolstep enthält einen Standardsatz Werkzeughalter und eine Schubladenbox.

Wer momentan nicht so viel investieren kann, sich aber trotzdem beteiligen und einen Vorteil sichern will, kann auch einen UTB-Gutschein erhalten um nach der Realisierung des Projekts die Toolstep oder Add-Ons vergünstigt zu bekommen.

Die Werkzeughalter sind natürlich auch bei den Perks mit dabei und so kann jeder seine Toolstep sofort mit weiteren Schubladenfächern und den universellen Werkzeughaltern erweitern, damit sie auch sofort in vollem Umfang einsetzbar ist.
Und natürlich bekommt jeder Supporter unseren exklusiven Crowdfunding-Sticker.

Teile dieses Projekt mit jedem den du kennst! Nutze dafür Facebook, Google+, das Indiegogo-Tool,  E-Mails und das Schwarze Brett in deinem Buch-Club. Wir freuen uns über jeden, der uns hilft die Toolstep bekannt zu machen!
1. Sind bei der Toolstep bereits Werkzeugträger dabei?
Ja. Standardmäßig ist jeder Werkzeughalter und eine Schubladenbox ein Mal dabei.
2. Wie geht das mit den Perks und dem Spenden?

Du überweist Per Paypal oder Kreditkarte eine beliebige Summe. Bei bestimmten Beträgen werden dann die Perks freigeschaltet die du mit der Überweisung direkt auswählen kannst. Die meisten Perks können erst mit der ersten Serienproduktion geliefert werden, achte deshalb bitte auf das angegebene Lieferdatum.
3. Was passiert mir meinem Beitrag wenn das Projekt nicht genügend Gelder gesammelt hat?
Dann bekommt jeder Supporter seinen Beitrag in voller Höhe wieder! Wir können nur dann auf das Geld zugreifen, wenn das Fundingziel nach Ablauf der Zeit erreicht wurde.
4. Was passiert wenn sich meine Lieferadresse während der Produktion ändert?
Einfach eine Mail mit den neuen Adressdaten schicken und wir ändern es bei uns im System.
5. Wie Spende ich um mehr als eine Toolstep zu erhalten
Für jede Toolstep muss ein eigener Beitrag geleistet werden. Du kannst so oft du möchtest Beiträge mit der gleichen Lieferanschrift absenden.
Wir stehen euch selbverständlich für Fragen jeglicher Art zur Verfügung.
Am besten per E-Mail an info@universaltoolbox.com, aber auch gerne über Facebook oder indiegogo.com
","For an english version please visit our homepage
UniversalToolBox ist das Projekt eines dreiköpfigen Teams von Handwerkern, die gemeinsam ein unschlagbares Werkzeugkoffersystem entwickelt haben.

Um den Handwerkern im Kundendiensteinsatz Zeit und den Kunden damit auch Geld zu sparen wurde das patentierte Multitool aus einem individuell einrichtbarem Werkzeugkoffer und einer Trittleiter erschaffen.

Die Toolstep ist, durch das Werkzeughalter-Stecksystem, nicht nur für jedes Gewerk einsetzbar, sondern jede Neuerung kann wie ein PC-Add-On dazugekauft und eingefügt werden. Dadurch bleibt die Toolstep immer auf dem neuesten Stand und kann bei kaputten Werkzeughaltern günstig repariert werden ohne sie einzuschicken!
Schnellere Abwicklung, zufriedenere Kunden, mehr Aufträge und eine wesentliche Arbeitserleichterung für den Handwerker. Das muss ein Werkzeugkoffer heute Leisten!

Dies sind Bilder unseres ersten, von Hand gebauten Prototypen welche euch die Funktion der einzelnen Teile näher bringen sollen. Das Serienprodukt wird selbverständlich wesentlich ansprechender und hochwertiger aussehen! Ein Prototyp aus Orginalmaterial ist derzeit in Arbeit.
Wenn man den Deckel der Toolstep abnimmt klappt er beim aufstellen auf den Boden zu einem vollwertigen Leitertritt mit Zwischenstufen auf.

Bei der Entwicklung wurde strengstens auf die von der Berufsgenossenschaft vorgeschriebenen Normen und Vorschriften für Leitern und Tritte geachtet und somit wird der Tritt auch eine berufsgenossenschaftliche Zulassung erhalten. Die hierfür benötigte Prüfung wird von Seiten der Berufsgenossenschaft allerdings erst am Serienprodukt vorgenommen.

Der Tritt kann, dank der besonderen Klapp- und Verriegelmechanik, einhändig transportiert werden und sogar über den Boden geschoben werden ohne zusammenzuklappen. Dies ist wichtig, da auf der Baustelle oftmals die Hände gerade dann nicht frei sind, wenn man den Tritt bewegen möchte.
Wird der Tritt im aufgeklappten zustand auf das Innenteil gesetzt, klappt er automatisch an den Führungsschienen zusammen und umschließt es komplett.
Die Trittstufen liegen in geschlossenem Zustand aber nicht am Innenteil an, sondern verriegeln sich gegenseitig durch die Klappmechanik. Das verhindert
ein Klappern der Trittstufen beim Transport.

sondern auch eine Arbeitsfläche zum Sägen und Bohren (letzteres dank dem mittigen Loch für den Griff) und eine Möglichkeit sich in der Pause hinzusetzen, und damit nicht genug! Das Innenteil kann auf den Tritt gestellt werden um eine ergonomische Arbeitshöhe herzustellen. Besonders bei der Schaltschrankverdrahtung und ähnlichen Aufgaben ist dies unerlässlich um die Gesundheit des Rückens zu wahren.
Unsere Erfahrung Zeigt: kein Werkzeugsatz gleicht dem anderen. Daher bietet das Innenleben, auf Grund des Stecksystems, völlige Freiheit beim Einrichten auf das persönliche Werkzeug.

Die Werkzeugträger und Schubladenboxen werden Außen platziert, während  der klappbare Griff den Zugriff in den geräumigen Innenraum freigibt. hier Finden Maulschlüsselsätze, große Quetsch- und Rohrzangen, Messgeräte und kleine Maschinen, wie beispielsweise ein Mini-Akkuschrauber, Platz.
Alles hat seinen Platz. Somit lässt sich das Werkzeug auch problemlos im Dunkeln finden fehlendes Werkzeug fällt sofort auf.
Eine Box mit 3 Schubladen für Kleinteile. Bis zu 4 dieser Boxen passen in eine Toolstep und jede Schublade hat die Möglichkeit noch einmal in einzelne Fächer unterteilt zu werden.
Die Werkzeughalter wurden so entworfen, dass auch isoliertes Werkzeug problemlos Platz findet!
Der Zangenhalter ist so designt, dass Zangen jeglicher Art hineinpassen.

Im Zusammenspiel mit Werkzeughalter 3 können hier viele Dinge ihren Platz finden, die man sonst nirgends unterbringen kann. Pinsel, Stahlbürsten, Klappmeter, Körner, hier ist Platz für das was euren Werkzeugsatz individuell macht.
Auch ohne Werkzeughalter 2 ist dieser Universalhalter vielseitig einsetzbar: Isolierband, Dichtungsband, kleine Bitsätze, usw.

column2: dieser Werkzeughalter bietet genug Platz für die berufsspezifischen Standardwerkzeuge.

column1: Hier ist Platz für große Werkzeuge wie Rohrzange, Hammer und Wasserwaage.
Erik Moser – selbständiger Rolladen- und Jalousiebaumeister
führt seit 2000 in Mannheim seinen Meisterbetrieb und beschäftigt derzeit drei Mitarbeiter
führt seit 1998 in Mannheim seinen Meisterbetrieb als Elektriker und beschäftigt derzeit neben zwei Auszubildenden auch
Die Firmen Schumacher und Moser arbeiten schon lange Hand in Hand und die Frage nach dem richtigen Werkzeugkoffer war schon seit jeher Gesprächsthema.

Da kein bestehendes System eine Lösung des Problems bot, fassten wir Ende 2011 den Entschluss unser Know-How von der Baustelle zu nutzen und entwickelten gemeinsam mit einem vertrauten Entwicklungsbüro die Toolstep.

Durch unsere eigenen Handwerksfirmen wissen wir ganz genau worauf es bei der Auftragsabwicklung ankommt! Und zwar aus der Sicht eines Handwerkers, aus der Sicht eines Unternehmers und aus der Sicht des Kunden. Diese Aspekte spielten bei der Entwicklung die Hauptrolle.
Bei der Entwicklung und der anstehenden Serienproduktion begleitet uns das
brauchen wir um in Serie gehen zu können!

Die Entwicklung ist abgeschlossen, das Patent ist angemeldet und wird derzeit international erweitert, die Produzenten sitzen in den Startlöchern und warten nur auf ein OK für die Finanzierung. Helft uns beim finalen Schritt und sichert euch eine Toolstep aus der ersten Produktionslinie!
Sei derjenige der geholfen hat die Toolstep ins Leben zu rufen!
Etwa 250 000 Euro werden in die Konstruktion und Produktion der Spritzgussformen gehen.
Der Rest wird benötigt um in Vorleistung zu treten für :
Material zum Spritzgießen (von der BASF neu entwickelter Glasfaserkunststoff )
Herstellung  der Aluminiumstufen und Aluminiumlaserteile für das Innenleben
sonstige laufende Kosten die die Serienproduktion mit sich trägt

Wenn das Crowdfunding-Ziel überschritten wird können wir schneller an neuen Werkzeughaltern und andern Add-Ons arbeiten und eventuell bereits in die Perks mit einfließen lassen. Eine zukaufbare Trollifunktion ist bereits in Planung.
Privat werden zunächst keine gelder entnommen da wir alle ein geregeltes einkommen haben.

Mit unseren privaten Mitteln haben wir bereits die gesamte Entwicklung, die Patentierung und den Bau des ersten Prototypen ermöglicht und haben dabei vom Land Baden-Württemberg den Innovationsgutschein im Wert von 7500 € erhalten und unser Patent wurde von SIGNO mit 7000 € gefördert. Privat haben wir bis jetzt etwa 35 000 € investiert.
Was bekomme ich für meine Unterstützung?

ab 299€ gibt es die Toolstep selbst. Die ersten 50 Stück gehen sogar für 249 € raus als Dankeschön an die ersten Supporter. Die Toolstep enthält einen Standardsatz Werkzeughalter und eine Schubladenbox.

Wer momentan nicht so viel investieren kann, sich aber trotzdem beteiligen und einen Vorteil sichern will, kann auch einen UTB-Gutschein erhalten um nach der Realisierung des Projekts die Toolstep oder Add-Ons vergünstigt zu bekommen.

Die Werkzeughalter sind natürlich auch bei den Perks mit dabei und so kann jeder seine Toolstep sofort mit weiteren Schubladenfächern und den universellen Werkzeughaltern erweitern, damit sie auch sofort in vollem Umfang einsetzbar ist.
Und natürlich bekommt jeder Supporter unseren exklusiven Crowdfunding-Sticker.
Wie Kann ich euch sonst unterstützen?

Teile dieses Projekt mit jedem den du kennst! Nutze dafür Facebook, Google+, das Indiegogo-Tool,  E-Mails und das Schwarze Brett in deinem Buch-Club. Wir freuen uns über jeden, der uns hilft die Toolstep bekannt zu machen!
1. Sind bei der Toolstep bereits Werkzeugträger dabei?
Ja. Standardmäßig ist jeder Werkzeughalter und eine Schubladenbox ein Mal dabei.
2. Wie geht das mit den Perks und dem Spenden?

Du überweist Per Paypal oder Kreditkarte eine beliebige Summe. Bei bestimmten Beträgen werden dann die Perks freigeschaltet die du mit der Überweisung direkt auswählen kannst. Einfach eine Mail mit den neuen Adressdaten schicken und wir ändern es bei uns im System.

Sure, there are lots of new styles and innovations from the big brands. But what about real change and innovation in terms of sustainability and worker well-being?
-Did you know about the impossibility of shoe- recycling?
-Why should we claim new materials over and over again?
-Why should we ship materials all over the world and back?
- Why should workers be exposed to huge quantities of toxic glue?
Fabricating beautiful shoes is great. Fabricating beautiful shoes responsibly is even better!

column2: subtile, yet distinctive due to the twist of contrasting ropes.
You will end up with a perfectly balanced style.

column1: LOPER shoes are based on a glue-less principle.
It's our goal to make an innovative change in existing production methods.
....where shoe factories are generally UNHEALTHY workplaces
column2: mainly because of large quantities of toxic glue use.

column1: By supporting LOPER you will help the industry become LESS HARMFUL.
Special feature of LOPER is the INTERCHANGEABILITY of the complete outsoles.
.......which are perforated to easy fasten the outsole to the upper part.
It enables you to either repair your shoes or making new exciting combinations!
So are you looking for Elegance, Innovation and Efficiency all in one shoe that still functions like it is supposed to? You definitely should try LOPER.
Crafted with premium, eco-friendly microfiber suede material throughout for an understated luxury feel. Light and strong, Easy care and easy clean.
'Lamous' created with integrated technologies is used for a wide range of applications including fashion material and upholstered furniture,automotive interiors (as a vehicle interior materials)
With the Loper system, it will be possible for you to prepare small scale manufacture anywhere in the world.
We asked one of our backer, who is a shoemaker of a brand called ‘Deco &
column2: Boco’ to make shoes using our prototype sole.

column1: LOPER developed by Japanese label proef (founder Katsuhiro Igarashi and designer Manami Saito) in collaboration with Dutch footwear designer Roderick Pieters since 2012.
How can the design improve the situation related to shoes?
In the future where AI and technology evolution will bring dramatic changes to people and society, we will go on with a primitive and human way.
Music created by: Takeru Ishikawa
Thanks to: Marloe Bakx, Eiji Tanuma,Lenn Cox, Melanie Bomans, Studio Collector,Luc Aarts, Makoto Fukui,  BIG, Itocaci, Rie Sakata and more.
Along the way great people joined the project, making it a team effort.
Extensive trials and investigation have significantly reduced the risks and challenges faced by project LOPER.
However, we acknowledge the possibility of human error and that unexpected events can put a kink in even the most meticulous plans.
Possible risks identified for project LOPER include:

-Unforeseen delays affecting our sole manufacturer. 
-Unforeseen delays at our shoe factories
We strive to minimise the impact of these risks for our supporters and customers. Should anything disrupt our commitments, we will provide suitable solutions and compensation where necessary.
Project LOPER aims for full transparency at all levels. We will keep you informed during the production process and alert of any delay as soon as it is made known.

Thank you in advance for checking out our IndieGogo page, we truly appreciate all the support.

 

What's with Aubert Cavallo?

Our team set out to create Aubert Cavallo because of our passion for watches and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands.  We were frustrated with paying hundreds of pounds for name brand watches, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking watch collection that we are sure everyone will love.

 

When designing our watch collection, there were THREE critical details that we wanted to address:
• A detailed yet sophisticated look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting.
• Quality watches at less than half the price of our competitor's.

Aubert Cavallo is backed with warranty.

We are so confident of the quality and durability of our watches, that we are giving you 1 year warranty with every purchase. Our warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty will not cover:

Battery replacement

Wear and tear and ageing (e.g. scratched crystal
column2:
alteration of the colour and/or material of straps and or chains, such as leather, textile, rubber, peeling of the plating) 

Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents.

 

Where is Aubert Cavallo headed?

We are planning a full line of styled watches at an AFFORDABLE cost. So join with us on this journey and be a part of it every step of the way.  We will send out updates throughout the entire process making sure our supporters are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond
column3:
a synergy with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

 

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Aubert Cavallo was started by a young entrepreneur, Emily (20 years old), who is studying for a degree in Graphic Design. She is currently in her first year of University.  She has a passion for design and watches in particular.

 

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 43 mm
Case Height: 8.5 mm
Strap Width: 22 mm
Band Material: Leather
Band Width: 24 mm
Watch Length: 240 mm
Water Resistant: 3 ATM
Dial Window Material: Stainless-steel Milanese mesh band
Movement: Japanese Chronograph (Triple chronograph dial)

Packaging: Branded Gift Box

Our watches are waterproof to 3 ATM. This means that they are resistant to liquids in everyday use but not intended for swimming or bathing.

 

Where are we now?

We have currently had a number of orders already  with our leather strap pieces currently on our site, but this time round we want to bring something new, sophisticated yet fun to wear as an everyday accessory, alongside our current designs.  Now we're here, on IndieGogo, looking for one more thing which is your support!

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with friends. The important thing to remember with our campaign is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing and our watches can't go ahead! 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Find us on social media @AubertCavallo on Facebook and Instagram. Our website is currently being revamped, and is at www.aubertcavallo.com.

 

If funded, how will you fulfil the orders?

We've finalised our designs, purchased the moulds, selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry and we are about to take delivery of our first prototypes including our branded boxes.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production takes roughly 60 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to you. At all stages of the process we will keep you informed of any delays.

From all of us here at Aubert Cavallo, thanks for helping us kickstart this project. We are super excited for the future!

 

Risks and challenges

The challenges that we have to face will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGogo's backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, and family to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us great confidence in them. So stay with us on our journey. We will do our upmost to bring you great watches. Thank you so much for your support!

Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with friends. The important thing to remember with our campaign is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing and our watches can't go ahead! We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Find us on social media @AubertCavallo on Facebook and Instagram. Our website is currently being revamped, and is at www.aubertcavallo.com. If funded, how will you fulfil the orders?We've finalised our designs, purchased the moulds, selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry and we are about to take delivery of our first prototypes including our branded boxes.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production takes roughly 60 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to you. At all stages of the process we will keep you informed of any delays.From all of us here at Aubert Cavallo, thanks for helping us kickstart this project. We are super excited for the future! Risks and challengesThe challenges that we have to face will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGogo's backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, and family to help spread the word.Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us great confidence in them. So stay with us on our journey. We will do our upmost to bring you great watches. Thank you so much for your support!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: I am a graphic artist and a fashion designer (honors MFA degree in Wroclaw Academy of Fine Arts in Poland.)
My achievements include individual exhibitions in Sweden, China and Poland as well as individual fashion collection shows in Sweden.
You can see movie about my arts in youtube:
The “BLACK SHADOW OF COLOR” collection will be my debut for wider public viewing and also the beginning of the new “TATI BODUCH” brand.
This collection is addressed to women aged 25-55, who
column2: >appreciate elegance and have a creative approach to their appearance. It is designed for women who like wearing original and slightly extravagant clothes and for whom the quality of materials, workmanship and comfort of wearing are of great importance.

column1: As the dominant color of the collection I have chosen black. Not only is my choice of this color dictated by the fact that black is the favorite of the season or an “always fashionable” color. As a graphic artist I know how a black background makes other colors look stronger and more effective.
In contrast to my previous collection, which can be found on my website tatimode.com, this time my collection was limited to dresses only.
I will not reveal all secrets of the future collection. I will only say that many different techniques and inspirations from various trends will be used.
""Collage"" of some sketches of my new collection:

My projects have been very positively evaluated by experts in the fashion industry, who appreciated the concept’s maturity, high workmanship and the fact that I do not copy other artists’ ideas – I just “transfer” my own ideas onto fabric.
Therefore, I believe I am a mature enough personality in the fashion design industry to show my collections to the wider world and promote my own brand.
I already have a graphic sign (logo) of the prospective brand, as well as a designer nickname.

The resources received from you are intended to be used for the preparation and presentation of my fashion collection at the largest fashion event in Poland – Poland Fashion Week, whose eighth edition will take place on the 17th-21st April 2013.

“Fashion Philosophy” – the Poland Fashion Week is the biggest fashion event in the East-Central Europe. The event takes place twice a year – the spring edition presenting Autumn/Winter trends scheduled for the 17th-21st April 2013, as well as the autumn edition presenting Spring/Summer trends. Each edition of the Fashion Week receives lots of attention from the media, which includes hundreds of publications in the press, on the Internet, and many reports on the radio and television. “Collezzioni Uomo” and “Collezioni Donna” also report about the Polish Fashion Week shows, along with other most prestigious fashion weeks in the world.

The total cost of the preparation and presentation of the collection amounts to over 15 000 USD but since a part of the collection has already been made and I do most of the work by myself, I need to collect just under half that amount.
the cost of the participation in the OUT OFF SCHEDULE shows on the FASHION WEEK Poland
the cost of models’ salaries and photo shoots in a studio
the trip to the FASHION WEEK, hotels and transport costs

If more money than I ask for is collected or if the OUT OFF SCHEDULE show committee exempts my collection from the participation costs, all extra money will be used for the expansion of the created collection, the creation of small accessories for clothes and additional promotion of the show.
All sponsors with links to their blogs or websites will be listed (if they do not have anything against it, of course) on my Funders page.

When my brand is already known around the world – and I strongly believe it will be, even those sponsors who donated the smallest amount of money will see their names on the Funders list among those who contributed to the collection’s creation and success.

I was born in Russia. As a quite young person I “instinctively” set off in the footsteps of my parents and became an engineer but in spite of a successful student’s life and very good scientific and creative work I was not satisfied. I was attracted to art and design.

Family matters made me move to Poland. I enrolled into the Academy of Fine Arts in Wroclaw, where I defended my diploma paper with honors and graduated from two departments. In order to develop my artistic skills, I worked several times more than normally. I did it all so that I never had to struggle with technical problems while proceeding to the implementation of my ideas.

As an artist, I like fabric. I have been sewing and modeling clothes my entire life. However, artistic education gave me many more possibilities in this field. It also changed my perception of clothes as objects of design, in which the composition of colors, structures, textures and graphic curves create a unique whole.

I like color, beauty and elegance. In my projects I wish to show optimism, joy and beauty of the world. I cannot do anything without love and I put my love in my creative work, trying to improve the world around me and in this way I try to contribute to the overall harmony.

My first collection was presented in Scandinavia, mainly in Sweden, at small individual shows. It raised interest and lots of questions among the audience. The collection was also positively evaluated by a Swedish local newspaper reporting on fashion events. I presented my first collection under the name “Mosaic,” because it combined a wide range of colors, techniques and styles. That collection was inspired by retro and folk styles (patch work.) I produced all the clothes very carefully and it took a few months of hard work, but the result gave me great satisfaction.

What are Eyelet Bracelet Sunglasses?
Designed to easily wrap and lock around the wrist, Eyelet Bracelet Sunglasses are a convenient and stylish way to carry sunglasses when they aren't needed on your face.
See the bottom of this page for the latest design.
By contributing to this campaign, you are not only assisting in the launch of a product, you're helping to launch an independent product design company.  Thank you for your support!
Final Design: While I am pleased with the fully functional prototype I have produced, with your support, I will be able to add the finishing stylistic touches I envision for the final design.
3d Printing: By means of a high resolution 3d printing process, the frames for Eyelet Bracelet/Sunglasses will be produced from a strong and flexible nylon material.
Lenses: 100% UV protective lenses will be sourced from a reputable supplier.
Product Assembly: The two sides of the frame will need to be fitted with lenses and screwed together.
Shipping and Supplies: There will be a cost to package and ship contributor perks.
Indiegogo and Credit Card Fees: Indiegogo's fee is 4% and credit card processing is 3%.

column2: >The inspiration for our VSRI Timepieces was sparked by the artistic designs we came in to contact with while living in Washington, D.C. and travelling to areas all around the world such as Europe, Tanzania, Peru, and the Far East. During these travels we found a strong interest in the intricacies we saw in the distinct architecture and tools of these regions from years passed.

column1: The name “VSRI” stems from the Italian painter, writer, and architect, Giorgio Vasari, of the Renaissance Era who was best known for infusing his creativity into architecture, which he absorbed as an apprentice under the famous Michelangelo. Vasari has been credited for bringing “style” into architecture.

Our goal is to use unique materials, starting with wood, to give you not only a finely tuned and precise timepiece, but also a product which can be seen as a piece of art. We are here to provide you with a watch that has a style that CANNOT BE REPLICATED.

We know you can find other wooden watches. And, we also know that some of them look great! We even own a few. But, we've yet to find a watch which pairs well with formal wear as well as casual wear. Our ""Arezzo"" model, named after Vasari's home town, is the first wooden watch that we feel is acceptable to wear not only to the pub down the street, but also to work every day. Whether your wearing a suit and tie or T and jeans, we know you will look great in any of our VSRI Timepieces.
We will try our very best to get these to you by Christmas! If for some reason we can't, we will send your friends and family cards, at your request, telling them their VSRI timepiece is on its way!

If we can manage to raise even more money than expected will we introduce even more wood combinations based upon input from our comments section! New woods can include Rosewood, Oak, Cherry, Koa, and more. Just let us know what you want and if we raise enough we'll see if we can supply you with even more styles and combinations!
All of our watches use Sapphire Crystal Glass for a more durable scratch resistant face.
We offer three unique styles. Our Bamboo Face comes with either standard stainless steel or a black stainless steel. And, we offer a Maple Face, which is paired with black stainless steel.
Band Material: Stainless Steel with 100% All-Natural Wooden Inlay
All watches come with a wooden box, engraved with our logo.
The box you receive will have Arezzo Timepiece below the VSRI logo.
The box you receive will have Arezzo Timepiece below the VSRI logo.

Please feel free to look elsewhere before contributing here. As noted before, there are plenty of wood watch alternatives out there and we really do like most of them. Although you can wear most of those watches out to the ball game or to grab drinks with friends, how many wooden watches would you want to pair with a shirt and tie? How many other wooden watches have the flexibility to wear with anything?

Everything we've seen is casual, its as simple as that. They look great with sandals and a T, but not with a tie. Our watches look great with EVERYTHING. Whether casual or formal, we think VSRI has found the secret to an upscale version of the wooden watch.

column2: >The VSRI team is made up of two former coworkers/roommates who met in Washington, D.C. in the corporate world and found their creative ideas were being wasted. They were both inspired by the cultural architecture they saw while travelling abroad and living in Washington. They wanted a way to blend these unique cultural styles with their passion for watches and, in turn, VSRI was born.

column1: We started VSRI in the summer of 2012 as a creative outlet to our day jobs. Since then we have grown our small business and have added a couple of members to help with design and marketing.  We both have experience in small business startups and graduated with degrees in Business Management &
column2: Marketing and Accounting. Our team is experienced and driven to make this project a success and with your help we know we can take VSRI to the next level!

column1: We don't want to have our watches become a passing trend. Which is why we do not see ourselves as a ""wooden watch"" company. Following the success of this campaign, we will continue using even more unique materials in our next product line! We are currently working on some basic designs using materials such as copper and even more unique materials such as salvaged metals from antique automobiles and airplanes!

As you can see from the pictures above the design of three VSRI Arezzo watches are complete. We have finished prototypes in hand.  These watches are the result of months of durability testing and design tweaks.

We have established a relationship with a reputable manufacturer and know that they can produce these watches after our project ends as our goal amount is based on a minimum quantity basis.  Our manufacturer will assemble the first production order and ship to us. We will be responsible for shipping your order directly to you.  This allows us to provide a more direct customer relationship. This process should take 45-60 days after our goal is reached. We are forecasting early November delivery.
All pledges are going towards the first production run of VSRI watches. We will use the money towards buying wood and materials and freight costs, production/assembly costs, and packaging.
We are really excited with where we have taken this design and we need your support!  Please help us get VSRI into production and on wrists all over the world.

We're lucky, because Morgan already runs a company called 804 Industries (www.804industries.com) which makes bamboo/wooden shades. So, he knows the intricacies of working with wood. That said, he also knows that dealing with wood can be difficult.

We made sure we found some of the top manufacturers out there who know how to deal with unique watch materials like ours. So, even though we are making highly complex products and using delicate materials, we know we are working with an expert manufacturing team who will deliver a quality product every time!

Lead time delivery is expected to be 45-60 days after reaching our goal. Our team is very driven to get these on your wrists as early as possible. We will keep backers updated on delivery dates as information becomes available.
We will try our very best to get these to you by Christmas! If for some reason we can't, we will send your friends and family cards, at your request, telling them their VSRI timepiece is on its way!

The inspiration for our VSRI Timepieces was sparked by the artistic designs we came in to contact with while living in Washington, D.C. and travelling to areas all around the world such as Europe, Tanzania, Peru, and the Far East. During these travels we found a strong interest in the intricacies we saw in the distinct architecture and tools of these regions from years passed.

The name “VSRI” stems from the Italian painter, writer, and architect, Giorgio Vasari, of the Renaissance Era who was best known for infusing his creativity into architecture, which he absorbed as an apprentice under the famous Michelangelo. Vasari has been credited for bringing “style” into architecture.

Our goal is to use unique materials, starting with wood, to give you not only a finely tuned and precise timepiece, but also a product which can be seen as a piece of art. We are here to provide you with a watch that has a style that CANNOT BE REPLICATED.

We know you can find other wooden watches. And, we also know that some of them look great! We even own a few. But, we've yet to find a watch which pairs well with formal wear as well as casual wear. Our ""Arezzo"" model, named after Vasari's home town, is the first wooden watch that we feel is acceptable to wear not only to the pub down the street, but also to work every day. Whether your wearing a suit and tie or T and jeans, we know you will look great in any of our VSRI Timepieces.
We will try our very best to get these to you by Christmas! If for some reason we can't, we will send your friends and family cards, at your request, telling them their VSRI timepiece is on its way!

If we can manage to raise even more money than expected will we introduce even more wood combinations based upon input from our comments section! New woods can include Rosewood, Oak, Cherry, Koa, and more. Just let us know what you want and if we raise enough we'll see if we can supply you with even more styles and combinations!
Bamboo face with Black Stainless Steel
All of our watches use Sapphire Crystal Glass for a more durable scratch resistant face.
We offer three unique styles. Our Bamboo Face comes with either standard stainless steel or a black stainless steel. And, we offer a Maple Face, which is paired with black stainless steel.
Band Material: Stainless Steel with 100% All-Natural Wooden Inlay
Battery: Sony battery (24-36 month battery life)
All watches come with a wooden box, engraved with our logo.
The box you receive will have Arezzo Timepiece below the VSRI logo.
The box you receive will have Arezzo Timepiece below the VSRI logo.

Please feel free to look elsewhere before contributing here. As noted before, there are plenty of wood watch alternatives out there and we really do like most of them. Although you can wear most of those watches out to the ball game or to grab drinks with friends, how many wooden watches would you want to pair with a shirt and tie? How many other wooden watches have the flexibility to wear with anything?

Everything we've seen is casual, its as simple as that. They look great with sandals and a T, but not with a tie. Our watches look great with EVERYTHING. Whether casual or formal, we think VSRI has found the secret to an upscale version of the wooden watch.

The VSRI team is made up of two former coworkers/roommates who met in Washington, D.C. in the corporate world and found their creative ideas were being wasted. They were both inspired by the cultural architecture they saw while travelling abroad and living in Washington. They wanted a way to blend these unique cultural styles with their passion for watches and, in turn, VSRI was born.

We started VSRI in the summer of 2012 as a creative outlet to our day jobs. Since then we have grown our small business and have added a couple of members to help with design and marketing.  We both have experience in small business startups and graduated with degrees in Business Management & Marketing and Accounting. Our team is experienced and driven to make this project a success and with your help we know we can take VSRI to the next level!

We don't want to have our watches become a passing trend. Which is why we do not see ourselves as a ""wooden watch"" company. Following the success of this campaign, we will continue using even more unique materials in our next product line! We are currently working on some basic designs using materials such as copper and even more unique materials such as salvaged metals from antique automobiles and airplanes!

As you can see from the pictures above the design of three VSRI Arezzo watches are complete. We have finished prototypes in hand.  These watches are the result of months of durability testing and design tweaks.

We have established a relationship with a reputable manufacturer and know that they can produce these watches after our project ends as our goal amount is based on a minimum quantity basis.  Our manufacturer will assemble the first production order and ship to us. We will be responsible for shipping your order directly to you.  This allows us to provide a more direct customer relationship. This process should take 45-60 days after our goal is reached. We are forecasting early November delivery.
All pledges are going towards the first production run of VSRI watches. We will use the money towards buying wood and materials and freight costs, production/assembly costs, and packaging.
We are really excited with where we have taken this design and we need your support!  Please help us get VSRI into production and on wrists all over the world.

We're lucky, because Morgan already runs a company called 804 Industries (www.804industries.com) which makes bamboo/wooden shades. So, he knows the intricacies of working with wood. That said, he also knows that dealing with wood can be difficult.

We made sure we found some of the top manufacturers out there who know how to deal with unique watch materials like ours. So, even though we are making highly complex products and using delicate materials, we know we are working with an expert manufacturing team who will deliver a quality product every time!

Lead time delivery is expected to be 45-60 days after reaching our goal. Our team is very driven to get these on your wrists as early as possible. We will keep backers updated on delivery dates as information becomes available.

We will try our very best to get these to you by Christmas! If for some reason we can't, we will send your friends and family cards, at your request, telling them their VSRI timepiece is on its way!",12.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Touted as one of the 5 best beauty subscriptions of 2020, alongside Birchbox and FabFitFun,  My Little Mascara Club’s clean cosmetics mascara subscription is the first of its kind.

ABOUT THE MASCARA

Our original LENGTH + DEFINITION mascara formula has incredible staying power [it is smear proof, sweat proof, smudge proof and budge proof] yet removes with just water. It's like magic, we know!

With over 90% natural ingredients [that's practically unheard of in a mascara!] this is a mascara you, and your lashes, will love.

THE LOOK

This mascara offers a classic elegance
column2:
an enhanced, natural, everyday look. Ultimate length and definition, but never any spidery looking lashes (yikes). Just long, beautiful lash loveliness, here.

THE BRUSH

Our special lash-hugging brush ensures every little and long lash you have gets well coated, maximizing volume and length without sacrificing definition. Plus, its unique shape means your lashes automatically get extra lift and curl.  Good deal! And, so pretty.

THE FORMULA

Our proprietary formula is packed with natural ingredients, including the plant-based weightless moisturizer squalane.  Your lashes will love it! Plus, did we mention NO MORE CLUMPS. A dream come true,we get it.

THE COLOR

Can mascara ever be TOO black? We think not, but we gave it a go. Steering clear from potentially toxic dyes that you’ll still find in many commercial mascaras (we are looking at you, D&
column3:
C Black No. 2),  ours is what we call Luscious Black… because that is how your lashes will look. So luscious.

LASTING LUSCIOUSNESS

Let’s talk staying power. Our mascara is not waterproof. But,you might think it is because it will not flake, smudge, sweat or cry off. Even your post-massage face will be surprisingly put together.  It’s thanks to certain natural ingredients that we can provide this kind of coverage, but the flip side is that it can take an extra bit to remove at the sink. That’s why we also offer the perfect remover and eco-friendly eraser wipes. We’ve got you covered!

If you remove it in the shower it's super easy.  Just let warm water run over your face for about 10 seconds and gently massage your lashes. Your mascara will disappear - with no raccoon eyes left behind.

AND OF COURSE

All of our products are always: vegan, cruelty free, gluten free, paraben free, mineral oil free, beeswax free and paraffin free. That's a lot of free!

 

 

FAQ

WHY LITTLE MASCARA?

Two reasons, really.

1) We ALL know it’s unhealthy to keep a mascara around for too long but often simply forget to buy a new one. Even the FDA recommends you toss your mascara after 3 months. A little bottle provides the right amount needed so you always have fresh, safe mascara to use – and none goes to waste.

2) Shorter wands are SO much easier to use. Once you try it you’ll never want to go back to long mascara wands.  Not only do you have better dexterity since your hand is closer to where you are applying, but you can also get better angles for thicker applications that result in more volume.

Yay for fresh, easier to use and bigger lashes!

IS THIS VEGAN + CRUELTY-FREE?

Yes! ? All of our products are always: vegan, cruelty free, gluten free, paraben free, mineral oil free, beeswax free and paraffin free.

HOW CAN YOU SHIP SO FAST?

Elves!  JK. We only hire those in December. 

We have been at this a LOOOONG time. We waited to launch our indiegogo until we were 100% sure of dates for all products. Our indiegogo is short and sweet.  Just like us.

WHY ARE YOU A CLUB?

Because we plan to offer a subscription – we’ll make it easy to have fresh, awesome mascara on hand exactly when you need it.  *All indiegogo purchases are a one-time purchase, not a subscription. You can sign up for a subscription later, if you want.

HOW OFTEN SHOULD I CHANGE MY MASCARA?

The FDA recommends you toss your mascara after 3 months.

We’ve all been culprit to keeping a mascara around WAY too long. ? And, we all know it’s easy for bacteria to accumulate and the mascara to get clumpy and gross. Then comes the fiasco of trying to remember to pick one up at the store.  This is why we will offer memberships!

On average, our “little” mascara lasts 6 weeks with daily use. Those who don’t use it daily can see it lasting much longer. However, we never recommend keeping any mascara for more than a few months – give yourself a fresh, sanitary one!  Your eyes will thank you.

WHY REUSABLE REMOVER WIPES?

Did you know that over 20 million make-up wipes a day are thrown in the trash? Save mother earth - and your pocketbook - go reusable
column5:
>THANK YOU FOR BEING A BACKER! WE HEART YOU.

column1: When we created the Ring Clock concept, we suspected that this product would not be just a unique timepiece that makes the jewelry industry more colorful, but it would be capable of breaking the ice at the beginning of a conversation too.

We were very happy when the first evidences arrived from our kind customers - „it is definitely a conversation starter, and I get a lot of attention when I wear it…”, „… my ring clock has been a huge HIT!!!. definitely a conversation ice breaker!”, „It's always a conversation opener everywhere I go …”, and a kind story from our team - Sandor showed the Ring Clock to his friend in a pizzeria. After the dinner, the waitress kindly apologized for interrupting the conversation and wanted to know more about the Ring Clock. When Sandor left the restaurant, the very nice waitress had new questions again and they talked on the street for a few minutes.
The examples show that a small, crazy product can awaken our curiosity and sometimes it allows us to become a bit more open and friendly.

We know that more people would wear Ring Clock if it were thinner or if there is another wearing option. We are manufacturing on the border of technology capabilities, therefore we cannot reduce the thickness yet. For this reason, we have come back with a bracelet concept now, in order to give a new wearing dimension to Ring Clock.
- who love unique, sometimes crazy timepieces or jewels and prefer to wear them on their wrist rather than their fingers,
- and it is useful for ring fans too, when they want to hold their gadget on a safe base until their fingers need more freedom (e.g. gardening, typing etc.).
We would like to give the magic of Ring Clock for more people, so we hope that our concept will receive your support and we can develop a wider Ring Clock collection.
WristSet is a bracelet accessory of Ring Clock with unique look and function - it enables you to wear the ring engine on your wrist too.
- when it doesn’t need to hold Ring Clock, it is in closed state, and it does not do anything, just looks nice :)
- when you want to wear your Ring Clock on your wrist, then you can fix it on the bracelet easily by the WristSet dial rotation - fixed state.
There is one collection for men and one for women, both of them with 4 models, so that everyone can find the one they love best.
We use standard 20mm and 16mm strap pin connections, so if you have a special favorite strap, you can attach it to the WristSet.
The metal components will be made by powder metallurgy technology.
We have one new color for women - Rose Gold color version of Ring Clock and WristSet appears first time in our collection now.
Put the RC WristSet on your wrist, open the arms, put the Ring Clock on the bracelet, rotate the WristSet dial clockwise direction and the arms fix the ring.
Ring Clock works similar than on your fingers, just rotate the outer ring and you will be rewarded with the time around the band.
When you want to unfix your ring from the WristSet, rotate the dial counterclockwise direction, remove the ring from the WristSet and close the arms.
• Ring Clock + RC WristSet ($299, $339 or $389): 1pc Ring Clock (ring, wireless charger, plug, cable) + 1pc WristSet
We will send your perk with FedEx from Hungary (European Union).
Please use English address format in your contact data! (because we can’t use local characters - e.g. China or Japan - in the FedEx system in EU)

Taxes if you order from any location within EU: you will pay VAT (20% in UK, 27% in other EU countries) at checkout of contribution. There is no separated VAT field in Indiegogo system, so your shipping cost contains your VAT too. You don’t need to pay anything later.
Taxes if you order from any location out of EU: you have to pay local taxes (VAT and import duties) based on the regulation of your country, when your perk will arrive into your country.
Size checker rings: if you choose your WristSet with Ring Clock perk, then we will send plastic size checker rings first in order to allow you to select your accurate ring size before the delivery.

column1: Nowadays you can find only 6000 pieces Ring Clocks all around the world and you can meet them in some offline shops in Hong Kong or Kyoto.
Our Ring Clock LTD Hungarian Branch will execute the project.
Sandor Somos: CEO - project management, supplier selection
The production will be implemented by carefully selected third party suppliers.
Our potential manufacturers prepared some prototypes by 3D metal printer. Please look at the following photos as prototypes, they are not yet production ready products.

Our custom metal parts are not easy tasks for a manufacturer. We have contacted more than 40 potential manufacturers (watch parts, CNC milling, powder metallurgy, jewelry suppliers) in order to find the best technology for our purpose.

After testing of the samples, we plan to start the finalization work with the best potential supplier, but if our effort won’t be successful with them within 2 months, we will continue the work with the next manufacturer of the short list. We calculated the delivery time with the best case, therefore if we have to change our supplier, please note that it may cause some delay in the delivery.

Updates: We will regularly inform you about the project progress in every month by Indiegogo updates. They will be transparent with all of the results, unexpected issues and how we plan to solve them as we did it in the Ring Clock project earlier.
Please support our new project and we will reward you with a unique bracelet and timepiece - THANK YOU!
This section helps if you don’t know our original Ring Clock product.
Ring Clock is a ring that gives you time on your hands – It is a marriage of the ring and the watch. You will be rewarded with the time, when you play with this gadget.
Ring Clock gives a totally new time display aspect - when you rotate the ring the LEDs show the time around the ring surface.
• Battery lifetime: 3 years (battery replacement service - only in factory)
• Charger: Wireless charger pad (with universal 110-240 AC DC USB plug)
• Time setting: by the setting buttons on the charger pad
• Ring size: US ring sizes: 6.5 US - 15 US, width: 14 mm, thickness: 3 - 3.5 mm
Package contains the Ring Clock and the Wireless charger pad with universal 110-240 AC DC USB plug and USB cable.

Ring Clock was a dream of Gusztav Szikszai 6 years ago. Thanks to your generous support, our exciting journey started in 2013 with a successful crowdfunding campaign. After the hard R&D activities with many challenges and solved manufacturing issues, the first Ring Clocks left the factory in 2015. PVD covered Black and Gold color versions were announced and Ring Clock was a highlighted brand on the Hong Kong Watch & Clock Fair in 2016.
Nowadays you can find only 6000 pieces Ring Clocks all around the world and you can meet them in some offline shops in Hong Kong or Kyoto.
Our Ring Clock LTD Hungarian Branch will execute the project.
Sandor Somos: CEO - project management, supplier selection
Zsombor Kiss and Gusztav Szikszai: Design
The production will be implemented by carefully selected third party suppliers.

column7: >Thank you for the feedback! We've simplified our Indiegogo offer. It's now easier than ever to support Nature's Time and join our anti-bullying movement.

column1: A nature-inspired fashion accessories brand committed to ending bullying, especially in the LGBTQ community. We are partnering with the award winning non-profit
column2:
>Free2Luv®. A portion of all sales supports their anti-bullying initiatives. All products are eco-friendly and handcrafted by local artists in Thailand.
Click here for our Testimonials.

>Every 7 minutes a child is bullied. Organizations like Free2Luv® need more support to fight bullying though community outreach, awareness campaigns, and events. For each watch we sell, we are donating $15 to Free2Luv®. We want to help Free2Luv obtain the necessary funds to fuel their campaigns while making a beautiful, nature-inspired product that people can wear proudly.

column1: What We Need And What You Get

To get your watches into production, we need to raise $5,000 in 30 days. Each watch we sell will help 6 victims of bullying. If we don't meet our goal, you'll get your money back, but we won't be able to carry out our dream of helping victims of bullying.

Because we offer a money-back guarantee, we can only accept funding via PayPal. Don’t have an account? According to the premiere financial website Investopedia, Pay Pal is more secure for online purchases than your Credit Card. Thanks for stopping by.

Limited Edition Watch Styles (Only 50 Available)

Each limited edition watch will be numbered from 00-50 on its caseback. Comes with a certificate of authenticity.

Active Registered Nurse Christian Panaligan was motivated to influence a change after hearing about heartbreaking shootings and suicides linked to bullying. The advent of cyberbullying has made the problem even worse, especially for LGBTQ teens.

As a bullying victim himself, Christian's escape was nature. He found strength and beauty there. He's integrated the idea of nature into his vision: to create a beautiful fashion accessory, using natural materials, with the goal to spread compassion and awareness to victims of bullying.

""It's our time to start making real impact for each other. We don't know what tomorrow will bring, so why not make the best of today for the good of society.""
- Christian Panaligan, Founder
Production and shipping delays are always possible with a project such as this.

We have done our best to mitigate against these challenges by developing our prototype with a highly reputable supplier which has certified many environmental products, and been in operation for over 9 years.

In addition we have identified several experienced fulfillment partners and, assuming we meet our Indiegogo goal, will make our final selection based on the volume of orders and our global shipping requirements.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're unable to contribute, you can also:

• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Utilize the Indiegogo share tools on the top page (just below the video) and share the campaign with people who like watches or would like to support our mission.

    • Thank you everyone and hope to make this a successful campaign!

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Frequently Asked Questions

    If my question isn't answered here, how can I ask?
    Please feel free to e-mail us at natures.time.2015@gmail.com

    Is there a shipping charge?
    Yes. Please look carefully at the perk you've selected. You have to manually include the shipping cost. Those who have purchased a perk, but have not paid for shipping may cause delay in their product shipment.

    When will you deliver the products?
    We are aiming for August 2015. However, delays may occur, and products will deliver on September 2015 at the very latest. We will keep you up to date with this.

    Can I get the watch wet?
    Our watches are water resistant and the wood is coated with a special polish for extra protection. You may rinse your hands while wearing the watch, but we do not recommend submerging it in water.

    Do your products contain real wood?
    Yes, we handcraft all of our products with real, sustainable wood. Because wood varies by nature, the actual wood used in our products may vary in color and grain from the pictures shown here. That being said, each product is unique and no two products will ever be alike.

    Do I need extra band links?
    Extra band links are always a plus for those with a bigger wrist size. Plus, it never hurts to have backup replacement. We're hoping to reach $50,000 in funding so that every watch can come with extra links at no additional cost.

    Is there a warranty?
    Yes, there is a 1-year warranty on watches only.

    ","Thank you for the feedback! We've simplified our Indiegogo offer. It's now easier than ever to support Nature's Time and join our anti-bullying movement.

A nature-inspired fashion accessories brand committed to ending bullying, especially in the LGBTQ community. We are partnering with the award winning non-profit Free2Luv®. A portion of all sales supports their anti-bullying initiatives. All products are eco-friendly and handcrafted by local artists in Thailand. Click here for our Testimonials.

Every 7 minutes a child is bullied. Organizations like Free2Luv® need more support to fight bullying though community outreach, awareness campaigns, and events. For each watch we sell, we are donating $15 to Free2Luv®. We want to help Free2Luv obtain the necessary funds to fuel their campaigns while making a beautiful, nature-inspired product that people can wear proudly.

Men's Watch Specifications:Display Type: AnalogClasp: Butterfly ClaspCase and Band Material: Wood & Stainless SteelCase Length: 48 mmCase Diameter: 40 mmCase Thickness: 9 mmBand Length: 190 mmBand Width: 9 mmSpecial Features: 3 ATM Water Resistant
column2: Date FunctionItem Weight: 0.15 kgMovement: Japanese-QuartzWarranty: 12 Months

column1: What We Need And What You Get

To get your watches into production, we need to raise $5,000 in 30 days. Each watch we sell will help 6 victims of bullying. If we don't meet our goal, you'll get your money back, but we won't be able to carry out our dream of helping victims of bullying.

Because we offer a money-back guarantee, we can only accept funding via PayPal. Don’t have an account? According to the premiere financial website Investopedia, Pay Pal is more secure for online purchases than your Credit Card. Thanks for stopping by.
Limited Edition Watch Styles (Only 50 Available)Each limited edition watch will be numbered from 00-50 on its caseback. Comes with a certificate of authenticity.

Active Registered Nurse Christian Panaligan was motivated to influence a change after hearing about heartbreaking shootings and suicides linked to bullying. The advent of cyberbullying has made the problem even worse, especially for LGBTQ teens.

As a bullying victim himself, Christian's escape was nature. He found strength and beauty there. He's integrated the idea of nature into his vision: to create a beautiful fashion accessory, using natural materials, with the goal to spread compassion and awareness to victims of bullying.
It's our time to start making real impact for each other. We don't know what tomorrow will bring, so why not make the best of today for the good of society.""- Christian Panaligan, Founder
Production and shipping delays are always possible with a project such as this.

We have done our best to mitigate against these challenges by developing our prototype with a highly reputable supplier which has certified many environmental products, and been in operation for over 9 years.

In addition we have identified several experienced fulfillment partners and, assuming we meet our Indiegogo goal, will make our final selection based on the volume of orders and our global shipping requirements.   Other Ways You Can Help If you're unable to contribute, you can also:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Utilize the Indiegogo share tools on the top page (just below the video) and share the campaign with people who like watches or would like to support our mission.   Thank you everyone and hope to make this a successful campaign!------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Frequently Asked QuestionsIf my question isn't answered here, how can I ask?Please feel free to e-mail us at natures.time.2015@gmail.comIs there a shipping charge?Yes. Hi, my name Paul and I am the inventor of the Leaf Picker Upper and the Foldup Leaf Bag Funnel.  Awhile ago I had the donting task of fall leaf pickup.  It was as you would expect, annoying and difficult because there did not seem to be the right equipment or tools to do the job easier and effortlessly.  I needed something that was more efficient.  That's when I went to work and made the product that you see today.  It has gone through a few different design changes and improvements but it is at the place that I am compfortaable with the ease of how it works.  It is at the place where one hand can do the job of two.

This campaign is called ""Pick A Pile - Bag In Style"". Our purpose is to make the tedious job of leaf pickup a thing of style and good backyard fun and fasion.  We think that operating the Leaf Picker Upper will make leaf pickup mor fun and very easy as compared to what is presently available.  The goal is to make the Picker Upper as common as a rake or the use of your two hands.  The good thing is it only takes one hand.  This will revolusionize the job of leaaf pickup for everyone who gives it a try.

<h3><strong>We are lookiing for funding to perfect and streamline the product (make it a little more slimline if possible).  We are also exploring research and development of PVC vs. light grade metal.  We have not begun our marketing campaign yet but we would like to kick it into high gear so that people like you can get thier hands on a Leaf picker Upper sooner rather than later
column2: although later is also good just as long as you get yours.  We have plans to take care of the expenses related to presenting the picker Upper in home, garden and trade shows.  Finally one of our goals is to look into professional video and graphics to help promote our products and accessories.

column1: One of the great perks that we have for this campaign is another newly invented product. Our plastic Foldup Bag funnel.  The bag funnel is also a revolusionary product that is going to speed up the leaf pickup process.  It is just that a funnel. It allows you to pick up a large pile of leaves drop it into the leaf bag and not worry about dropping outside of the bag continuously and consistantly.  The funnel provides a 4"" tapered shield on all sides of the bag.  That means you have almost 2 times the area of the original bag size.  The bag size is (14"" x 11"" = 154) sqin.  With the funnel, the opening is increased to (18"" x 15"" = 270) sqin.  Almost twice the opening size to drop your leaf pile from your picker upper into.

When it is all said and done I am a homeowner with a pile of leaves to be raked and picked up to be bagged just like the next guy.  I found a way to make it aeasier and more efficient.  This will save you time and reove the bordom assocciated with the task.  It will make it a fun experience.  ""Pick A Pile - Bag In Style"".  Thanks for now.
<h3><strong>Stay tuned, we have accessory attachments that work in place of the leaf scoops for picking up other things besides leaves
column2: such as doggy litter, kitty litter and an attachment to help reove a light bulb in high unreachable places.  This was too much for one campaign so look for a follow up in the future.

column1: Once again a hearty thanks for your support.  ""Pick A Pile - Bag In Style"".
