After launching the MOTION V1 last year, we are on Kickstarter this time again to introduce our new MOTION V2 series. Watches are part of our daily routine, but there were none that aroused emotions in us. That was the foundation of MANYEARS. Our watch isn't just a watch of displaying time, it also reminds us to use every second in our lives useful.

Time. Everyone knows how fast it goes, but only a few of use it properly. Life is constantly in MOTION. The years pass, the pointer turns, time flies. Our life is like an hourglass, every hour you spend is like a grain of sand, once it falls, it never returns.
The hour you've spent is now in the past and it won't turn back. MOTION is not just a watch, MOTION is an emotion.
You've got the chance to choose from the following options before we ship them to you. We offer 4 different variations and 8 different straps as you can (read below – ""The Straps"")
Every watch features a 316L Stainless Steel Case, Sapphire Crystal and is 50 M Water Resistant.
The MOTION V2 is assembled in Pforzheim, Germany. Each component in this watch is crafted with extreme caution and workmanship. Our goal was creating the perfect quality timepiece.

It was important to us that the MOTION V2 is not just a conventional watch. We wanted to introduce a watch to the community – modern, a bit futuristic and timeless. We chose a circle as an hour hand and a semicircle for the minute hand. The red crown sets a minimalistic accent that gives the watch a sporty touch.

we worked 10-16 hours a day for the MOTION V1, 2 years ago. We made the design of the watch, the video, the photo, the website and all other stuff all by our own. We used my sleeping room to pack all the watches. It was the first launch of our MOTION V1 and it was awesome! This time we will improve our quality and get new team members to manage the work even better.
Our watch is 5 ATM water resistant and can be worn during swimming without jumping from a diving board. It is not qualified to snorkel or dive.
The first 2000 pieces of the MOTION V2 will be limited and individually numbered. First backed, first served, meaning the earlier you back us, the lower number you will get.
MOTION V2 watches produced after the first 2,000 watches will not be individually numbered anymore.
We decided to use only high quality, anti-reflective Sapphire Crystal (Front &
column2: Back) for our watch! Why Sapphire crystal? Read below.

column1: The main feature of the watch is that we use plates instead of pointers to display time. This type of hour and minute hands is a unique feature of our watch. The plates are made of lightweight aluminum.

One of the most important things is the movement. This is something that had to be taken into strong consideration to keep the price point attainable without sacrificing quality. We researched all of the available options on the market that would be the best choice for quality, function and price. A long lasting and precise movement. A robust and dependable engine.
Our watch can also be hand winded by turning the crown in ""A"" position. Wind 15～20 times clockwise until second hand starts to move naturally.

Built with quality in mind, this watch is constructed using 316L stainless steel casing, case-back. It is more resistant to general corrosion and pitting than conventional nickel chromium stainless steels such as 302-304.
You've got a chance to choose from the following straps before we ship them to you. Please note that these options are available, Silicone, Leather and Mesh straps.
Every MOTION watch comes with a limited international warranty protecting you against any possible flaws in manufacturing and mechanics for 2 years after original purchase date.

We need your support to succeed. By purchasing a watch, we get one step closer to our goal and you'll be part of our MOTION. Our manufacturing and our packaging partners are set and waiting for a go. So everything is ready to start production and will do so immediately after our Kickstarter campaign ends. We really hope, that you share our love for this great watch, get involved and join the MOTION!

THE COLLECTION

Saturnino is the 1st Polyfunctional Premium Jewelry collection. 

Original and unique design jewelry (everything you see is MADE IN FLORENCE, ITALY, with the best materials) with innovative usability: 

Each of the jewels interact with the others in a surprising and functional way opening a whole new world of possibilities.
column8:
>With the contribution of great artisans from the florentine goldsmithing district and the expert hand of the designer Golnar Gorgin we prepared a stunning starting collection, that already works flawlessly. With your help we can widen the collection and introduce several new designs.

Contribute to make this precious and innovative collection become real and get it at half the retail price!

PROGRESSES

The further the funding goes, the wider and better the collection gets!

The starting pack will be composed by: 2 Docks, 2 Comets and 2 Accessories. And we
column17:
> already are almost there!

If you are curious about any aspect of the development process or about something specific, don't hesitate to ask us infos or pictures!
column23:
>How do I specify the kit I want and the colours?

At the end of the campaign, we will ask you all the details we need to deliver exactly the jewel you want.
column24:
>I'm small, would your jewels look good on me?

Yes. The collection is designed to fit people of all sizes and genders. The bracelets will come in three different sizes S,M,L. In our opinion some jewels/combinations suit better specific occasions, but it is only about your taste and creativity!

It's important to note that we worked a lot on making our jewels ultra-light and easy to wear.

How come the retail price is so much higher than the one of the perks?

The price is calculated considering expenses and production costs only. Yes, we don't pay ourselves and we don't put anything in the pocket. Our objective is to understand if people like what we love, and how you all answer to our call. 7000 euros are to cover legal, R&
column25:
D and production costs. The higher we go the more interactive and precious the collection will get. 

As we always say, it all relies on you.

Why the universe?

Oh, this is easy. Come on, is there anything more fascinating than the universe? The Universe for us, represents the tension toward something greater. A will to reach and surpass every goal. It is the idea of being able to overcome our limits. And this is brought into the collection both by the design and through the idea of polyfunctionality. Limitless possibilities.
column26:
>How is the Saturnino Collection physically made?

We use brass, silver, gold, rhodium, crystals, wood and eco-leather. We are now working on prototypes with carbon, hi-tech ceramic and technical metals. Everything we use is anallergic and nickel-free. Our jewels, in every colour variant, don't leave stains and don't tarnish.

We design the prototypes in our laboratory in Florence, in Via Fiesolana. We personally get and choose all the materials from neighbour retailers and we collaborate with the best artisans to shape and refine the pieces. To be clear, the same people and district that deal with Ferragamo, Moschino and several other italian fashion giants.
column27: >Who are you and why should I trust you?
column28: >Because we are serious, hard workers and experienced people with a strong belief in what we do. To put our faces on it, we are:
column30: > Golnar Gorgin, experienced jewelry designer already creator of several collections. She loves to work with metals and to explore different, creative solutions for her designs. BA in Industrial Design at Teheran University of Art, BA in Fashion Design at University
column31: > of Florence, MA in Design and a solid experience in the field.
column32: >THE MIND. Tommaso Ferrini, already a name in the classical music scene, is an all-round creative and he put a lot of effort to give this collection a meaning, for the past, the present and the future. BA in Aesthetic, Degree in Jazz Piano at the Conservatory of Ferrara. He is teaching classic contemporary composition at the Accademia di musica di Fiesole, one of the most prestigious school of music in Europe.
column33: >THE EYE. Gianmarco Mariotti, skilled art director with a deep interest for design, video and everything related to beauty. BA in communication, MA in Advertising and Design and an intense work experience, matured around world-class agencies, like Saatchi&
column34: Saatchi and Bartle Bogart Hegarty.

column2: >Meet the coolest watches on the block
>Help us launch TWO styles of custom watches to be hand-assembled in San Francisco with your photos, logos or art!

column1: Modify's tagline is ""Show Your Colors"". We started as a project in 2010, and have grown into a brand with over 75,000 passionate fans on social media, and hundreds-of-thousands of watches sold through modifywatches.com. See some examples of our handiwork below:

The ""ModiFamily"" (our loyal customer base) has always been part of creating our products. They've named products, informed the launch of our 2nd style, and a few hundred have even contributed designs that we sell on on our site.
With your help, we can launch our first Round, fully-custom watches: the 30mm Rose Gold finish and the 40mm Gunmetal finish styles.
Through surveys, social media, and phone calls, they've asked for new styles and features: bigger and smaller
column3: square and round form factors. And of course, thinner, water-resistant, etc. We didn't think we could deliver one design that hit everyone's needs, which is why we are planning to launch TWO new styles if this Indiegogo campaign is successful!

column1: Both styles, like all Modify Watches, will be available for 100% custom designs
• images of kids and grandkids and cool cousins
• designs from the nearly 1,000 artists and brands on our site
• official watches from Major League Baseball, NHL, Foo Fighters, deadmau5 and more!
When funded, you'll be able to wear your passion on your wrist, no matter what you love.
There's a lot to love about these new styles
• 30mm Rose Gold Finish: Straps are 16mm wide and 8.75 inches long
• 40mm Gunmetal Finish: Straps are 20mm wide and 8.75 inches long
• Interchangeable straps. Like all Modify Watches, you can mix-and-match to get different looks
Supporters will receive some pre-tty great perks
• Some perks offer the opportunity to work with our Creative Team on unique designs. Most folks are not designers. Luckily Modify's Creative Team can help you bring your idea to life.
• Hopefully a bit of happiness knowing that you're supporting job creation in a small business :)

To make this happen, we need $15,000. The number is actually a lot lower than any other production we've done because, well, this isn't our first rodeo. Did we mention we've been in business since 2010?
Tooling: the equipment on which our watches are made
Inventory: we need to buy a few thousand watches to get going

Customization Software: the DIY tool on our site so you can get any photo / design on your personalized watch. You can customize 3 styles on modifywatches.com/custom currently. If we hit our goal you'll be able to do it on the new round styles too!
Job Creation: This isn't a direct cost, but just know that you're helping to create jobs in San Francisco.

Also, this is a ""Fixed Funding"" project. If we don't hit $15,000, we're not taking a cent. We cannot launch these styles without your support. And folks might never be able to swap strap colors daily on round watches :)
Modify is a member of SFMade, and proud to hand-assemble our watches in San Francisco. With your support we'll be able to continue creating local jobs.

We also have partnered with nearly 1,000 artists, nonprofits, athletes, musicians, brands and other influencers. They sell their designs on our watches, and make money from this. By backing this campaign you also will be helping a bunch of nonprofits and other individuals. Below are just a sampling of our great partners.
You can find all of our partners at modifywatches.com/collabs.

We've been running this company since 2010, with the goal of bringing joy to our customers. Our Net Promoter Score consistently hovers around 70 (that's really good), and you can see over 1,500 reviews of our service on our WOW wall.

Point is, it's not just our families who trust us. If you're still not sure, check out our Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter communities. Or Google us and see some of the press we've had, and the huge brands that have chosen to work with us!

The 30mm and 40mm watches will be the 5th and 6th lines that we've launched (old fans will remember the ""Classic"" size). We've already worked with our factory to create prototypes, determine the cost of tooling, and understand pricing-per-watch.

We decided to do a fixed funding campaign because we know that $15,000 will enable us to launch these two products. Hopefully, from reading reviews of our company and seeing the passion from our community, you'll know that we're not just fundraising to ""launch a new product""
column2: we're WAY more invested in maintaining the love from our fans.

column1: The one significant risk we foresee is that our timeline to deliver might lag (most perks have a June, July or August delivery). Our internal goal is to deliver all watches by May, but we wanted to account for shipping delays. Turns out that there is a *bit* of news on the trade front, if you haven't seen the press lately ...
We are not a charity, and are not asking for donations. We know that not everyone can afford to support - and that some of you just don't want a sweet custom watch.
Our hope, though, is that you'll share our story with friends, family and coworkers who *might* be interested.
Folks who wear a watch check it 10+ times / day ... we hope that they'll be extremely happy when they do so.

What do you mean ""CUSTOM""? Thanks for asking! In the same way that you can put pretty much anything on a t-shirt, we believe that you should be able to wear a timepiece that has exactly what you want on it. So we offer custom watches where you can upload a photo or any art you want.
Are these gold? No, the watches aren't gold! The Rose Gold is a finish, not the full material. We wanted to make sure that you could get a great custom watch at a price you can afford.

What if I'm not creative? We also have thousands (seriously) of designs from the Modify Creative Team as well as hundreds of artists. Check out modifywatches.com to see more. For this campaign, you can simply choose one of our best-sellers instead of a custom design.
","Meet the coolest watches on the block
Help us launch TWO styles of custom watches to be hand-assembled in San Francisco with your photos, logos or art!

Modify's tagline is ""Show Your Colors"". We started as a project in 2010, and have grown into a brand with over 75,000 passionate fans on social media, and hundreds-of-thousands of watches sold through modifywatches.com. See some examples of our handiwork below:

The ""ModiFamily"" (our loyal customer base) has always been part of creating our products. They've named products, informed the launch of our 2nd style, and a few hundred have even contributed designs that we sell on on our site.
With your help, we can launch our first Round, fully-custom watches: the 30mm Rose Gold finish and the 40mm Gunmetal finish styles.
Through surveys, social media, and phone calls, they've asked for new styles and features: bigger and smaller
column3: square and round form factors. And of course, thinner, water-resistant, etc. We didn't think we could deliver one design that hit everyone's needs, which is why we are planning to launch TWO new styles if this Indiegogo campaign is successful!

column20:
'>                                               

Based out of Zürich (Switzerland), Rogier du Bellier was created out of the need to produce functional, stylish and affordable watches manufactured in Switzerland, without the luxury brand and retail mark-up of other Swiss Made brands. Ultimately, our goal was to create a brand that represents Swiss watch making by maintaining the quality. However, making it more affordable by cutting out inflated Retail mark-up.

With our first model ""The Citadel"" Chronograph we wanted to make sure of the following details:

column1: • A Swiss Made watch using quality materials
• Stylish functional Chronograph watch that can be worn in either a business or casual setting
• At a asking price less than half of other Swiss Made brands

The Citadel Chronograph Collection:

Below are the 6 variations of ""The Citadel"".

Watch specifications:

Case Material:  316L Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 48 mm
Band Material: Genuine Leather
Band Width: 24 mm
Buckle: 316L Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
Clasp Material: 316L Stainless Steel
Display: Analog
Luminescent minute and hour hands 
Movement: Ronda 8040N Swiss Quartz
Date and Day Function: Yes
Water Resistent: 5ATM

Rogier du Bellier watches are backed by warranty:

We offer our customers a 2 Year warranty on all our watches.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

column2:
>How do you purchase?

On the right side of this page, you can see the price for one watch or two watches, Click on your choice and follow the Instructions to complete the payment, regarding the watch you would like just simply send us an email with the model number you wish to receive. Please remember to add $20 for International shipping if you are based outside Switzerland. The first 10 watches purchased are offered at a discounted $20 off the asking price. If you are unsure of the purchasing process please email us on info@rogierdubellier.ch
column6:
>

When will you receive your watch?

Please see our timeline below, you will receive your watch in September, We will keep you informed of the progress and let you know as soon as your watch is shipped:
column9:
/>

Do we ship worldwide and how much does it cost?

We ship worldwide and the shipping cost is $20 if you are outside of Switzerland.

Why use crowdfunding ?

This is one of the best ways to launch a product and thanks to Indiegogo this is possible. We can interact easily with interested buyers via comments, updates, social networks and email so please let us know what you think in the comments section or simply send us an email.

How will we use the funds once successfully funded?

The funds will not only be used for manufacturing the watches, but also for paying additional fees, for example: Indiegogo, Paypal, cost of shipping, advertising and, any additional funds will be allocated to creating a second model for Rogier du Bellier.

How can you help us ?

To achieve our goal, we need your help in two ways:

column1: Order a watch by clicking on the right side of the campaign to choose the offer you want.
Sharing our campaign using the buttons that you can find on the left side or on the top of the page. (Share on Facebook on Twitter and Send Email of the project to your friends).

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be  making sure we are able to maintain the timeline of events above. We have planned this carefully and will honour each and every order and keep you up to date on the progress.
From all of us here at Rogier du Bellier watches , thank you in advance for helping us make this a reality!

What We Need to Launch Lit-Cube &
column3: What We're Offering to Everyone Who Helps:

column1: • First and foremost, the funds will go to launch a nice, professional website, graphic design, licensing, and promotional materials.
• Secondly, we need to be able to order printed locking boxes in bulk as well as other packaging materials. (packaging tape, bubble wrap, printing ink, labels, etc.)
• Thirdly, we'll be renting an air conditioned storage unit to store product as it arrives. (My house is way too tiny!)

• The main thing that most of the money raised will go to is simple. Product. BOOKS. Tee shirts. Cool, unique, and some exclusive book-inspired products to fill up the Lit-Cube. In order to keep our costs low, we need to order these items in bulk and that can be quite the chunk of change.

column2: shirts for our funders, shipping, etc.

column1: • So, what about YOUR PERKS for helping us get on our feet and making our dream a reality? We will be giving away the following items, along with our most sincere appreciation!

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't contribute cash, that doesn't mean you can't do something to help launch the soon-to-be-all-the-rage, Lit-CUBE!

Here are a few ways to help spread the word about this campaign:

  • Tell *all* your book loving friends about Lit-CUBE! Someone out there you know might like to give the first month subscription a try!

• Give us a shout on via Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, or anywhere else through social media!
  • Use the IndieGoGo Share buttons to spread the word!

column2: from my indie soul to yours... THANK YOU!

","My name is Peggy Martinez and I'm the founder of Lit-CUBE. Lit-CUBE was an idea born out of mine & my  14 year old son's love of monthly subscription boxes. We love getting our ""surprise"" packages each month, the anticipation is almost unbearable as we open them up to see what awesome (& usually geeky) haul we get! We get gamer gear, nerd gear, horror gear, and super cool fandom items each and every month, BUT one thing we don't get and we wanted to add to our obsessions is BOOK gear! Sadly, we couldn't find a monthly book subscription box that made us want to do the Carlton. :(

Thus was born Lit-CUBE, the only box of its kind. A subscription box for the reader and writer in all of us!   As a hybrid author (indie & traditionally published) & as the founder of Indie Bookfest, I have made a lot of contacts in the Indie author & book community. More importantly, I have made a lot of true friends & I have learned a LOT about doing what it takes to make my dreams a reality. One of those dreams is to see people fall in love with Lit-CUBE & as a result fall even more in love with reading and writing. (Is that even possible?!?) I've already made contact with some AMAZING artists, authors, & entrepreneurs who will be partnering with Lit-CUBE to make our reader subscription boxes the envy of every book lover out there. I want to keep all the products a surprise, but I will give you this little tid-bit of info: We already have a book picked & negotiated for the first Lit-CUBE... not only that, but we have all the products chosen and ready to be purchased and it is going to ROCK your SOCKS!    I'm hoping that everyone will read about this campaign and just get that warm and fuzzy feeling that *I* get when I think about it. One <or> TWO surprise books in each and every Cube, each and every month. WHAT!?! A themed cube each month. That's right! You'll know what the theme is each month before they are launched into the world, but waiting until they arrive and you get to open the cube without having *any* clue about what you'll find inside?!? THAT'S the fun part!
Easy Peasy, Lemon Squeezy! Check it out:

2. Wait while we fill your CUBE with all sorts of awesome, reader-inspired products. Every Lit-CUBE is guaranteed to include TWO books & other high quality items, hand-picked to delight your inner bookworm. Every subscriber will get $40+ worth of great products at a low price of $25. ($18/Cube + $7 s/h)
3. Try not to stalk your mail man while your Lit-CUBE is on its way. Once it gets there, jump up & down in book-geekery delight & then enjoy your bounty!
To give you a better idea of WHAT types of products you might find in your Lit-Cube when it arrives in the mail, I made a few SAMPLE boxes as a visual.One month's CUBE may contain:
Poe Candy filled book ($6.99 retail value) +
A Gourmet-Scented Pen (A SMEN, $2.99 retail value)
That would make the retail value of the CUBE @ $44.00 and you only paid $25.00 for your box.
A literary/reading themed tee shirt ($15 retail value) +
A cool/unique pad of paper/notebook ($7 retail value) +
A Scott Spillman 5x7 Print ($5 retail value)That would make the retail value of the CUBE @ $44.00 and you only paid $25.00 for your box.

Of course, these are just examples to give you an idea of what to expect any given CUBE to look. A LOT of times, each Lit-Cube will have TWO books and then other, themed products, but you will ALWAYS receive a box wit GREAT books & QUALITY products, all hand-picked for readers BY readers!What We Need to Launch Lit-Cube & What We're Offering to Everyone Who Helps:
First and foremost, the funds will go to launch a nice, professional website, graphic design, licensing, and promotional materials.
Secondly, we need to be able to order printed locking boxes in bulk as well as other packaging materials. (packaging tape, bubble wrap, printing ink, labels, etc.)
Thirdly, we'll be renting an air conditioned storage unit to store product as it arrives. (My house is way too tiny!)

The main thing that most of the money raised will go to is simple. Product. BOOKS. Tee shirts. Cool, unique, and some exclusive book-inspired products to fill up the Lit-Cube. In order to keep our costs low, we need to order these items in bulk and that can be quite the chunk of change.
The rest of the money will go toward IndieGoGo fees, the gifts & shirts for our funders, shipping, etc.
So, what about YOUR PERKS for helping us get on our feet and making our dream a reality? We will be giving away the following items, along with our most sincere appreciation!
Other Ways You Can Help: If you can't contribute cash, that doesn't mean you can't do something to help launch the soon-to-be-all-the-rage, Lit-CUBE!

Here are a few ways to help spread the word about this campaign:   Tell *all* your book loving friends about Lit-CUBE! Someone out there you know might like to give the first month subscription a try!
Give us a shout on via Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, or anywhere else through social media! Use the IndieGoGo Share buttons to spread the word!
From the bottom of my heart & from my indie soul to yours... THANK YOU!
As of right now, all perks can only be shipped to the US. Thank you! <3",8.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Why Gravity?

A lot of wearable devices are now available on the market, but they all have a very limited set of features. If you want a smart alarm clock, you have to buy one gadget, and if you want to monitor your workout, you need another one. Before long, you’ll have so many different devices for all your needs that two hands won’t be enough. This is why we created the Gravity.


Hundreds of options.

The Gravity is a smart modular bracelet that you can configure and customize to fit your specific needs. Are you into sports activities? Crazy about traveling? Leading an active social life? Are you afraid to miss an important message or event? Or maybe all of the above? For these, and many other potential uses, you select the configuration for your Gravity bracelet that suits your needs. Choose from more than 15 wearable and 5 external modules.

Hundreds of configurable options will allow you to create a device that is custom-made for you. No need to pay for functionality that you will not use. Choose only those modules that actually work for you.


Build your perfect companion.

Each of the modules performs a specific task. Do you need more battery life? No problem. Just add an extra battery module. Do you want to receive email notifications or social network updates? Just install LED display module. Or maybe your dream is to turn your house into a smart home? In that case, use the external modules for power management or our IR module. And of course, you can charge it wireless! Currently, we are working on the following modules:



Fits your every need.

Here are just a few ways you can use your bracelet:
• monitoring your physical status (heart rate, oxygen or alcohol content)

We will also be developing additional modules to provide you with even more options for your bracelet.


Things are getting smarter.

Use Gravity external modules to control your electronic devices, track changes in the environment, keep updated about what’s happening at home, find your stuff and wireless charge your bracelet.
column2:
/>


How does the Gravity work?

The bracelet has a minimal configuration: the base is made of durable, user-friendly material, main module composed of a microprocessor and a battery module. You choose the rest of the modules based on your individual needs. All you have to do to configure your bracelet is to download our application for your mobile phone.



Control everything.

Our application (for both iOS and Android) lets you control all the modules for your bracelet, analyze and share data generated from the sensors, and also adjust the interaction rules between the modules and the outside world. You can use data obtained by the sensors in your bracelet with a number of external services such as IFTTT and HumanAPI.

Also, our app will allow you to create custom sets of rules, for example:

column1: • activate a desired RFID-key when approaching your office
• notify you when your friends are nearby
• switch off the lights when leaving the house
• turn on the A/C if the temperature is above 30 degrees
• and hundreds of other useful scenarios that you come up with

Infinite possibilities with our open SDK.

Before we start shipping our Gravity bracelets we will have provided developers with beta versions of bracelets and access to SDKs for both iOS and Android. With the help of our handy SDK, anyone will be able to write their own applications that work with the bracelet and all of the functional modules that the Gravity provides. The pool of possibilities for your bracelet is limited only by the imagination of the developers. Expect hundreds of interesting and unexpected apps for your Gravity bracelet that will make it even more fun and indispensable to your daily routine. If you would like to participate in the Gravity developers program, send us an email telling about yourself.


We’re just a step away.

We started working on the Gravity bracelet in autumn of 2013. The first versions of the bracelet were quite bulky and rather inconvenient for everyday use. We repeatedly modified and fine-tuned both the overall concept of the device and appearance of our prototype to obtain the perfect combination of functionality, performance, usability and appearance. In the end, the optimal solution was found using a common bus, made of flexible and durable material, and removable modules that will be made of a wearproof plastic of various colors. This solution also allowed us to make our bracelet waterproof*, which further expanded the scope of its application.

First printed module case prototypes, January 2014:

Feels bulky and uncomfortable, decided to drop this idea and start case design from scratch.

Final design: bus and cases prototypes, February 2014. Fits all sizes, feels very comfortable and natural.

Currently we are developing fully functional prototype, all of our drawings and diagrams have been completed, and the source code is partially done. Our team is actively working on the completion of the code, and in tandem with this we are also designing the SDK for mobile platforms.


Now we need your help!

To conduct work on the bracelet Gravity we gathered together the best international team of engineers and developers from Moscow and Perm (Russia) and Bangkok (Thailand).

Now we need your help. To start serial production of the bracelet we need to collect $300,000. This money will be spent on the development and manufacture of injection molds, purchasing parts and launching the production process.

Support our project and add ease and convenience to your life!

Every kit includes wireless charger for your bracelet. You can choose one of six available colors:




","Why Gravity?A lot of wearable devices are now available on the market, but they all have a very limited set of features. If you want a smart alarm clock, you have to buy one gadget, and if you want to monitor your workout, you need another one. Before long, you’ll have so many different devices for all your needs that two hands won’t be enough. This is why we created the Gravity.Hundreds of options.The Gravity is a smart modular bracelet that you can configure and customize to fit your specific needs. Are you into sports activities? Crazy about traveling? Leading an active social life? Are you afraid to miss an important message or event? Or maybe all of the above? For these, and many other potential uses, you select the configuration for your Gravity bracelet that suits your needs. Choose from more than 15 wearable and 5 external modules.Hundreds of configurable options will allow you to create a device that is custom-made for you. No need to pay for functionality that you will not use. Choose only those modules that actually work for you.Build your perfect companion.Each of the modules performs a specific task. Do you need more battery life? No problem. Just add an extra battery module. Do you want to receive email notifications or social network updates? Just install LED display module. Or maybe your dream is to turn your house into a smart home? In that case, use the external modules for power management or our IR module. And of course, you can charge it wireless! Currently, we are working on the following modules:Fits your every need.Here are just a few ways you can use your bracelet:
monitoring your physical status (heart rate, oxygen or alcohol content)

We will also be developing additional modules to provide you with even more options for your bracelet.Things are getting smarter.Use Gravity external modules to control your electronic devices, track changes in the environment, keep updated about what’s happening at home, find your stuff and wireless charge your bracelet.How does the Gravity work?The bracelet has a minimal configuration: the base is made of durable, user-friendly material, main module composed of a microprocessor and a battery module. You choose the rest of the modules based on your individual needs. All you have to do to configure your bracelet is to download our application for your mobile phone.Control everything.Our application (for both iOS and Android) lets you control all the modules for your bracelet, analyze and share data generated from the sensors, and also adjust the interaction rules between the modules and the outside world. You can use data obtained by the sensors in your bracelet with a number of external services such as IFTTT and HumanAPI.Also, our app will allow you to create custom sets of rules, for example:
vibrate if your pulse reaches 120 beats/sec
display new emails on the screen
activate a desired RFID-key when approaching your office
notify you when your friends are nearby
switch off the lights when leaving the house
turn on the A/C if the temperature is above 30 degrees
and hundreds of other useful scenarios that you come up with

Infinite possibilities with our open SDK.Before we start shipping our Gravity bracelets we will have provided developers with beta versions of bracelets and access to SDKs for both iOS and Android. With the help of our handy SDK, anyone will be able to write their own applications that work with the bracelet and all of the functional modules that the Gravity provides. The pool of possibilities for your bracelet is limited only by the imagination of the developers. Expect hundreds of interesting and unexpected apps for your Gravity bracelet that will make it even more fun and indispensable to your daily routine. If you would like to participate in the Gravity developers program, send us an email telling about yourself.We’re just a step away.We started working on the Gravity bracelet in autumn of 2013. The first versions of the bracelet were quite bulky and rather inconvenient for everyday use. 0,"

The Mobile Individual

We are constantly on the move to be somewhere, let it be to work, the GYM, or for travel. In most instances, we take along a few key essentials to help us face the challenges at our destination. We all need a helping hand &
column2: it’s the first companion we seek on all such journeys. A trusted &amp
column3:
reliable partner, our bag.

What’s it about?

The CROSSOVER bag was designed to become your daily go-to bag or compliment the well-deserved 2, even 3-day travel trips. By combining the best features from a backpack and a duffel bag, it is not only functional, but has an ecstatically pleasing look to give you a fresh boost in pace as you move along your daily routine with confidence.

The CROSSOVER Bag has over 15 features that we love. In addition to all the incredible functions, the bag has a chic design, made from durable weatherproof materials, and built to fulfil almost all your needs in mind.

 

At a Glance

 

A Closer Look

Laptop &
column4:
Tablet Compartment

The padded and secure laptop pocket allows you to leave your current laptop bag behind and travel like a pro with just one backpack. To access your laptop (fits up to 15”) and tablet, we designed the compartment from potential theft while firmly staying on your back for better weight distribution and comfort. The compartment also features a power bank extension, giving you hands free access to charge your devices while on the go.

 

Shoe Compartment

At the bottom of the bag we have included a separate shoe compartment that is ventilated, helping to reduce build up of odour. The large compartment can easily fit up to a pair of U.S. size 13 comfortably with a few more extra inches to spare for your used GYM clothes. 

 

Main Compartment with 180 Degree’s Access

The backpack allows full access into the main compartment, giving you maximum ease and visibility for packing, as well as airing out your backpack upon returning from a trip.

 

Water Bottle Pockets

Located on either side on the bag, the elastic pockets, lined with the same waterproof material as the rest of the bag, helps keep you hydrated while securing your water bottles. The added adjustable cord on one side, can secure a wet umbrella in place. The larger, padded pocket for your protein shaker inside the main compartment, doubles as a camera lens holder, giving you options as well as quick access from the top of the bag.

 

Durable Water Resistant Materials

The exterior of the CROSSOVER backpack is made from a durable waterproof fabric material. Rain or snow, your valuables will stay dry. And on the inside, the separate shoe compartment is made from water resistant lining to help keep your shoes or soggy GYM/laundry clothes from seeping into your clean dry compartment. Thus, keeping your cloths both organised and separated.

 

2-Way Roller Bag Sleeves

If you are traveling with a roller bag, The CROSSOVER backpack will be the perfect companion
column5:
complementing any sized roller bag. We have designed the sleeves to fit over the handle of your roller bag either vertically or horizontally, depending on your travel comfort.

 

Comfy Handles

Carrying your luggage as you move can become a little challenging especially when moving through airport security checks or the train stations. So we designed comfortable handles on 3-points (top, left, right) to make your interactions with the bag as enjoyable and smooth as possible.

 

Quick Access Pocket

The quick access pocket at the top makes it convenient to get at small stored items during a rush.

 

Metro Card Pocket

The public transportation card pocket, smartly concealed along one side of the should strap, helps you get in and out of the train stations faster, and with ease.

 

Mobile Phone Holder, Hands-Free

On the other shoulder strap, there is a mobile phone holder with suction cups to help support hands-free movements. Use it to secure your phone while charging it and keep your hands free to hold on the train loop handles while commuting on the tube instead of grasping on to a power bank with one hand, and your mobile phone on the other. Remember, safety first.

 

Hidden Back Pocket

Put your valuables such as your international passport, cash, or wallet away from reaching hands.

 

External USB Charging

Featuring an external USB charging port. Simply connect your power bank on the inside of the bag and charge your mobile devices through your backpack. 

 

Ventilated Padding

The padded back, gives you an added level of comfort by permitting better air circulation and reducing the build up of sweat and heat.

 

YKK Zippers

High quality YKK zippers are used for all exterior zippers. And for added peace of mind, the 2-way YKK zippers (main &
column6:
laptop compartments) come with thread holes for locks when your backpack is out of sight.

The added lock features supports our vision of a true anti-theft backpack for the weary travels i.e. backpacking, using hotels without a secure safe or while camping.

 

Expandable for Added Space

With the expandable zippers, get up to 6L’s of space to increase your storage, while still complying to airline carry-on requirements.

Top 20 Features

column1:
Disclaimer: Kindly take note that all items and props used in the video and pictures such as the laptop, power bank, shoes, mobile device, etc, will not come with the backpack. The Crossover Backpack is sold separately from the items used in this campaign. 

 

The R9 Wallet

Introducing the R9 Wallet to compliment our “Crossover” Backpack Campaign.

What's it about?

The “Retro 90s” or R9 was affectionately coined after the design team decided to include the pocket ID window inside the wallet, for fun. If you were a 80s and 90s person like me, then you would have probably kept a picture of our favourite cartoon character, singer, actor or that special friend’s that you had a crush on in this compartment, perhaps just to do a little show and tell with the other kids in school or to keep something private, yet dear that you could see at anytime.

Now, into my 40s, I wanted a wallet that reminded me of simpler and less complicated days, while staying in touch with the demands we have in the 21st century.  

A classic with a minimalist twist

Clean elegant curves

Comfortably organise all you needs with RFID protection

Similar to the “Crossover” backpack, we went in the direction in creating a men’s classic wallet that was sleek, somewhat minimalistic and yet could safely hold a little cash in one pocket, and a hidden pocket for a few coins or even an extra SIM or memory card.

As compared to 25 years ago, we have become more mobile, our financial and personal information have all gone digital, thus giving birth to the need to store all this data on various types of cards for ease, yet opened to theft if we are not careful. For that added peace of mind and security, the R9 wallet is completely designed with RFID protection.

The added pocket sleeves on the outside, conveniently helps you get at your access cards, whilst doubles to protect your favourite cash or personal ID cards.

Full grain leather

Water resistant

Beautiful craftsmanship in your hands

With your help, we hope the R9 wallet would also make its way into the market and compliment your lifestyle.

Features
• Holds 6 cards (sleeves x4, ID sleeve x1, sleeve with a puller x1)
• Hidden pocket for coins/SIM or memory card

Disclaimer: Kindly take note that all items and props used in the pictures such as the cards or cash, will not come with the wallet. The R9 Wallet is sold separately from the items used in this campaign. 

 

The Story of ""BASICS""

Greetings from Malaysia!

My name is Hari and I am 41 years old. Like many, I worked hard and did everything I thought was right to move ahead in life, including the long working hours, adopting poor eating habits that comes with the job, and excess socialisations into the early hours. I was saying the right things, and doing the right things to be “successful” at work. Eventually it hit as I was actually kidding myself by believing I needed to do all this to move ahead the corporate ladder. And for awhile it helped, but I was paying the price with my health. 

In 2014, I could hardly make it up one flight of stairs without breathing heavy and weighed 101 kgs (222lbs).

The idea behind BASICS was inspired when I decided to take charge of my life and lose weight. Like many, I struggled with my weight and as I turned 40, fear sunk in, big time. With the help of my wife, Lee Mee, and close friend, Varma, I managed to drop 35 pounds. I was eating right and hitting the GYM 5 times week. 

BASICS, is an idea that anyone can be inspired and invent solutions that work for them. I was driven to change my health and as time progressed, I wanted to not only look good at the GYM or work, but also needed a backpack that could cater to my daily needs
column3:
idea of the ""Crossover"" backpack from BASICS. 

Our purpose is two folds.

One, to share this amazing bag with the hope, you would see the same as we do, an elegant backpack that is both functional, and convenient. And the other, we hope the idea behind ""BASICS"" would inspire any individual, to keep them focused on a goal that is achievable.

I believe that perhaps by owning a tangible item, like the Crossover  backpack or the R9 Wallet, might serve as a reminder to keep you driven in getting positive results at whatever you have set your mind to accomplish, especially during the dark moments when you feel life has stacked the odds against you
column4:
and you want to give up. Please don’t, and stay true to your course.

I was fortunate to have my wife and friend to keep me grounded as I struggled my way to lose weight.

In essence, they help save my life so that I can be around longer and healthier, to provide a better life for my family. And I hope the same for you. 

 

Timeline

We are confident, with our manufacturers’ commitment and your belief in our products, we can start shipping the R9 Men’s Leather Wallet from January 2017 onwards and in February, start fulfilling all CROSSOVER backpack orders.

 

About Us

We love the idea in solving daily problems by creating innovative products that help people simplify, organise and improve their lives. We want to share the same passion with you and hope you would help back our campaign. We are grateful to everyone for taking the time in helping us bring both the BASICS Crossover Backpack and R9 Wallet to life on the INDIEGOGO platform.

Thanks for all of your support!

column4:
>One of the Leather Shoes Every Man Must Own 

Urban Classic Series is the ever fashionable and stylish loafers. This collection of styles combines premium materials with authentic detailing, signifying the unmistakable hand of Yogi Takahashi. 

We will produce 8 easy-to-match colors for you. Whether you are going to a boat trip or causal dating with your love one, Yogi shoes will definitely make you a day.
column6:
>for Smart and Confident Professional

From Miami Cool Series you can wear the black one to the office while the brown one becomes more versatile because you may now combine them with tweed, and other more casual outfits and looks, including jeans. These are great for the office in non-white collar environments.

Miami Cool Series offer 7-days-a-week colors for your daily cool style. Grab the one you feel the most comfortable and create the cool way for yourself.
column7:
>Quality Leather Shoes for Different Occasions

Boston Noble Series is probably the most casual style and certainly it is easiest to carry off. Choose a pair of sophisticated business loafers in black from this collection of Japanese shoes and team with anything from tailored office looks to cropped chinos at the weekend. 

Boston Noble Series offer 6 easy-to-carry-off colors for you. This collection is easy going and every shoe is handcrafted by our experienced leather-shoes master. Heels and soles are matched for perfect bounce and hold.
column8:
>Our Commitment to All Backers

We guarantee all backers can receive their rewards ON TIME! Only earlier, no delay! 

Once the Indiegogo campaign is funded, we would immediately commence our work. We will send over the survey to all backers and collect your opted color style and size. The earlier survey received from you, the earlier production can be commenced. That said, the earlier and faster delivery can be made to you.
column10:
Exchange Policy

Since our production house is in Japan, we can offer free shipping for Japan area. Please accept our apology that if you want to make any exchange for the shoes then the backers will need to bear the both ways exchange shipping fees - we thank you for your understanding that this is the first time of Yogi to join the Indiegogo
column11: the price offered to all backers is the ever economic one and our margin is very small and thin.

That said, the earlier and faster delivery can be made to you.                                                                                                                                                                       Shipping & Exchange PolicySince our production house is in Japan, we can offer free shipping for Japan area. Please accept our apology that if you want to make any exchange for the shoes then the backers will need to bear the both ways exchange shipping fees - we thank you for your understanding that this is the first time of Yogi to join the Indiegogo
column13: the price offered to all backers is the ever economic one and our margin is very small and thin.                                                                                                                                                                      The World's Best Leather Shoes at the World's Best Price",20.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Hello. We have been receiving entrepreneurship lessons in Turkey for the last 2 years. Last year, We won a 1,000 Dollar prize by ranking among the top three in an entrepreneurship compatition which was organized by the university that  we study in which  is Sakarya University. We need a larger sum of money to realize the project . We 've been working on our own project, Kombinova since June 2017. We would really appreciate if you support us young entrepreneurship for an authentic brand which can come out of Turkey  and for brand which can see value in a global level.
What is Kombinova? : Kombinova is a fashion platform that's mostly appealing to women who is indecisive when it comes to buying clothes, accessories or cosmetics and aims to fix this problem.

column2: a friend of yours has entered to a mall and she will buy a dress but she is torn between 3 different choices.Even though she has some friends with her, she can't get enough suggestions. Our friend vacillates.

column1: She can take pictures of those 3 different clothes and upload them on Kombinova with a  message. Within a couple of minutes, hundreds of people vote for it  and they can also comment on it.
Thus our friend's problem of indecision would be fixed.

In Kombinova  you may get folowers and you can  interact with other members.  You gain Fashion Point by voting photos on the platform or commenting on them. When you reach 1,000 Fashion Point, you become Bronze, when you reach 5,000 Fashion Point, you become Silver, when you reach 10,000 Fashion Point, you become Gold and  finally when you reach 20,000 Fashion Point,
You get your access to VIP rooms like Bronze, Silver, Golden and Dimond depending on your membership level. You can talk to people with the same level &
column2: experience, share things  with them and open questionnaires. The frame of your profile picture and your inbox get the color of your membership level. A lat of feature like this and so an gives you  a chance to make  the right choice and have fun at the same time

column1: Why do we  need this money? We have been working on this project for 1 year and we are not software developers but collage students. And we don't  have the budget for the commercial and Beta version of our project. That's why we need your support.

As young entrepreneurs we can devote our time, our creativity and imagination project. We are going to use those 10,000 dollars entirely  for the commercial of our project and to develop   the software. If we get more support, we are going to use them for the expenses of our project. We are also going to use our own  savings for this project. We will be really happy if you share our project on your social media accounts.
As young entrepreneurs, we will be grateful for all the supports.
Thank you all - Dogan Sorgut,  Fatih Barin

column2:
>Who are we?

Ibiza Miami is created by a group of young and passionate artists- from designers, photographers, videographers, musicians, and dancers.

We all know how much we love a good t-shirt, but main attraction magnet is the shorts you wear!

Everyone here and there makes T-shirt's for support, for save the ocean for whatever they may find a reason.

But our company is different we are not taking someone's idea and print it on the back to make money.

We are creating our own everyday style, so people will not just look at you and smile, they will envy you!

They would want to feel that freedom you are feeling right now.

Perfectly designed out of strongest materials out there on the market. Our clothes fit perfectly and sit well. It's comfortable for everyday use.

Bright and colorful clothing is not just attractive, it's screaming out loud to everyone out there I am going to party all night! And you won't stop me nana :)

To conclude your look we also designed a matching set for your boy/girlfriend.
Colorful caps, footwear and bags as well as your couple's shorts and flip flops

We do not produce any T-Shirts since you may not wear them if you are on the beach.

We also know how good it feels to know you are making a positive change in the community.

We thought why not put the two together and feel super awesome about yourself.

Wear your colorful shorts with pride!
column3:
>Our mission

Show off to everyone else around you, don't be ashamed what would other think, be the party starter!

Party! Party! Party!
column5:
>Uh oh ok but idk, what if?

No what if's should be taking into account, just put on Ibiza Miami shorts and enjoy your life, go to the swimming pool, beach, go surfing, go to a night club, do whatever you please.

This collection is designed to last longer whilst still being easy and fun to wear.
We have a special proposal if you are buying combo set (shorts, bag, flip flops, and cap), or even a couple combo set, check out the perks list.
column6:
>Fell asleep drunk, got wasted?

No problemo!
Ibiza Miami clothes are easy to wash and clean!
You can use your hands but if they are shaking after a good night out, what for?
Just drop you Ibiza Miami set (shorts, bag, flip flops, and cap) into the washer with whatever degrees you want and get it clean in a few hours.
column7:
>oook so it's cleaning well it'll give me attraction what else do I need it for?

No matter what for! It's like a little red dress every girl should have...
But for the day off
column8:
>But I don't have beaches near me or any kind of water lakes etc


In this case, you have 2 options:
-Go to a swimming pool
- Go to the beach, everyone should have a vacation after all!
column9:
>You have so many perks how do i get what i want?

 

We have 4 items basically: Flip Flops, Shorts, Caps and Bags

If you want for example red woman's shorts with stars, you just take the shorts perk, there are different early bird prices for all the collection.

So if you are lucky enough you can get them for only $10 excluding shipping, If you order a super early bird shorts perk.

Yes, i get it, but how do i get the right size and color?

After campaign ends we will send you a survey where you'll check the desired model type 

color and size for the item you ordered.

You will specify that you want red with stars woman shorts size L in the survey and we will send that info to production.
column12: >Woman's shorts
column13: >Flip Flops
column14: >Men's shorts
column15: >Caps
column16: >Bags
column17:
>Risks and Challenges

We have taken the time to get nearly everything in place before launching this campaign.
We took the risk up front by delaying the launch of this campaign until we believed it was ready, to lessen the risk to our backers. 
We have a great team in place so we don't predict many obstacles here. But there is always the unknown.
column18:
>Other ways you can help

Please feel free to contact us via ibizamaiami@gmail.com (correct spelling e-mail was taken :) ) and or follow us on Instagram @ibizamiami, and share share share our campaign page everywhere you can! It won't take you much time but we will be very gratefull.
column19: >Please help us make this collection.
column20:
>Thank You!

column1: 0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><h1>Say hello to LACED
and easiest way to tighten and loosen the laces on your shoes.  Slip your
shoes on, pull to tighten, twist and lock.  That’s it!  Your shoe is
now snugly fastened and you are ready to run…or walk.  Done walking?
Simply reverse the process.  Unlock, untwist and loosen your shoes. Slide
them off. That’s it!<span>  This is the
beginning of a shoe lacing revolution.  LACED
4 GOOD™ can dramatically change your daily routine by saving time and effort.  Never tie your shoe laces again. Consider this a fun option to conventional shoe lacing.
about how bad bows are and how they just get in the way.  We happen to
feel that the bows on shoe laces give shoes a classic look that is a tradition
in many cultures.  Some people like them and some don’t.  Why not give
everyone the option to choose the style that is best for them?  LACED
4 GOOD™ gives everyone that choice and does it with style.  And
even better, LACED 4 GOOD™ gives you endless options to customize
colors, designs and other accessories like no other shoe lace product can.
<h1>Want something new and different?<span>  Try braided laces or a unique bow
your shoes, you will discover a new twist…(pun intended) in your daily routine.
endorsements (YET) but are fairly certain most of them wear shoes and would
benefit tremendously from LACED 4 GOOD™.  The
endorsements we do have are from family and friends that have tried LACED
4 GOOD™ and found them to do everything and even more than what they
expected.  Everyone is amazed at how such a simple device can perform the
Shoes are an essential part of our daily
lives.  On a typical day we put on a pair
of shoes in the morning: tie them.  Untie
the shoes and take them off after work or school.  Put on another pair of more comfortable shoes
(tie them) to run, play or exercise in during the afternoon.  Untie the shoes to take them off when we come
in for dinner.  Put on shoes (and tie
them) after dinner to go for a walk.
Stop at a neighbor’s house to visit and take the shoes off (untie them
first of course) when you enter their home.
Put the shoes back on (tie them again) when you are ready to go
home.  Untie and take the shoes off again
when you return home for the evening.
The point is that we spend a lot of time putting on and tying shoes and
then untying and taking off the very same shoes each and every day.
and fumbling around with laces to tie or untie shoes is a routine that is
uncomfortable for many and actually painful for some.  There are a few products on the market that
do a pretty good job of securing shoes or shoe laces but they do it in a way
that always keeps the shoes tight.  You
need to use a shoe horn to forcibly put on shoes that are tied tight and even
with the help of a shoe horn it is sometimes very difficult to get them on.  Tightly laced shoes are also very hard to get
is a brand new product that will save us time &amp
and untying shoes a thing of the past. LACED
4 GOOD™ is simply designed to be simple to use.
I am honored to present to the Indiegogo
community, LACED 4 GOOD™ which will tie (tighten) and untie (loosen) the laces
on almost any shoe with a simple pull and twist action.  LACED 4 GOOD™ is a single piece patent
pending system that simply slips over the laces on each shoe and provides full tension
adjustment from loose to snug and gives you total control of the tightness and
comfort settings you desire.  There are
no tools needed to adjust the fit.
If you wish to use the loop style
configuration, you will need to prepare your shoes to accept the LACED 4 GOOD™
lace link.  First you will need to
slightly rearrange the laces on your shoes.
Pull the lace back out of the top two eyelets (two on each side of the
tongue).  Then reinsert the lace from the
underside of the second eyelet up through and into the top side of the first
eyelet.  Pull the lace down through the
first eyelet and pull it snug.  Do the
same thing with the lace and the eyelets on the other side of the tongue.  This new lace arrangement makes a very
convenient loop between the first and second eyelets that we will use later.
loop style configuration is just one of many ways your shoe and shoe laces can
be arranged to work with LACED 4 GOOD™.<span>
In most cases LACED 4 GOOD™ will even work with existing shoe lace
configurations so you won’t need to change a thing.
There are no limits to the shoe
lacing variations that will work with LACED 4 GOOD™.  You can use your own style of creativity to
design functional and attractive shoe lace works of art.
loosen your shoe laces to a comfortable setting that allows you to easily
remove and put on the shoe.  Then feed
the lace ends through the corresponding holes on each end of the LACED 4 GOOD™
lace link and slide it over the laces down to the shoe until it rests on the
eyelets near the tongue of the shoe.  You
may want to leave a little slack in the laces at this point but you can always
go back and re-adjust the lace link later.
multiple holes in it to permit adjustment to the range of tightness you would
like on the shoe and to determine if you want to use conventional bows or go
with a bowless look.  You can weave the
lace through all the holes on each side of the lace link or decide what
combination of laces and holes works best for you.  If the laces are placed in the outer holes
first, there will be a greater amount of “take-up” on the laces and the shoe laces
will stay tighter after the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link is turned into place.  The
outside holes give the greatest variation from loose to tight and many people
prefer this type of fit style.  If the
holes closer to the middle of the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link are used, there will
be slightly less “take-up” on the laces and the shoe will be a little less snug
when the LACED 4 GOOD™ is turned into
With the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link fully
laced, the laces can then be tied together with a double knot bow (for the very
last time) if you wish to give the shoes a traditional bow look on top of the
Or the laces can be inserted down
into the center set of holes on the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link and be knotted
together on the underside to give the shoe a clean sleek look with no bow.  A few drops of glue on the knot will
guarantee it will never come loose.
You may have to tweak the tension
a time or two to get the comfortable fit you want but in the end it will be
worth it. Also, the ends of the LACED 4
GOOD™ lace link are intentionally left a little long to allow you to trim them
Simply cut off the excess with a pair of scissors if you wish.
the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link, pull out/up from the shoe and you will see and
feel the laces begin to tighten.  Twist 180
degrees (a half circle either way) to take up the slack in the laces and then slip
each end of the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link into the loops previously made with the
shoe laces. Or if you want the lace link to be hidden, slide the LACED 4 GOOD™
lace link under the laces on top of the shoe tongue.  This process takes about two seconds.
the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link, apply a little pressure (force) either right or
left and one end of the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link will come out of the shoe lace
loop or out from under the laces.  Pull
the other side free and let the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link “untwist” and your shoe
will be loose enough to easily take off.
This process also takes about two seconds.
dress shoes, an easy and effective way to achieve the comfortable fit you want
is to use more than one set of LACED 4 GOOD™ lace links.  Each set will tighten and loosen the lace
area directly in the part of the shoe where it is placed.  We recommend two sets of LACED 4 GOOD™ for ankle high shoes, three sets of LACED 4
GOOD™ for 8” boots and four or more sets
of LACED 4 GOOD™ for boots 10”  or higher.
Multiple sets of LACED 4 GOOD™ lace links are installed in the same
manner as described above by unlacing and making shoe lace loops for the LACED
4 GOOD™ lace links to be inserted into.
In some cases, the existing shoe laces may be a little too short.  You may wish to use several lengths of
shorter laces to allow the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace links to work by tightening the
example an 8” boot would have three shoe lace segments which would be tightened
or loosened independent of the others.
You can choose the best arrangement that works on your shoes or boots.
Bow or No Bow?  Many people like the traditional look of
shoes with a properly tied bow and LACED 4 GOOD™ can provide this traditional
There has also been a trend lately to eliminate the traditional bow and
go with a No Bow sleek looking shoe and LACED 4 GOOD™ can provide this new look also.  LACED 4 GOOD™ can provide the No Bow look but
with many more interesting options.  A child’s
name, shoe charm, team logo, product logo, company name, bright color, flashing
lights or any other decoration that the creative LACED 4 GOOD™ owner can dream up, can be easily applied to LACED
4 GOOD™.  We don’t currently produce any
decorations for or customization of LACED 4 GOOD™ but we do encourage inspired
designers and artists to think of all the possibilities and perhaps even launch
a campaign using creative designs, artwork and decorations using LACED 4 GOOD™ as
the foundation or “canvas” for their creative expressions.  We will be producing a page on our website ( www.laced4good.com ) dedicated to showing
off the creativity of LACED 4 GOOD™ users.
Please visit the site and share your ideas.
We think you will be pleased and
impressed at how easily and quickly LACED 4 GOOD™ works for you.  It has never been easier to get in and out of
GOOD™ does a fantastic job of tying (tightening) and untying (loosening) your
shoes.  But did you notice that your
shoes can be tied and untied USING ONLY ONE HAND?  This feature alone makes LACED 4 GOOD™ one of
the most useful tools ever designed.  For
many people, the act of tying shoes is difficult and in some cases downright
painful.  The simple pull and twist
motion of LACED 4 GOOD™ could make starting the day for some people just a
of LACED 4 GOOD™ motivated us to use this convenient feature to help even more
people.  We have designed a very simple
accessory that can be used with LACED 4 GOOD™ to allow the user to operate the
pull and twist motions from a distance!
Yes, that means by installing LACED 4 GOOD™ on your shoes and when using
this accessory, you can tie and untie your shoes WITHOUT BENDING OVER!!  This accessory is approximately 36” long and
permits you to simply grip the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link securely, pull, twist
and slide it into the loops on your shoe while standing or sitting upright. At this stage of development, it is not the
most glamorous tool or accessory, but it does work and work well.  It will take a little practice to get really
good at tying (tightening) your shoes from a distance but when you get it, you
will be doing something nobody else has done before.  With a little more practice, you will even be
able to use this accessory with one hand.
We make the handles one length (long) and for now, the user can use this
tool as is or cut the handles shorter to a more convenient length.  After this Indiegogo project is completed, we
intend to enhance the design and performance of this unique tool so stay in
We will use the funds to pay for the injection molding tooling that will
allow us to produce enough LACED 4 GOOD™ for everyone.
The challenge will be getting the word out about our innovative new product
and convincing the Indiegogo community to participate. I have seen a lot of really
incredible projects here and getting the attention needed for a successful
campaign will be challenging, so I'm asking everyone, from family, old friends,
new friends, the Indiegogo community and “American Dreamers” everywhere to
spread the word. If you tell ten friends and they each tell ten friends and so
on, this project will be a huge success.
When it comes to fulfillment, every project
has potential obstacles and challenges. Obtaining materials, getting the
injection molding dies built and delivered on schedule are among them.<span>  We will be using a local manufacturer that we
have worked with for many years and he has been extremely reliable and
cooperative and always produces high quality parts so the risk is minimal.  Some projects are sent “offshore” from the
moment of conception but our  project was
imagined, designed, tested and will be made right here in the Great Lakes Bay area
of Michigan, U.S.A.  We have a wide variety of first
class Manufactures in our area.<span>  Their
vast knowledge and experience makes it easy to turn a dream into a reality.
Another challenge is the high cost of
shipping LACED 4 GOOD™ to you.<span>  Our
product is designed to be economical, efficient and effective and as a result
of these efforts has a very low price. The packaging and shipping cost is often
more expensive than the product itself.
We will do our best to find a way to get LACED 4 GOOD™ to you using the
LACED 4 GOOD™ works on most laced shoes with eyelets
on either side of the shoe tongue up to 3” apart. Some styles of track shoes and boots are much
wider than regular shoes and for this start up we don’t currently plan to make
a version to fit exceptionally wide shoes.

The point is that we spend a lot of time putting on and tying shoes and
then untying and taking off the very same shoes each and every day.
The process of sitting or bending
and fumbling around with laces to tie or untie shoes is a routine that is
uncomfortable for many and actually painful for some.  There are a few products on the market that
do a pretty good job of securing shoes or shoe laces but they do it in a way
that always keeps the shoes tight.  You
need to use a shoe horn to forcibly put on shoes that are tied tight and even
with the help of a shoe horn it is sometimes very difficult to get them on.  Tightly laced shoes are also very hard to get
Fortunately for all of us there
is a brand new product that will save us time & effort and make routine tying
and untying shoes a thing of the past. LACED
4 GOOD™ is simply designed to be simple to use.
I am honored to present to the Indiegogo
community, LACED 4 GOOD™ which will tie (tighten) and untie (loosen) the laces
on almost any shoe with a simple pull and twist action.  LACED 4 GOOD™ is a single piece patent
pending system that simply slips over the laces on each shoe and provides full tension
adjustment from loose to snug and gives you total control of the tightness and
comfort settings you desire.  There are
no tools needed to adjust the fit.
If you wish to use the loop style
configuration, you will need to prepare your shoes to accept the LACED 4 GOOD™
lace link.  First you will need to
slightly rearrange the laces on your shoes.
Pull the lace back out of the top two eyelets (two on each side of the
tongue).  Then reinsert the lace from the
underside of the second eyelet up through and into the top side of the first
eyelet.  Pull the lace down through the
first eyelet and pull it snug.  Do the
same thing with the lace and the eyelets on the other side of the tongue.  This new lace arrangement makes a very
convenient loop between the first and second eyelets that we will use later.
loop style configuration is just one of many ways your shoe and shoe laces can
be arranged to work with LACED 4 GOOD™.
In most cases LACED 4 GOOD™ will even work with existing shoe lace
configurations so you won’t need to change a thing.
There are no limits to the shoe
lacing variations that will work with LACED 4 GOOD™.  You can use your own style of creativity to
design functional and attractive shoe lace works of art.
loosen your shoe laces to a comfortable setting that allows you to easily
remove and put on the shoe.  Then feed
the lace ends through the corresponding holes on each end of the LACED 4 GOOD™
lace link and slide it over the laces down to the shoe until it rests on the
eyelets near the tongue of the shoe.  You
may want to leave a little slack in the laces at this point but you can always
go back and re-adjust the lace link later.
The LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link has
multiple holes in it to permit adjustment to the range of tightness you would
like on the shoe and to determine if you want to use conventional bows or go
with a bowless look.  You can weave the
lace through all the holes on each side of the lace link or decide what
combination of laces and holes works best for you.  If the laces are placed in the outer holes
first, there will be a greater amount of “take-up” on the laces and the shoe laces
will stay tighter after the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link is turned into place.  The
outside holes give the greatest variation from loose to tight and many people
prefer this type of fit style.  If the
holes closer to the middle of the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link are used, there will
be slightly less “take-up” on the laces and the shoe will be a little less snug
when the LACED 4 GOOD™ is turned into

Or the laces can be inserted down

For shoes and boots higher than
dress shoes, an easy and effective way to achieve the comfortable fit you want
is to use more than one set of LACED 4 GOOD™ lace links.  Each set will tighten and loosen the lace
area directly in the part of the shoe where it is placed.  We recommend two sets of LACED 4 GOOD™ for ankle high shoes, three sets of LACED 4
GOOD™ for 8” boots and four or more sets
of LACED 4 GOOD™ for boots 10”  or higher.
Multiple sets of LACED 4 GOOD™ lace links are installed in the same
manner as described above by unlacing and making shoe lace loops for the LACED
4 GOOD™ lace links to be inserted into.

You can choose the best arrangement that works on your shoes or boots.

The simple pull and twist motion
of LACED 4 GOOD™ motivated us to use this convenient feature to help even more
people.  We have designed a very simple
accessory that can be used with LACED 4 GOOD™ to allow the user to operate the
pull and twist motions from a distance!
Yes, that means by installing LACED 4 GOOD™ on your shoes and when using
this accessory, you can tie and untie your shoes WITHOUT BENDING OVER!!  This accessory is approximately 36” long and
permits you to simply grip the LACED 4 GOOD™ lace link securely, pull, twist
and slide it into the loops on your shoe while standing or sitting upright. At this stage of development, it is not the
most glamorous tool or accessory, but it does work and work well.  It will take a little practice to get really
good at tying (tightening) your shoes from a distance but when you get it, you
will be doing something nobody else has done before.  With a little more practice, you will even be
able to use this accessory with one hand.
We make the handles one length (long) and for now, the user can use this
tool as is or cut the handles shorter to a more convenient length.  After this Indiegogo project is completed, we

What we need the money for:
We will use the funds to pay for the injection molding tooling that will
allow us to produce enough LACED 4 GOOD™ for everyone.
The challenge will be getting the word out about our innovative new product
and convincing the Indiegogo community to participate. I have seen a lot of really
incredible projects here and getting the attention needed for a successful
campaign will be challenging, so I'm asking everyone, from family, old friends,
new friends, the Indiegogo community and “American Dreamers” everywhere to
spread the word. If you tell ten friends and they each tell ten friends and so
on, this project will be a huge success.
When it comes to fulfillment, every project
has potential obstacles and challenges. Obtaining materials, getting the
injection molding dies built and delivered on schedule are among them.  We will be using a local manufacturer that we
have worked with for many years and he has been extremely reliable and
cooperative and always produces high quality parts so the risk is minimal.  Some projects are sent “offshore” from the
moment of conception but our  project was
imagined, designed, tested and will be made right here in the Great Lakes Bay area
of Michigan, U.S.A.  We have a wide variety of first
class Manufactures in our area.  Their
vast knowledge and experience makes it easy to turn a dream into a reality.
Another challenge is the high cost of
shipping LACED 4 GOOD™ to you.  Our
product is designed to be economical, efficient and effective and as a result
of these efforts has a very low price. The packaging and shipping cost is often
more expensive than the product itself.
